Title: Intandaro y’ubwoba n’uburakari bw’u Rwanda ubwo Gabon yivanaga muri OCAM rwari ruyoboye
Body:
Imyaka ya 1974 kugeza mu 1978, ni imyaka yagoye cyane Leta ya Juvénal Habyarimana cyane cyane mu bijyanye no kugarura umwuka n’umubano mwiza mu muryango wa OCAM u Rwanda rwari rwahawe kuyobora.
Imyaka ya 1974 kugeza mu 1978, ni imyaka yagoye cyane Leta ya Juvénal Habyarimana cyane cyane mu bijyanye no kugarura umwuka n’umubano mwiza mu muryango wa OCAM u Rwanda rwari rwahawe kuyobora.
Ni umuryango Gabon yitaga ko wenda gupfa, mu gihe Habyarimana, Perezida wa Sénégal, Sédar Senghor n’abandi bake babonaga ko ari wo zingiro ry’ukwishyira hamwe kwa Afurika.
OCAM ni umuryango watangiye mu 1965, uzima mu 1985. Waje usimbuye undi witwaga Union Africaine et Malgache (UAM) washibutse mu kwishyira hamwe kw’ibihugu byahoze bikolonijwe n’u Bufaransa.
U Rwanda rwinjiranye na Zaire muri OCAM mu 1965, umuryango ufite intego zo gufatanye mu by’ubukungu, imibereho myiza y’abaturage, guhanahana ibijyanye n’umuco n’ibindi.
Bimwe mu byo u Rwanda rwawungukiyemo ukiriho ni igice kimwe cya Village Urugwiro cyubatswe ubwo rwiteguraga kwakira inama yawo y’abakuru b’ibihugu, kuba umunyarwanda Ambasaderi Ismail Amri Sued yarabaye umunyamabanga Mukuru wawo no kuba mu Rwanda ariho hari ikigo cya OCAM gishamikiye ku Burayi cyari gishinzwe amahugurwa by’ibarurishamibare mu bukungu.
Ibibazo muri uyu muryango byatangiye mu myaka ya 1972 ariko bikomera cyane mu 1974 ubwo byatangazwaga ko Perezida Habyarimana ari we ugiye gusimbura Senghor ku buyobozi bw’uwo muryango.
Ku ikubitiro, ibihugu nka Zaire byavuyemo mu 1972, Congo Brazzaville ikurikiraho mu 1973 naho Cameroun, Tchad na Madagascar bivamo mu 1974.
Umuryango wahoranye abanyamuryango 16, wasigaye urwariza ku banyamuryango 12 nabo abenshi bashya kandi badafite imbaraga nyinshi dore ko ibihugu byinshi byari bikomeye byari bimaze kuvamo.
U Rwanda rwatorewe i Bangui, Gabon ihavana umujinya
Kuva tariki 10 kugeza 12 Kanama 1974, i Bangui muri Centrafrique habareye inama ya munani y’abakuru b’ibihugu bya OCAM.
Muri OCAM, ibihugu byari bisigaye bikomeye byari Sénégal na Côte d’Ivoire ari nabyo byafataga ahanini imyanzuro ikomeye, ibindi bikabigenderaho.
Ibyo bigaragazwa n’uko muri iyo nama ya munani, Perezida Senghor wari ucyuye igihe ku buyobozi bwa OCAM yatanze imyanzuro y’amavugurura yagombaga gutuma OCAM ikomeza kubaho, ibihugu hafi ya byose biyemeza uko yakabaye.
Muri iyo nama, ubwo Senghor yahabwaga umwanya ngo avuge ijambo rizosa manda ye, yavuze ko Umujyi wa Bangui ukwiriye kuba icyicaro gikuru cya OCAM, kikavanwa i Yaounde muri Cameroun.
Yavuze ko Maj Gen Juvenal Habyarimana ari we ukwiriye uba Perezida wa OCAM, Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa OCAM akava mu birwa bya Maurice, naho inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu bya OCAM ikajya iba buri myaka ibiri aho kuba buri mwaka.
Amwe mu mashami ya OCAM yahawe ibyicaro bishya, Gabon ntiyashyirwamo na kimwe icyakora hemezwa ko umuyobozi mukuru w’ikigo gishinzwe umutekano w’indege, (ASECNA) ava muri Gabon.
Perezida Habyarimana yahawe inkoni yo kuyobora OCAM, inama itaha ishyirwa muri Nyakanga 1976, ikabera i Kigali mu Rwanda.
Inyandiko z’icyo gihe za Ambasade ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika i Bangui nk’uko zashyizwe hanze na Wikileaks, zivuga ko Omar Bongo wayoboraga Gabon yagaragaye mu nama ababaye ndetse ngo ari mu bakuru b’ibihugu batashye inama ikirangira i Bangui.
Ibihugu nka Gabon, Bénin, Niger, Togo na Burkina Faso nabyo byatahanye umujinya ndetse biri mu byakekwaga ko bishobora kwivana muri OCAM kuko byafataga Sénégal na Côte d’Ivoire nk’ibishaka kwigira abategetsi b’umuryango kubera ko imyanzuro yose ariho yafatirwaga.
Ikindi cyababazaga bimwe muri ibyo bihugu, ni umubano wihariye wagaragaraga hagati y’u Bufaransa na Sénégal ndetse na Côte d’Ivoire.
Abandi bakuru b’ibihugu bari baje mu nama baraye i Bangui ngo bifatanye na Centrafrique kwizihiza umunsi w’ubwigenge kuwa 13 Kanama ariko abayobozi b’ibyo bihugu bitishimye bahise bitahira.
Byakomeje guhwihwiswa ko Gabon ishobora kubanziriza ibindi bihugu kuva muri OCAM ariko biranga kugeza muri Nzeri 1976, ubwo hari hasigaye amezi abiri ngo inama y’uwo muryango ibere i Kigali.
U Rwanda rwatunguwe no kumva mu binyamakuru ko Inama y’abaminisitiri ya Gabon yateranye tariki 7 Nzeri 1976, yatangaje ko icyo gihugu cyivanye muri OCAM gusa ikaguma mu mashami n’imishinga imwe n’imwe y’uwo muryango.
Byari inkuru mbi kuri uwo muryango wari umaze iminsi ucumbagira, bigakubitiraho ko Gabon yari kimwe mu bihugu bitanga umusanzu utubutse muri OCAM kandi ikaba kimwe mu bihugu byatangiranye nawo.
Impamvu zatanzwe binyuze mu binyamakuru byo muri Gabon, ni uko Bongo yashakaga gushyira imbaraga mu muryango w’ibihugu bya Afurika (OUA) yari abereye Visi Perezida anateganyijwe kuwuyobora guhera mu 1977.
Gabon kandi yabonaga OCAM nk’umuryango ushaje utajyanye n’icyerecyezo cya Afurika, ukigendera ku bitekerezo bya gikoloni byasizwe n’u Bufaransa.
Ikinyamakuru Union cyo muri Gabon cyanditse ko n’ubundi OCAM wari umuryango “wapfuye’ guhera mu 1972 ubwo ibihugu bine byawuvagamo, ko ‘nta mpamvu yo gukomeza gutuma usamba’. Cyakomeje kivuga ko Gabon “itazakomeza kuba ‘inka ikamirwa’ OCAM.
Ubwo yari mu Bufaransa muri uwo mwaka, Perezida Omar Bongo na we yavuze ko OCAM “yirangije kera yo ubwayo, kuko nta cyo ikimaze”.
Kumenya amakuru yo kwivana kwa Gabon muri OCAM hasigaye gusa amezi abiri ngo inama ibe, byababaje u Rwanda.
Inyandiko z’icyo gihe za ambasade ya Amerika i Kigali zigira ziti “u Rwanda rwarakajwe n’amakuru yo kwivana kwa Gabon muri OCAM rukabimenyera mu binyamakuru. U Rwanda rwari ruyoboye umuryango, rwahise rutangaza ko rugiye kugirana ibiganiro n’ibindi bihugu hakarebwa ingaruka uko kwivana mu muryango bizawugiraho.”
Ku ikubitiro, inama y’abakuru b’ibihugu bigize OCAM yagombaga kuba mu Ugushyingo mu 1976, yahise yigizwa inyuma, u Rwanda rushyiraho itsinda ryagombaga kujya i Libreville kwinginga Gabon ngo yisubireho ku cyemezo yafashe.
Amerika yatangaje ko u Rwanda rwasigaranye ubwoba bw’uko kugenda kwa Gabon gushobora gusenya OCAM burundu, bikagaragaza intege nke z’uwo muryango, ugapfira mu maboko ya Perezida Habyarimana wari uwuyoboye.
Tariki 30 Nzeri 1976, Habyarimana yagiye i Libreville. Ibyaranze ibiganiro bye na Perezida Omar Bongo harimo icyemezo cya Gabon cyo kwitandukanya na OCAM.
Baraganiriye birangira nta mwanzuro ufashwe, bemeranya kutemeranya kuri iyo ngingo ariko umubano w’ibihugu byombi ugakomeza. Uwo munsi hanasinywe amasezerano ane ajyanye n’ubufatanye bw’u Rwanda na Gabon.
Ku mugoroba Bongo amaze kwakira ku meza Habyarimana, yafashe ijambo, avuga ko mu byatumye bavamo harimo kuba OCAM itarahisemo Libreville nk’icyicaro gikuru cyayo.
Habyarimana yirinze kuvuga ku ngaruka zo kugenda kwa Gabon, gusa atangaza ko yubaha icyemezo cya Gabon cyo kwivana mu muryango, ariko agaragaza ko ababajwe no kuba umwe mu banyamuryango ba kera abavuyemo.
Mu bindi byavuzwe ko byavanye Gabon muri OCAM, harimo guteza imbere sosiyete yayo y’indege, Air Gabon igatandukana na Air Afrique yari ishamikiye kuri OCAM kandi isa n’iri gutera imbere cyane.
Kuva muri Nzeri 1976 kugeza mu Ugushyingo, abakuru b’ibihugu bya OCAM bane bari bamaze gusura Gabon ngo barebe ko yakwisubiraho ariko biba iby’ubusa.
Kubera ibibazo byakomeje kuzurungutana mu buyobozi bwa OCAM, imyaka ibiri u Rwanda rwagombaga kuyobora uwo muryango yavuyemo itanu.
Urugendo rwa OCAM rwarangiye mu 1985 usenyutse burundu kuko wasaga nk’umuryango utakijyanye n’igihe kandi ukomeje gutereranwa n’ibihugu byinshi ari nako havukaga imiryango mishya ihuza uturere.
Indi nenge ivugwa kuri OCAM, ni uko yari igizwe n’ibihugu bitatanye ku buryo ibyinshi byabonaga nta nyungu z’ako kanya zibihuza, bigahitamo kujya mu miryango ya hafi kandi ifite ingufu.

Title: Minisitiri Mateke wa Uganda yahishuye ko atemeranya n’amasezerano n’u Rwanda n’umugambi mushya barufiteho
Body:
Mu gihe hashize iminsi mike hatekerezwa ko umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda waba utangiye kugana mu cyerekezo kizima nyuma y’irekurwa ry’abanyarwanda icyenda bari bafungiweyo binyuranyije n’amategeko, ibintu byabaye nk’ibisubira i Rudubi ubwo Umunyamabanga wa Leta Ushinzwe ubutwererane n’akarere, Philemon Mateke, yavugaga uburyo atemera amasezerano yasinywe hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda.
Mu gihe hashize iminsi mike hatekerezwa ko umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda waba utangiye kugana mu cyerekezo kizima nyuma y’irekurwa ry’abanyarwanda icyenda bari bafungiweyo binyuranyije n’amategeko, ibintu byabaye nk’ibisubira i Rudubi ubwo Umunyamabanga wa Leta Ushinzwe ubutwererane n’akarere, Philemon Mateke, yavugaga uburyo atemera amasezerano yasinywe hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda.
Ni amasezerano yasinyiwe i Luanda muri Angola ku wa 21 Kanama 2019, agamije gushakira umuti ibibazo u Rwanda rwashinjaga icyo gihugu birimo gufunga abaturage barwo binyuranyije n’amategeko no kubakorera iyicarubozo, gushyigikira imitwe igamije kuruhungabanyiriza umutekano no kubangamira ubucuruzi bwarwo.
Mu butumwa yanditse kuri Twitter kuri uyu wa Kane, Mateke yahishuye ko kuva kera na kare atemeraga amasezerano basinyanye n’u Rwanda agamije guhosha umwuka mubi uri hagati y’ibihugu byombi, mu gihe ari umwe mu bagombaga kuba bakurikirana uko ashyirwa mu bikorwa.
Yagize ati “Naburiye bagenzi banjye ko nta cyiza kiva mu gusinyana amasezerano n’ikibi. Kugarura amahoro ntibyakunze kuri Chamberlain mu 1938, ntabwo natwe bizashoboka. Turekuye abanyabyaha babo, batwituye kurasa abaturage bacu nk’imbwa! Ni igihe cyo gusubiza kuri iyi myitwarire y’ubushotoranyi.”
I warned colleagues that nothing good comes from signing a pact with the devil. Appeasement didn't work for Chamberlain in 1938, and it won't work for us. We release their criminals, and they repay by shooting our citizens like dogs! Time to respond to this condescending behavior
— Philemon Mateke, PhD (@PhilemonMateke) January 23, 2020
Aha mu 1938 yashakaga kuvuga ku byabaye muri uwo mwaka hakorwaga inama z’inkurikirane hagati y’ibihugu by’u Bwongereza, u Bufaransa, n’u Butaliyani, bikemerera u Budage bwari buyobowe na Adolf Hitler kwiyomekaho ibice bimwe bya Czechoslovakia, mu buryo bwo kwirinda intambara.
Hitler yasabaga igice cya Sudetenland, Neville Chamberlain wari Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Bwongereza afata iya mbere aza guhura n’uwayoboraga u Bufaransa, Eduard Daladier na Benito Mussolini wayoboraga u Butaliyani, bahurira i Munich na Hitler, bemeranya ko agace ka Sudetenland komekwa k’u Budage, bataha bahamya ko habonetse amahoro. Nyuma y’amezi atanu Hitler yarenze ku byemeranyijweho agaba igitero kuri Czechoslovakia yose arayifata.
Nubwo Mateke atatoboye ngo avuge izina ry’igihugu, ibyo Mateke yavuze bihura neza n’ibibazo birimo kuba hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda.
Naho iby’abantu barashwe yavugaga bihuye n’uko kuri uyu wa Gatatu u Rwanda rwashyikirije Uganda umurambo w’umuturage wayo, Ndagijimana Theogene, warashwe n’inzego z’umutekano z’u Rwanda zamufatiye mu bikorwa bya magendu ashaka no kwinjiza ibiyobyabwenge mu gihugu, zamuhagarika akagerageza kuzirwanya.
Amagambo ya Mateke anahura n’ay’umudepite Ruth Nankabirwa, kuri uyu wa Gatatu wabwiye bagenzi be mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko ko Guverinoma ya Uganda ikwiye gukemura bwangu ikibazo ifitanye n’u Rwanda, ariko asa n’uca amarenga ku buryo bwakoreshwa.
Yagize ati “Mureke duhe amahirwe asesuye Guverinoma ya Uganda, amahirwe yo kurangiza urugendo rwo guharanira ko dusubirana umubano mwiza nk’uwo twahoranye, kuko ntabwo ushobora kwicara hano ngo utange amabwiriza ngo umupaka ufungurwe, ngo utekereze ko ayo mabwiriza azafungura umupaka.”
Perezida w’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Uganda, Rebecca Kadaga, yahise amubwira ko yizeye ko atarimo kuvuga ko bagomba guceceka ngo barindire umwanzuro wa Guverinoma n’igihe hari umuntu wabo urashwe.
Nankabirwa yakomeje ati “Ntabwo wakemura ikibazo gihari uyu munsi hatabayeho kubura ubundi buzima.”
Gusa imvugo ya Mateke yamaganywe n’umudepite wa Uganda mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’Umuryango y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Uburasirazuba, Mukasa Mbidde, wavuze ati “namaganye aya magambo ya Minisitiri niba koko iyi ariyo konti yawe y’ukuri, ndabona igitekerezo cyawe nk’ikidashinga, cyuje ubucucu, nta shingiro, ntigikwiye kandi cyuzuye amateshwa. Komeza ubibe inyigisho zawe, ariko twe Abanya-Uganda turi maso”.
I shudder at such a comment from a whole minister if this is your true handle .I find your opinion devoid of reason,idiotic,preposterous, ludicrous, farcical and complete balderdash.
Pontificate ,but we Ugandans are watchful .
— Hon Mukasa F Mbidde (@Mbidde) January 23, 2020
Mateke yashimangiye urwango rwe ku Rwanda
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga y’u Rwanda, Amb Olivier Nduhungirehe, yasubije Mateke ko ibikorwa bye ari iby’ubushobotoranyi kurushaho, ku buryo yagakwiye guceceka.
Ati “Umuntu wafatiwe mu cyuho arimo gutegura ibitero by’iterabwoba byishe abantu 14 bigakomeretsa abandi 16 mu gihugu cy’abaturanyi, akwiye guceceka akareka abadipolomate ba nyabo bagakora akazi kabo.”
Someone who was caught red-handed, while organising a deadly terror attack that killed 14 people and wounded 16 others in a neighbouring country, should have the decency to remain silent and allow real diplomats to do their job. https://t.co/mt8ikzu2j6
— Amb. Olivier J.P. Nduhungirehe (@onduhungirehe) January 23, 2020
Mu biganiro biheruka guhuza intumwa z’u Rwanda na Uganda mu Ukuboza 2019, u Rwanda rwagaragaje uburyo Mateke yari inyuma y’abarwanyi bagabye igitero i Musanze ahazwi nko mu Kinigi kigahitana abaturage 14.
Ubwo bari ku ngingo zijyanye n’uko Uganda ifasha imitwe yitwaje intwaro, Nduhungirehe yatanze urugero rw’igitero cyabaye mu ijoro rishyira ku itariki ya Kane Ukwakira aho abarwanyi b’umutwe wa RUD Urunana bateye mu Kinigi.
Mu iperereza ryakozwe, hari ibikoresho byafashwe birimo na telefoni zigendanwa n’ubuhamya bwatanzwe n’abafashwe, byagaragaje uruhare rwa Uganda muri iki gitero.
Amb. Nduhungirehe ati “Ibyo byose bigaragaza ko uwari uyoboye icyo gitero ari uwitwa Philemon Mateke akaba Umunyamabanga wa leta ya Uganda ushinzwe ubutwererane bw’akarere. Byagaragajwe na za telefoni n’ubuhamya bwatanzwe n’abafashwe.”
 “Hari n’uwitwa Nshimiye wiyita Governor ushinzwe ibikorwa byihariye muri RUD Urunana, atuye hariya mu Karere ka Kisoro n’umuryango we, byagaragaye ko akunda kujya muri Kivu y’Amajyaruguru ahitwa Benza gutegura ibitero kandi ko ariwe wakoranaga bya hafi na Philemon Mateke. Urwo ni urugero rumwe natanze ariko hari n’izindi nyinshi twatanze zigaragaza ko bagikomeza guha urubuga abaturwanya.”
Si ubwa mbere Mateke avuzwe mu bikorwa bigamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda, kuko byavuzwe ko mu Ukuboza 2018 yakoranyaga inama yahuje FDLR na RNC i Kampala, ngo bategure igikorwa gihuriweho cya gisirikare ku Rwanda nk’uko La Forge Bazeye na Theophile Abega bari bahagarariye FDLR muri iyo nama babivuze nyuma yo gufatirwa ku mupaka wa Bunagana basubiye mu birindiro muri RDC.
Dusubize amaso inyuma
Ubushotoranyi bwa Uganda ku Rwanda si ubwa vuba, ndetse mu myaka yashize havuyemo ugukozanyaho kwabereye muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo, byavuyemo intambara ya Kisangani yarangiye RPA itsinze ingabo za Uganda, ibintu byababaje Uganda ku rwego rukomeye.
Gutsindirwa i Kisangani byatumye abaturage ba Uganda n’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko bashyira igitutu ku bushobozi bwa Museveni no ku hazaza he. Muri kwa gusuzugura u Rwanda, abadepite barakariye Museveni ariko baguma no kwikoma Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, nk’uko raporo ya International Crisis Group yo mu 2000 ibigaragaza.
Icyo gihe Museveni yabonye ko uburyo bwo gucubya abaturage be ari ukwibasira RPA mu magambo atyaye. Mu ijambo ryo ku wa 30 Kanama 1999, Museveni yabaye nk’uwikura mu bibazo abyegeka ku bandi.
Ati “Icyo nabasobanurira ni uko abavandimwe bacu muri RPA batabashije gukura ngo bamenye uko ibintu bimwe na bimwe bikorwa. Bumva ko kunyura iya bugufi hano na hariya bizabageza ku ntego yabo. Ikindi maze iminsi numva ni uko RPA yashatse kwigarurira Congo ariko ko turimo kubakoma imbere.”
“Ku ruhande rwacu dushishikajwe no kongerera ubushobozi abanye-Congo ariko bigaragara ko Abanyarwanda batabyishimiye. Ariko nubwo twaba tubangamiye imigambi bafite muri Congo, ni gute bumva ko batugabaho ibitero ngo birangirire aho? Ni ukureba hafi cyane.”
Igisirikare cya Uganda nticyigeze cyakira inshuro cyakubiswe n’Abanyarwanda, aho bumvaga ko ishema n’icyubahiro byabo byahungabanyijwe, ibitangazamakuru byanzika ko UPDF yatsinzwe ndetse abasirikare bayo barenga 200 bagapfa.
Raporo ya ICG ivuga ko hahise hatangira inama z’ibanga i Kampala zikitabirwa n’abasirikare bakiri mu mirimo n’abasezerewe, ngo “bashakishe uburyo bwo kwihimura ku cyo bafataga nk’ubugambanyi bw’abari bafatanyije n’u Rwanda.”
Hari aho yagize iti “Abasirikare bakuru mu Ngabo za Uganda bavuga ko umubano n’u Rwanda utazongera na rimwe kuba nk’uko wahoze nyuma y’ibyabereye i Kisangani.”
Nyuma y’imyaka myinshi, Uganda ikomeje gushotora u Rwanda aho yakunze gufunga abaturage barwo ibashinja ubutasi, ibintu itigeze igaragariza ibimenyetso ishingiraho, ndetse nta n’abagejejwe mu rukiko ngo ibyaha bibahame, ariko bagiye bakorerwa iyicarubozo rikomeye, bamwe bakarekurwa baragizwe intere, bamwe bibaviramo ubumuga abandi babira ubuzima.
Inkuru wasoma:Uruhare rwa Minisitiri Mateke wa Uganda mu gitero cyagabwe mu Kinigi
Raporo yo mu 2000: Uko impuguke zasesenguye ishwanyagurika ry’umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda

Title: Bigenda bite iyo umudepite ageze mu Nteko ntatange ibitekerezo?
Body:
Iyo havuzwe Umudepite nta kindi cyumvikana mu matwi ya benshi, uretse uwo umuturage aba yaritoreye ngo amuhagararire mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko atanga ibitekerezo by’impinduka zikenewe, ni nayo mpamvu babita intumwa za rubanda.
Iyo havuzwe Umudepite nta kindi cyumvikana mu matwi ya benshi, uretse uwo umuturage aba yaritoreye ngo amuhagararire mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko atanga ibitekerezo by’impinduka zikenewe, ni nayo mpamvu babita intumwa za rubanda.
Mu nshingano z’intumwa za rubanda harimo gutora amategeko abareye abaturage, kugenzura ibikorwa bya guverinoma, kwemeza abayobozi runaka, hari n’ibihugu baba bafite inshingano zo gutora abakuru b’igihugu.
Nubwo baba baratowe n’abaturage ngo babahagararire, mu bihugu bimwe birimo n’u Rwanda, usanga hari abaturage bavuga ko baheruka babatora ntibazongere kubaca iryera cyangwa bagatora amategeko atabanogeye.
Tariki 19 Nzeri 2018 ubwo yakiraga indahiro z’Abadepite, Perezida Paul Kagame, yavuze ko bagomba kujya begera abaturage, bakabikora nk’uko babigenza iyo babashakamo amajwi.
Ati “Igihe mwese mwamaze mwiyamamaza hirya no hino mu gihugu, mwabonanye n’Abanyarwanda, uko mwabagezeho mubashakaho amajwi ariko bizakomeza kubageraho mubasanga, mufatanya gukemura ibibazo bafite.”
Mu nteko habamo imirimo myinshi irimo kwiga imishinga y’amategeko, kuyisuzuma, kuyitangaho ibitekerezo n’ibindi.
Akenshi abaturage bamenya ubushobozi bw’umudepite batoye bitewe n’uburyo abavuganira, ibitekerezo atanga ku ngingo zitandukanye zizanwa mu Nteko, kubasura n’ibindi.
Hari ibihugu umudepite ugeze mu nteko ntiyongere kumvikana ku ngingo zibangamiye abaturage agaragazwa, byaba na ngombwa akaba yahagarikwa.
Nko mu 2018 muri Kenya, ikinyamakuru The Standard cyasohoye urutonde rw’abadepite batajya bavuga mu Nteko.
Havugwaga ko hari Abadepite bicara mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, ntibabe batekereza umushinga wafasha abaturage ahubwo icyo bakora, bikaba gusa gushyigikira imishinga yavuzwe n’abandi.
Iki kibazo cyazamuwe na bamwe mu badepite muri iki gihugu, batangiye bijujuta bavuga ko hari bagenzi babo bahitagamo kwisohokera, mu gihe abandi babaga bageze ku ngingo zikomeye zo gutorerwamo amategeko.
Depite Justin Bedan Njoka Muturi yabwiye abanyamakuru ati “Ntabwo nishimye kuko hari abadepite bagenzi bacu usanga birirwa bavuga ko bishimira ibyo bagezeho mu nteko, mu gihe mu by’ukuri ntacyo bigeze bakora.”
Yavuze ko hari bamwe usanga batagaragara mu gihe barimo gushaka gushyiraho itegeko runaka, nyamara nyuma ryajya gutorwa ugasanga batangiye kwijujuta kandi batarigeze bagaragara mbere ngo baritangeho ibitekerezo.
Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Kenya yavuze ko 70% by’abayigize wasangaga nta jambo bafata ngo batange ibitekerezo, bamwe muri bakaba baravugaga ko babiterwa n’uko babaga bakiri bashya mu nshingano.
Mu Rwanda bihagaze gute?
Kugeza ubu Inteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda igizwe n’Imitwe ibiri, Umutwe w’Abadepite na Sena.
Kuva tariki 19 Nzeri 2018 umutwe w’abadepite wabonye abadepite bashya 80 bari muri manda izageza mu 2023, naho kuva mu Ukwakira 2019 hatowe abasenateri, kugeza ubu bose hamwe ni 26.
Nubwo bitoroshye kumenya imikorere ya buri mudepite, iyo uganiriye na bamwe muri aba bakubwira ko nubwo hari bamwe batavuga, ngo ni uburenganzira bwabo cyane ko nta tegeko rihari ribategeka kuvuga.
Depite, Dr Frank Habineza, usanzwe ari n’Umuyobozi w’Ishyaka Riharanira Demokarasi no kurengera ibidukikije (DGPR), yabwiye IGIHE ati “Abadepite bose bafite uburenganzira bungana imbere y’amategeko, nta mudepite kandi ubuzwa kugira igitekerezo atanga, buri wese afite uburenganzira bw’iminota ingana, burya umuntu kutavuga ni umutimanama we.”
Dr Habineza avuga ko ubwabo nk’abadepite badashobora kwicara ngo banenge umudepite runaka utajya utanga ibitekerezo, keretse wenda bikorewe mu mutwe wa politike aturukamo.
Ati “Ibyo byakorwa n’amashyaka kuko buri shyaka rigira umuhwituzi. Nk’ubu twe nubwo turi babiri mu nteko ariko dufite umuhwituzi ari we njye, ubu mfite uburenganzira bwo gukurikirana umudepite wo mu ishyaka ryanjye iyo nta gitekerezo atanga cyangwa ntacyo avuga, ndamubaza nti ese wowe ko mbona utavuga wabaye iki? n’ahandi ubwo ni uko babikora.”
Dr Habineza avuga ko ku giti cye intego yajyanye mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko, ni uko buri gihe aba yiteguye kugira icyo yavuga gifasha umuturage.
 Ati “Nta tegeko ryacaho ntarivuzeho kandi na mugenzi wanjye uba muri PAC agomba kureba uko amafaranga akoreshwa neza.”
Kuva mu 2008, Depite Nyirahirwa Veneranda ari mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda. Yabwiye IGIHE ko abantu bashobora kwibeshya ko hari abadepite batavuga kandi iyo bari muri komisiyo batanga ibitekerezo.
Ati “Burya hari ibintu abantu batazi, mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko akazi gakorwa mu byiciro bitandukanye, hari imirimo ikorerwa muri komisiyo abadepite bakajya impaka ku mategeko, nyuma akazashyikirizwa inteko rusange, aha ni naho abaturage bose baba babyumva kuri radiyo.”
“Hari abantu benshi usanga bazi ko dutangira akazi saa cyenda mu gihe harimo inteko rusange ariko siko biri. Tuba twatangiriye muri komisiyo saa tatu ikageza saa sita, nyuma saa cyenda tukajya mu nteko rusange.”
Nyirahirwa yavuze ko muri ayo matsinda, hari abantu usanga batanga ibitekerezo, ntibabitange mu nteko rusange.
Ati “Hari abadepite usanga bavuga cyane mu mirimo ya komisiyo, mu nteko rusange burya hageramo ibyasuzumiwe muri za komisiyo ugasanga mu nteko rusange ntavuze, ariko hari n’abandi bavuga hose.”
Icyakora, yemeza ko hashobora kuba n’utatanga ibitekerezo aho hombi kuko iyo bageze mu nteko, nta muntu babwira ngo azagende avuge cyane.
Ati “Nta muntu uza kuguha amabwiriza ngo vuga, wanamara rwose imyaka itanu utavuze kandi nta wazabikubaza.”
Depite, Sheikh Harerimana Musa Fazil, Visi Perezida ushinzwe Imari n’Abakozi mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda umutwe w’abadepite, yabwiye IGIHE ko kugeza ubu nta tegeko rihana umudepite utatanze ibitekerezo, bityo ko utabikoze nta tegeko aba yishe.
Agira ati “Nta cyaha gihari iyo utavuze kuko inteko ikorera mu mategeko, iyaba hari itegeko rivuga ngo niba utavuze umwaka wose bigenda gutya, icyo gihe twaryubahiriza ariko noneho ubwo nta tegeko rihari, ubwo nabyo biremewe, ikitabujijwe n’amategeko kiba cyemewe.”
Yavuze ko gahunda nyinshi mu nteko zibera muri za komisiyo, ku buryo hari abadepite benshi baba baratanze ibitekerezo, byagera mu nteko rusange akumva nta mpamvu yo kongera kuvuga.
Sheikh Harerimana yavuze ko bari kwiga ku buryo n’ibiganiro byabeye muri za Komisiyo byajya bica kuri radiyo kugira ngo abaturage babashe gukurikirana ibikorwa by’Inteko n’imikorere y’abadepite batoye.
Ati “ Twamaze kuganira n’ubuyobozi bwa RBA ngo turebe ukuntu n’impaka zabereye muri Komisiyo, rimwe na rimwe zajya zinyura kuri radiyo Rwanda Inteko, ibyo turimo kubiganira bizadutwara amafaranga kandi ntaraboneka ariko niwo murongo dushaka kuzakoreramo.”
Muri Uganda mu 2016 hasohotse urutonde rw’abadepite batajya bagaragara mu batanga ibitekerezo ku ngingo zireba abaturage, nyamara ari bo bahagarariye.
Mu badepite 427 bagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Uganda, 82 ngo nta jambo na rimwe bari bakavuze, 51 bari baravuze ijambo rimwe.
Mu 2011, mu Bwongereza ibinyamakuru byasohoye urutonde rw’abadepite b’abanebwe. Icyo gihe bashingiraga ku mubare w’inama abadepite bakoranaga n’abaturage bo mu duce bahagarariye.
Baje gusanga Depite Sir Stuart Bell, yari amaze imyaka 14 mu Nteko, nta na rimwe arajya kugirana ibiganiro n’abaturage bamutoye ngo yumve ibibazo byabo.
Sir Stuart Bell yaje kwitaba Imana mu 2012 afite imyaka 74.

Title: Baringa ku cyiswe ‘‘balkanisation’’ y’u Rwanda kuri RDC
Body:
Ijambo ‘‘balkanisation’’ rimaze kuba intero n’inyikirizo mu mvugo y’abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, kuva Perezida Félix Tshisekedi yatorerwa kuyobora iki gihugu.
Ijambo ‘‘balkanisation’’ rimaze kuba intero n’inyikirizo mu mvugo y’abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, kuva Perezida Félix Tshisekedi yatorerwa kuyobora iki gihugu.
Aba batifuza ko amahoro agaruka muri RDC, bakomeje guhimba ikinyoma ko u Rwanda rushaka kwigarura Uburasirazuba bwayo, bagamije kubiba urwango ku Banyarwanda n’Abanye-Congo bavuga Ikinyarwanda.
Ibivugwa bisa no kureba filimi mbarankuru y’intambara zabaye mu kinyejana cya 20 mu Burayi bw’Amajyepfo, mu gace kiswe ‘les Balkans’, ubu kigizwe n’ibihugu nka Bulgarie, Croatie, u Bugiriki, Roumanie, Slovénie, Albanie, Bosnie-Herzégovine, Kosovo, Macédoine y’Amajyaruguru, Monténégro, Serbie na Turquie; byari byarigaruriwe n’Ubwami bw’Abami bwa Ottoman, bukabiremamo uduhugu twinshi.
Igitandukanye muri uyu mwaka wa 2020, ni uko ibi bivugirwa mu mihanda ya Kinshasa, aho ababiyoboye badakomoka muri Hongrie cyangwa Turikiya, bahora baririmba bati ‘‘balkanisation ntikabe kuri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.’’
Mu Karere k’Ibiyaga Bigari, ijambo ‘balkanisation’ ryatangiye kuhumvikana mu mpera y’imyaka ya 1990, ubwo u Rwanda na Uganda byateraga icyahoze cyitwa Zaïre. Abazayirwa bari bafite ubwoba ko abaturanyi babo babiri bagiye kwisubiza ibice bahoranye mbere y’uko Abanyaburayi bigabagabanya Afurika, ariko ntibyigeze biba.
Iyi mitekerereze yongeye kumvikana nyuma y’aho Joseph Kabila agiriye ku butegetsi mu 2001. Abamurwanya bavugaga ko afite inkomoko mu Rwanda kandi akaba afite uruhare mu mugambi mpuzamahanga wo gucamo ibice RDC, ibice byayo by’Uburasirazuba bikize ku mabuye y’agaciro bikomekwa ku Rwanda.
Kujya ku butegetsi kwa Félix Tshisekedi bigaragara ko ntacyo byahinduye. Ubu iyo ntero n’inyikirizo biri kuzamurwa n’Ihuriro ry’Amashyaka atavuga rumwe n’Ubutegetsi ya Lamuka ririmo na Martin Fayulu watsinzwe mu matora y’umukuru w’igihugu aheruka. Ibyavuye mu matora yari ahanganiyemo na Félix Tshisekedi byagaragaje ko yabaye uwa kabiri ariko Inama nkuru ya Kiliziya Gatolika muri RDC yo yavuze ko ariwe watsinze. Yaba Lamuka na Kiliziya ntibigeze bemera ko Fayulu yatsinzwe.
Kubiba urwango
 Ku ruhande rwe nka Perezida watowe, Félix Tshisekedi, yahisemo kuzahura umubano w’igihugu cye n’u Rwanda, mbere yo kohereza umubare w’ingabo za Congo mu Burasirazuba bw’igihugu ngo zijye kurwanya imitwe yitwaje intwaro yahagize akarima kayo.
Ubu Ingabo za Congo (FARDC) zimaze kwigarurira ibice byinshi byari byarayogojwe n’iyo mitwe; ku buryo n’iyo gahunda yo kwigarurira ibice bya RDC iyo iza kuba ihari, icyizere cyayo ubu kiri kubarirwa ku busa.
Abarwanya ubutegetsi mu RDC bahisemo kubiba urwango ku Banyarwanda n’Abanye-Congo bavuga Ikinyarwanda kugira ngo bace intege umubano mwiza uri kubagarirwa hagati y’u Rwanda na RDC.
Ariko n’ubundi abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi nta nyungu bafite mu kuba amahoro yagaruka muri RDC. Mu myaka 25 ishize, ikibazo cy’umutekano muke mu Burasirazuba bwa RDC cyafashije abari abami b’intambara kwigwizaho imitungo no kwinjira mu bikorwa bya politiki cyangwa igisirikare.
Urugero rwa hafi ni umutwe wa ADF-Nalu ukomoka muri Uganda, wigize nka ba kavukire, ukaba uterwa inkunga n’uwahoze ari umunyapolitiki ku butegetsi bwa Kabila, Mbusa Nyamwisi, ubu wituriye muri Uganda.
Uyu Mbusa Nyamwisi yanahoze ari mu ihuriro Lamuka, nyuma aza kwitandukanya naryo.
Mu gihe RDC iri kugerageza kwivana mu ntambara imaze imyaka irenga 20, cyane cyane hashingiwe ku mibanire myiza n’abaturanyi bo mu Burasirazuba, abarwanya ubutegetsi bakomeje kubiba urwango ku Banyarwanda, ariko si n’Abanyarwanda, ahubwo ni abo bita ko bakomoka mu bwoko bw’Abatutsi n’Abanye-Congo bavuga Ikinyarwanda mu rwego rwo guca intege umubano mwiza hagati y’u Rwanda na RDC.
Ikinyoma
Igitangaje ni uko imvugo ya ‘‘balkanisation’’ ari ikirego kidafite ishingiro. Mu gihe Umuhuzabikorwa w’Ihuriro ry’abatavuga rumwe n’Ubutegetsi, Lamuka, wanahoze ari Minisitiri w’Intebe, Adolphe Muzito, yagaragaje mu buryo bweruye ko ashaka gutera u Rwanda byanashoboka bakarwomeka kuri RDC; uyu ni na we ushinja u Rwanda kugambirira kwigarurira ibice by’igihugu cye.
Nubwo bashinje Joseph Kabila gufatanya n’u Rwanda muri uwo mugambi akiri ku butegetsi, ubu bakaba bageze kuri Félix Tshisekedi, ubwabo bigeze gukorana n’u Rwanda mu bihe byatambutse. Ibi bigaragaza ikinyoma gikomeye kandi cyumvikana.
Byongeye kandi muri gahunda y’ubuhahirane busesuye mu Muryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe n’ubusabe bwa RDC bwo kwinjira mu Muryango wa Afurika y’Uburasirazuba (EAC), bigaragara ko kwigarurira ubutaka bw’ikindi gihugu byaba ari amafuti.
Aho gutanga ibisubizo by’ibibazo nyabyo Abanye-Congo bafite ubu nk’ubushomeri, kutagira inganda zihagije no kwangiza ibikorwa remezo, kwangirika kw’ibikorwaremezo n’ibindi bishobora gusunikira urubyiruko rudafite akazi kwishora mu byaha cyangwa kwinjira mu mitwe yitwaje intwaro, […] abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi muri RD Congo bahisemo gushyushya imitwe y’abaturage babo bakoresheje imitekerereze ishaje.
Gukoma mu nkokora u Rwanda cyangwa ikindi gihugu cyo mu Karere ntibyongera umusaruro; ntibirema imirimo kandi ntibinazana ubukungu.
 Abavuga ‘‘balkanisation’’ ntibigeze bakandagiza ikirenge ku mupaka uhuza u Rwanda na RDC, umwe mu inyurwaho na benshi ku Isi; ntibigeze byibura banumva ubuhamya bw’abagore bahakorera ubucuruzi, bahambukira inshuro nyinshi ku munsi bashaka imibereho.
Ubukungu nyabwo bwa RDC ni abaturage bayo. Muri Afurika yose, umutungo kamere ubyarira inyungu ibigo mpuzamahanga biwubyaza umusaruro n’abayobozi bamwe na bamwe bahabwa utuvungukira n’icyizere cyo kubarindira ubutegetsi bwabo.
Ku ngoma ya Félix Tshisekedi, RDC ifite amahirwe yo guhinduka igihugu kirimo amahoro kandi gitera imbere; ariko kugira ngo ibyo bigerweho birasaba ko bigirwamo uruhare n’impande zitandukanye zigize ubukungu nyabwo bwa RDC.
Gushaka kwihorera ku Rwanda barugira umwanzi bahuriyeho ni igitekerezo gifutamye cyabafasha kwihuza ariko ntibirambe.
Iyi nkuru yanyuze mu kinyamakuru Jeuneafrique, ni ibitekerezo bwite by’umwanditsi Gatete Nyiringabo, umunyamategeko akaba n’inzobere mu burenganzira bwa muntu.

Title: RDC: Umudepite yasubije Muzito wasabye ko u Rwanda rwomekwa kuri Congo ngo ibone amahoro
Body:
Umudepite akaba n’Umuyobozi w’ishyaka Envol muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Delly Sesanga, yamaganye igitekerezo cy’umunyapolitiki Adolphe Muzito uherutse gusaba ko igihugu cye gitera u Rwanda rukomekwa kuri RDC kugira ngo amahoro aboneke mu Burasirazuba.
Umudepite akaba n’Umuyobozi w’ishyaka Envol muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Delly Sesanga, yamaganye igitekerezo cy’umunyapolitiki Adolphe Muzito uherutse gusaba ko igihugu cye gitera u Rwanda rukomekwa kuri RDC kugira ngo amahoro aboneke mu Burasirazuba.
Amagambo ya Muzito uvugira ihuriro ry’amashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta, Lamuka, ku ikubitiro yamaganiwe kure na bamwe mu bayobozi bakomeye muri iryo huriro barimo Moise Katumbi na Jean Pierre Bemba.
Kuri uyu wa Gatandatu ubwo yari yahuye n’abarwanashyaka b’ishaka rye bifurizanya umwaka mushya, Delly Sesanga, yabajijwe niba na we abona amahoro mu Burasirazuba bwa Congo azaturuka mu gutera u Rwanda bakarwiyomekaho.
Umuyobozi wa Envol akaba n’Umudepite mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko ya Congo, Sesanga yamaganye amagambo ya Muzito, avuga ko amahoro ya Congo azaturuka imbere muri Congo.
Yagize ati “Intambara sicyo gisubizo. Iyi ntambara ahubwo yakarwanywe hagamijwe kuzana ubumwe imbere mu gihugu, gukuraho imikorere mibi y’ubuyobozi, ruswa, ikimenyane byazangereje leta bikanagira ingaruka ku nzego z’umutekano.”
Sesanga yavuze ko igisirikare cya Congo kitabuze imbaraga zo gutsinda intambara ziri mu Burasirazuba nk’uko bamwe babikega, ahubwo ngo ni imikorere mibi.
Ati “Abanye-Congo bazi kurwana, barabyerakanye mu Ntambara ya Mbere n’iya Kabiri z’isi yose.”
Yavuze ko imbaraga nyinshi zikwiriye gushyirwa mu kurwanya ibibazo byugarije igihugu biri imbere kurusha kwitwaza ibyo hanze, nk’uko ikinyamakuru Politico cyabitangaje.
Mbere yo kuba umudepite, Sesanga yakoze mu myanya itandukanye muri Congo harimo no kuba Minisitiri w’igenamigambi.
Musenyeri wa Kinshasa, Fridolin Ambongo, na we aherutse kuvuga ko ibihugu bituranye na Congo birimo u Rwanda bifite umugambi wo gucamo ibice igihugu cye bikakiyomekaho.
Ni amagambo yamaganiwe kure haba muri Leta ya Congo ndetse n’abandi bakurikiranira politiki y’akarere hafi.
Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Vincent Biruta, aherutse kuvuga ko imvugo z’abanyapolitiki bamwe bo muri RDC ku Rwanda zibabaje kuko ahanini n’ibyo bavuga ari ibintu biba bidafite inshingiro.
Ati “Ni ibintu bibabaje, wakwiteguye ko ibyo bavuga biba bifite icyo bafite gifatika ariko nta gihari. Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere bene ibi bibazo bibaho, hashize igihe hari abanyapolitiki bo muri RDC bumva ko kugira ngo abaturage babo babemere ari uko bavuga nabi u Rwanda.”
Dr Biruta yavuze ko nta mugambi uhari wo komeka ibice bya Congo ku Rwanda kandi nta n’uzigera ubaho.
U Rwanda na RDC bifitanye umubano mwiza cyane cyane nyuma y’aho Félix Tshisekedi atorewe kuyobora icyo gihugu, akavuga ko arajwe ishinga no kubana neza n’ibihugu by’ibituranyi.

Title: Bumva ko kugira ngo babemere bavuga nabi u Rwanda – Biruta avuga kuri Muzito
Body:
Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Vincent Biruta, yavuze ko imvugo y’abanyapolitiki na bamwe mu basenyeri muri Kiliziya Gatolika muri RDC, bifuza ko batera u Rwanda rukanomekwa ku gihugu cyabo; bibabaje kuko ari uburyo bwo gushaka kugaragaza ko ibibazo igihugu cyabo gifite bituruka ku muturanyi.
Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Vincent Biruta, yavuze ko imvugo y’abanyapolitiki na bamwe mu basenyeri muri Kiliziya Gatolika muri RDC, bifuza ko batera u Rwanda rukanomekwa ku gihugu cyabo; bibabaje kuko ari uburyo bwo gushaka kugaragaza ko ibibazo igihugu cyabo gifite bituruka ku muturanyi.
Byagarutsweho mu kiganiro cya mbere Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Vincent Biruta, yagiranye n’itangazamakuru kuva mu Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo yajyaga kuri uyu mwanya.
Ni ikiganiro cyagarutse ku ngingo zitandukanye zigaruka ku mubano w’u Rwanda n’ibihugu byo mu karere ndetse hagaragazwa n’ibyakozwe mu mwaka ushize.
Minisitiri Biruta yabajijwe ku mvugo y’abanyapolitiki bo muri RDC ko igihugu cyabo kidashobora kubona amahoro “tudateye u Rwanda, byaba ngombwa tukarufata.”
Byavuzwe na Adolphe Muzito wigeze kuba Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC) ubu akaba ari Umuhuzabikorwa w’Impuzamashyaka itavuga rumwe na Leta muri icyo gihugu yitwa Lamuka.
Ni imvugo yakongeje uburakari mu banyarwanda batandukanye ndetse abandi bayobozi ba Lamuka barimo Jean Pierre Bemba na Moïse Katumbi, bitandukanya na we ku ku ikubitiro, banamusaba kwisubiraho ku ijambo yavuze.
Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr Vincent Biruta, yavuze ko imvugo z’abanyapolitiki bamwe bo muri RDC ku Rwanda zibabaje kuko ahanini n’ibyo bavuga ari ibintu biba bidafite inshingiro.
Ati “Ni ibintu bibabaje, wakwiteguye ko ibyo bavuga biba bifite icyo bafite gifatika ariko nta gihari. Ntabwo ari ubwa mbere bene ibi bibazo bibaho, hashize igihe hari abanyapolitiki bo muri RDC bumva ko kugira ngo abaturage babo babemere ari uko bavuga nabi u Rwanda.”
Biruta yavuze ko ibyavuzwe n’aba banyapolitiki ndetse na bamwe mu bo muri Kiliziya Gatolika bidashobora guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda na RDC.
Yavuze ko ubu RwandAir yatangiye gukora ingendo muri RDC, ko ndetse ingabo z’iki gihugu ziri mu bikorwa byo guhashya imitwe igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda ibarizwa mu Burasirazuba bw’igihugu.
Ati “Bavuge ibyo babonye, biriya ntabwo bizabura kandi n’igihe kizerekana ko ntaho byari bishingiye.”
Minisitiri Dr Biruta yashimye uruhare rw’ubuyobozi bwa RDC mu guhashya imitwe yitwaje intwaro ibarizwa mu Burasirazuba bwa RDC irimo na bamwe mu bagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Yavuze ko u Rwanda rumaze kwakira abantu 1919 bari mu mashyamba ya Congo aho ingabo za RDC zagabye ibitero ku mitwe yitwaje intwaro. Abo batahutse hacumbikiwe mu nkambi ya Nyarushishi.
Abarwanyi 562 nabo bagaruwe mu Rwanda, aho ubu bari kwigishwa kugira ngo babe basubira mu buzima busanzwe.
Ati “Ingabo za RDC zakoze ibikorwa byiza, zishe benshi muri abo harimo n’abayobozi b’utwo dutsiko.”
U Rwanda na RDC bifitanye umubano mwiza cyane cyane nyuma y’aho Felix Tshisekedi atorewe kuyobora icyo gihugu, akavuga ko arajwe ishinga no kubana neza n’ibihugu by’ibituranyi.

Title: 2020, ihurizo ku ireme rya demokarasi ya Afurika y’Iburasizuba kubera amatora ateganyijwe
Body:
Muri uyu mwaka, ibihugu bine byo muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba birateganya kuzagira amatora. Ibyo birimo Somalia, Tanzania, Ethiopia n’u Burundi. Ni amatora arimo ay’abakuru b’ibihugu n’ay’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yombi azashyira ku munzani ireme rya demokarasi muri ako gace.
Muri uyu mwaka, ibihugu bine byo muri Afurika y’Iburasirazuba birateganya kuzagira amatora. Ibyo birimo Somalia, Tanzania, Ethiopia n’u Burundi. Ni amatora arimo ay’abakuru b’ibihugu n’ay’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko yombi azashyira ku munzani ireme rya demokarasi muri ako gace.
Tanzania
Ni igihugu cyakunze kurangwa no guhererekanya ubutegetsi mu mahoro guhera igihe cyaboneye ubwigenge. Ishyaka riri ku butegetsi Chama Cha Mapinduzi riracyahabwa amahirwe yo kugumana ubutegetsi.
Mu gihe hitegurwa amatora rusange azaba mu Ukwakira 2020, abatavuga rumwe na Leta n’imiryango itegamiye kuri Leta bafite impungenge ko Guverinoma ya Perezida John Pombe Magufuli ishobora kubangamira ubwisanzure bwo gutanga ibitekerezo.
The East African yatangaje ko kuri ubu Guverinoma yakuyeho ibikorwa by’abatavuga rumwe na Leta, bivuze ko nta bikorwa byo gukoresha inama bishoboka mu mashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta. Hari abantu bafunzwe, abanyamakuru bamwe baburirwa irengero abandi barafungwa nk’urugero rw’umunyamakuru Eric Kabendera cyangwa Paul Magotti wari impirimbanyi y’uburenganzira bwa muntu.
Uko kubangamira abatavuga rumwe na Leta kwatumye amashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta yanga kwitabira amatora y’inzego z’ibanze yabaye mu Ugushyingo umwaka ushize, bituma ishyaka CCM riyatsinda ku kigero cya 99%.
Umunyapolitiki utavuga rumwe na Leta, Tundu Lissu aherutse kuvuga ko guhagarika ibikorwa y’abatavuga rumwe na Leta, ari ikimenyetso ko amatora ya 2020 atazaba mu mucyo.
Perezida Magufuli yatowe mu 2015 afite intego yo kurwanya ruswa. Nubwo yatangije intambara ku baryi ba ruswa, ashinjwa kubangamira demokarasi mu gihugu, gupfukirana amajwi y’abamunenga no kubibasira.
U Burundi
Amatora atenganyijwe muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, mu gihe hakiri urujijo niba Perezida Pierre Nkurunziza azongera kwiyamamaza nyuma ya manda ya gatatu yafashe mu 2015 igateza imvururu.
Ikindi gihangayikishije ni ukumenya niba Guverinoma ye ifite ubushobozi bwo gutegura amatora anyuze mu mucyo, kuko imiryango n’ibihugu byinshi byateraga inkunga icyo gihugu, byarayihagaritse bishinja Nkurunziza guteza akaduruvayo mu gihugu.
Nubwo Nkurunziza yatangaje ko atazongera kwiyamamaza, ababirebera hafi bavuga ko ashobora kwisubiraho cyangwa agashyiraho umuntu azajya atagekeramo.
Nta kimenyetso cyerekana ko Nkurunziza agiye kuva muri politiki y’u Burundi mu gihe muri Gashyantare umwaka ushize, yimuye ibiro bya Perezida akabijyana mu Mujyi wa Gitega ari naho avuka.
Raporo y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye yo muri Nzeri 2019, igaragaza ko nta cyizere cy’imigendekere myiza y’amatora mu Burundi mu 2020, mu gihe hakiri Perezida wigaragaza nk’igitangaza’.
Loni ivuga ko ari Perezida wigwijeho ububasha bwose we n’ishyaka rye CNDD FDD, n’ibyaha bishinjwa urubyiruko rw’ishyaka rye ruzwi nk’Imbonerakure rushinjwa guhutaza uburenganzira bw’abaturage n’abatavuga rumwe na Leta.
Icyakora Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Burundi, Ezechiel Nibigira, aherutse kubwira Inteko rusange ya Loni, ko mu gihugu hari umwuka mwiza uzatuma amatora agenda neza.
Somalia
Amatora yo muri Somalia ni ingenzi cyane ku mutekano w’akarere. Iki ni igihugu kimaze igihe mu mvururu. Hashize imyaka 50 Perezida atorwa n’itsinda ry’abantu bake baba batoranyijwe, kubera ubwoba bw’uko hateguwe amatora rusange abaturage bakitabira, bishobora guteza imvururu n’umutekano muke.
Mu matora ya 2009, aya 2012 na 2017 hose abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko na Perezida bagiye batorwa n’abantu 14 000 babaga batoranyijwe ngo bahagararire ubwoko buba muri icyo gihugu.
N’uyu munsi haracyari impungenge niba amatora yo muri Somalia koko azaba dore ko aya Perezida aherutse yabereye muri parikingi y’ikibuga cy’indege.
Ikibazo cy’umutwe w’iterabwoba wa al Shabaab ndetse no kuba abatavuga rumwe na Leta baherutse gushinja Perezida Mohamed Abdullahi Farmaajo gushaka kuguma ku butegetsi biteye impungenge ku mutekano w’amatora ateganyijwe.
Guverinoma yatangaje ko yiteguye gukoresha amatora agaca mu mucyo kandi buri muturage wemerewe gutora agatora. Guverinoma yanavuze ko vuba aha izageza ku Nteko Ishinga Amatora umushinga w’amatora kugira ngo wemezwe.
Icyakora, iki gihugu cyiracyafite ikibazo cyo kuvugurura Itegeko Nshinga. Nubwo itsinda ryahawe kurivugurura ryagejeje ku Nteko umushinga w’itegeko, haracyari imbogamizi.
Iya mbere ni uko nta matora ya kamarampaka ashobora kuba hatarakemuka ikibazo cy’agace ka Somaliland kifata nk’igihugu ukwacyo mu gihe Somalia igafata nk’agace kayo.
Mu bindi kandi ivugurura ry’itegeko Nshinga rigomba kureba harimo aho umurwa mukuru ukwiriye kuba, uburyo ubuyobozi bwa za Leta zigize icyo gihugu bukorana na Leta nkuru n’ibindi.
Mu gihe ivugurura ry’itegeko Nshinga ritaraba, n’tegeko rigenga amatora ntirizashoboka kuko abantu ntibashobora gutangira kwiyandikisha hataraboneka itegeko rigenga amatora kandi naryo rigomba kugenwa n’Itegeko Nshinga.
Indi mbogamizi ni umutekano muke. Igice kinini cy’igihugu kiracyari mu maboko y’umutwe wa al Shabaab, bivuze ko aho hantu al shabaab ifite amatora atazashoboka. No mu murwa mukuru Mogadishu naho umutekano waho ntiwizewe.
Ibyo bigaragazwa n’uko tariki 28 Ukuboza 2019, imodoka itezemo igisasu yaturikiye aho abantu basakirwa mu murwa mukuru kigahitana abantu 78.
Perezida Farmaajo yavuze ko icyo gitero ari icy’iterabwoba kandi kitazihanganirwa, icyakora abatavuga rumwe na we bamushinja kubembekereza al shabaab kuko uduce Leta yigaruriye guhera mu 2017 ubwo Farmaajo yajyaga ku butegetsi ari duke.
Ethiopia
Amatora ateganyijwe muri Gicurasi 2020, ni aya mbere azaba abaye guhera Minisitiri w’Intebe wahawe n’igihembo cyitiriwe Nobel, Dr Abiy Ahmed agiye ku butegetsi.
Umwanzuro aherutse gufata wo gusesa amashyaka yose yari agize Ihuriro EPRDF (Ethiopian People’s Revolutionary Democratic Front), agashinga ishyaka rya PP watumye havuka impungenge n’umwuka mubi mu gihugu.
Hari abadashyigikiye iryo shyaka PP kuko risa nk’irije guhanagura umuco n’umuhate bashyizeho bubaka amashyaka yabo mu myaka 30 ishize. Abatabyumva cyane ni abo mu mashyaka nka Tigray Peoples Liberation Front (TPLF), n’igice cy’ishyaka Oromo Peoples Democratic Organisation (OPDO) ari naryo Abiy aturukamo, rishobora no kumurwanya agatsindwa.
Amavugurura yakozwe na Dr Abiy yazanye umucyo muri Ethiopia yahoze ifatwa nk’igihugu kibangamira uburenganzira bwa muntu ariko byanateje imvururu zishingiye ku turere zitewe n’abandi bantu bakomeye bafite inyota y’ubutegetsi.
Guhera mu 1995, Ethiopia yagiye ikora amatora mu gihe cyagenwe. Icyakora, uretse mu 2005, nta na rimwe higeze habaho amatora arimo guhangana kugaragara nkuko The East African yabitangaje.

Title: Nta cyahindutse ku muburo wahawe Abanyarwanda ku kujya muri Uganda – Min. Nduhungirehe
Body:
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, yanyomoje amakuru yakwirakwijwe ko u Rwanda rwafunguriye amarembo abaturage barwo bashaka kujye muri Uganda, ashimangira ko nta cyahindutse ku muburo rwabahaye ku kaga bashobora kugirira muri icyo gihugu.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, yanyomoje amakuru yakwirakwijwe ko u Rwanda rwafunguriye amarembo abaturage barwo bashaka kujye muri Uganda, ashimangira ko nta cyahindutse ku muburo rwabahaye ku kaga bashobora kugirira muri icyo gihugu.
Ibi Nduhungirehe yabitangaje kuri uyu wa 3 Mutarama 2020 yifashishije Twitter, avuguruza inkuru yatangajwe n’ikinyamakuru Chimp Reports cyo muri Uganda cyanditse ko ‘U Rwanda rworoheje uburyo bwo kunyura ku mupaka bajya muri Uganda’.
Ati “Iki ni ikindi gihuha cya @Gilespies n’ikinyamakuru cye [sinshobora no kubibara byose]. Umuburo u Rwanda rwahaye abaturage barwo bifuza kujya muri Uganda ntiwahindutse. Nta kintu cyigeze gihinduka guhera muri Gashyantare 2019.”
Ayo makuru Chimp reports yayatangaje ivuga ko yaganiriye n’abantu batandukanye bagiye bambuka bakajya muri Uganda, babanje “gutanga impamvu zumvikana.”
Muri Gashyantare 2019 nibwo u Rwanda rwafashe umwanzuro wo gusaba abanyarwanda kutajya muri Uganda kubera umutekano wabo, nyuma y’uko bigaragaye ko abajyayo n’ababayo bashimutwa, bafungwa ndetse bagakorerwa iyicarubozo bazira ubusa.
Icyo kinyamakuru gitangaje ibi nyuma y’uko Perezida Museveni, ubwo yasozaga umwaka ushize wa 2019, yavuze ko igihugu cye cyiteguye gukora ibyo gisabwa mu gushyira iherezo ku bibazo biri mu mubano wa Uganda n’u Rwanda, ariko abasesenguzi bakomeza kugira amakenga n’ugushidikanya.
Museveni kandi yavuze ko yakiriye intumwa ye Ambasaderi Adonia Ayebare, wakiriwe muri Village Urugwiro ku mugoroba wo ku Cyumweru tariki ya 29 Ukuboza 2019 afite ubutumwa bugenewe Perezida Kagame ku mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Museveni yavuze ko Ayebare na Perezida Kagame bagiranye ibiganiro byiza ndetse ko mu gihe cya vuba, hagiye gufatwa imyanzuro ishyira iherezo ku bwumvikane buke bumaze igihe kinini mu mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Ati “Vuba aha, impande zombi zigiye gufata imyanzuro ihamye mu guhosha umwuka mubi. Ndabizeza ko Uganda izakora ibyo isabwa mu gushyira mu buryo umubano mwiza w’ibihugu byombi. Ndashimira Perezida Kagame, abavandimwe bacu b’abanyarwanda n’abaturage ba Uganda.”
Ku wa 31 Ukuboza Perezida Kagame yavuze ko iyo ntumwa yari i Kigali mu bikorwa bimaze igihe bigamije gushaka umuti w’ibibazo, ariko ko nyuma y’ibiganiro ikiba ari ingenzi ari ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imyanzuro yabyo.
Ati “Kuvuga rero ngo haje intumwa icyizere cyabonetse, ntabwo nibwira ko ari uko nabivuga, njye navuga ko iyo ari indi ntambwe ikomeje guterwa muri ubwo buryo bwo gushakisha icyatuma ikibazo icyo aricyo cyose cyaba gihari gishobora gukemuka kandi nyine ibyo biva mu bantu, mu kuvugana, kuganira.”
Ubwo hasinywaga amasezerano y’amahoro ya Luanda mu mwaka ushize, abanyarwanda baketse ko ikibazo gikemutse, ko nta n’umwe uzongera guhohoterwa ari muri Uganda ndetse ko n’abafungiyeyo bagiye kurekurwa. Gusa siko byagenze, kuko byakomeje nk’uko byari bisanzwe, abafungwa bagafungwa, abakorerwa iyicarubozo rigakomeza bakajya bajugunywa ku mipaka bagizwe intere.
Uganda kandi ntiyahagaritse umubano wayo n’imitwe igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda irimo RNC na FDLR ndetse irinangira ubwo yasabwaga kubahiriza amasezerano Museveni yasinye. Ibi nibyo byatumye intumwa z’u Rwanda na Uganda zinanirwa kumvikana mu biganiro biheruka kubera i Kampala.

Title: Umwuka w’intambara ukomeje gututumba hagati ya Amerika na Iran
Body:
Nyuma y’igitero cyagabwe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu rukerera rwo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, kigahitana Gen Qasem Soleimani, wari usanzwe ayobora umutwe udasanzwe w’ingabo zirinda abategetsi bakomeye muri Iran; impungenge n’ubwoba bw’intambara bikomeje kwiyongera ku batari bake bakurikiranira hafi politiki ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ndetse n’abatuye mu burasirazuba bwo hagati.
Nyuma y’igitero cyagabwe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu rukerera rwo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, kigahitana Gen Qasem Soleimani, wari usanzwe ayobora umutwe udasanzwe w’ingabo zirinda abategetsi bakomeye muri Iran; impungenge n’ubwoba bw’intambara bikomeje kwiyongera ku batari bake bakurikiranira hafi politiki ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ndetse n’abatuye mu burasirazuba bwo hagati.
Iki gitero cyategetswe na Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump, cyanahitanye Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis, wari umuyobozi wungirije w’umutwe bivugwa ko ufashwa na Iran witwa (Popular Mobilization Forces), ibiro by’ubutasi bya Amerika (CIA) byemeje ko ariwo wateguye ukanagaba igitero kuri Ambasade ya Amerika mu mujyi wa Bagdad mu minsi ishize.
Gen Qasem Soleimani na Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis barasiwe ku kibuga cy’indege cya Iraq i Bagdad, bari mu modoka hamwe n’abandi bantu batanu.
Umuyobozi w’ikirenga muri Iran, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, wahise ategeka iminsi itatu y’icyunamo mu gihugu hose, yavuze ko hateganyijwe kwihorera gukomeye ku bishe Gen Qasem Soleimani.
Perezida wa Iran, Hassan Rouhani, na we yashimangiye ko igihugu cye kizakora ibishoboka byose kikihorera, aho yunganiwe na minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga muri Iran, Javad Zarif, wavuze ko igitero cya Amerika ari icy’iterabwoba.
Ati “Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zizirengera ingaruka z’ubujiji bwazo.”
Gen Qasem Soleimani yakundwaga kandi agafatwaga n’abanya-Iran benshi nk’umwe mu bantu bashobora kurinda ubusugire bw’igihugu cyabo. Ubuhangange bwe kandi bwareberwaga mu ishusho y’uko yafatwaga nka nomero ya kabiri mu bafata ibyemezo muri Iran.
Abasesenguzi bavuga iki kuri uyu mwuka w’intambara?
Abademokarate benshi bavuga ko icyemezo cya Trump gishobora gutuma intambara yeruye irota, kandi bakamunenga ko yagifashe atabanje kugisha inama Inteko Ishinga Amategeko.
Kuba Soleimani yari umwanzi wa Amerika hari abademokarate babyemeza ariko bakavuga ko kwica umuntu wa kabiri ukomeye muri Iran kandi bigakorwa nta bwumvikane n’Inteko ishinga amategeko ari ikosa rishobora gushyira akarere kose Iran ihereremo mu ntambara.
Joe Biden wabaye Visi perezida wa Amerika ku ngoma ya Barrack Obama, we yeruye avuga ko Trump yakojeje agati mu ntozi.
Andrew Yang uteganya kwiyamamaza ku mwanya w’umukuru w’igihugu, ahagarariye ishyaka ry’abademokarate yagize ati “ Uko mbibona turashaka intambara na Iran ariko nsanga byaba byiza turebye kure tukirinda gushyira abaturage bacu batuye muri kariya karere mu kaga ko kwibasirwa n’abanzi bacu.”
Elizabeth Warren, na we wifuza kuzahagararira ishyaka ry’abademokarate mu matora, yavuze ko icyemezo cya Trump kitarimo ubushishozi.
Ati “Soleimani yari umwicanyi, wahitanye ubuzima bw’abantu benshi barimo n’amagana y’abanyamerika, ariko iki cyemezo kitarimo ubushishozi cyazamuye umwuka w’intambara hagati yacu na Iran, kandi gishobora gutuma hapfa abantu benshi mu karere ko mu burasirazuba bwo hagati Iran iherereyemo. Icy’ingenzi cyari gikwiye ni ukwirinda indi ntambara.”
Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u Burusiya, busanzwe ari umuterankunga wa mbere wa Iran, yavuze ko igitero cya Amerika kirongera ibibazo mu burasirazuba bwo hagati.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko aba ‘republicains’ bo bavuga ko kwica uwo mugabo byari amahitamo akwiye kuko yari afite amaraso y’abanyamerika mu biganza bye, kandi yari imbogamizi ikomeye ku mutekano w’abanyamerika babarizwa mu karere ko mu burasirazuba bwo hagati n’inyungu zabo.
Lindsey Graham, umusenateri uhagarariye leta ya Carolina y’Epfo yagize ati “Wakoze bwana Perezida kubwo guhagararira Amerika. Iki gikorwa cya Perezida Trump n’ingabo zacu, ni igisubizo nyacyo ku bushotoranyi bwa Iran bwari burangajwe imbere na Gen Soleimani n’abamushyigikiye.”
Yongeyeho ati “Niba Iran ikomeje gutera Amerika n’abadushyigikiye, bagomba kubyishyura ku kiguzi kinini, kirimo no gusenya amariba yabo ya peteroli. Kuri leta ya Iran, niba mushaka kuguma mu bucuruzi bwa peteroli, mureke Amerika n’abadushyigikiye, kandi muhagarike gutera inkunga imitwe y’iterabwoba hirya no hino ku isi.”
Hari amakuru avuga ko iki gitero cyahitanye Gen Soleimani, ingabo za Israel zaba zakigizemo uruhare. Nta muyobozi n’umwe muri Israel wari wagira icyo avuga kuri iki gitero kuko abaminisitiri bose babujijwe kugira icyo babivugaho kuko bishobora gukururira akaga icyo gihugu.
Umutwe wa Hezbollah ubarizwa muri Liban, ukaba ushyigikiwe na Iran wahamagariye isi yose guhuriza hamwe bagahorera urupfu rwa Gen Soleimani.
Umuyobozi w’uyu mutwe, Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah, yagize ati “Intego ya Leta Zunze Ubummwe za Amerika mu karere ntikwiye kugerwaho binyuze mu cyaha gikomeye cyo kwicwa abajenerali.”
Minisitiri w’intebe wa Israel wari mu ruzinduko mu Bugereki, yahise arusubika rutarangiye nyuma yo kumva urupfu rwa Gen Soleimani, mu gihe Naftali Bennett, wari wamusigariyeho yahise atumiza inama y’igitaraganya yigaga ku mutekano i Tel Aviv, ndetse na za ambasade n’ibiro bihagarariye inyungu z’ibindi bihugu bahabwa umuburo wo ku rwego rwo hejuru.
Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u Bufaransa, Amelie de Montchalin, yavuze ko igihugu cye kizakomeza gukora uko gishoboye mu guteza imbere ituze n’umutekano mu karere k’uburasirazuba bwo hagati nyuma y’ibitero bya Amerika.
Ati “Ibiri kuba nibyo twatinyaga, umwuka mubi hagati ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika uri kwiyongera.”
Mu minsi ishize Gen Soleimani yari yaravuze ijambo ryarakaje Amerika, aho yagize ati “Ndakubwiye wowe Trump umukinnyi w’urusimbi, ndakubwiye, umenye ko turi hafi yawe kuruta uko ubikeka. Uzatangiza intambara, ariko nitwe dufite ubushobozi bwo kuzayisoza.”
Ibibazo hagati ya leta ya Washington na Tehran byazamutse nyuma yuko Donald Trump akuye igihugu cye mu masezerano yo muri 2015 arebana no kubuza Iran gucura intwaro za kirimbuzi.
Aya masezerano yabuzaga Iran kwigwizaho ibitwaro bya kirimbuzi mu gihe cy’imyaka 10, yafatwaga na benshi nk’intambwe ikomeye yatewe na Perezida Barack Obama muri politiki y’ububanyi n’amahanga.
Kuva mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, abantu benshi biraye mu mihanda yo mu murwa mukuru Tehran, bigaragambya bamagana urupfu rwa Gen Soleimani.
Ikindi kibazo kimaze kwigaragaza, ni izamuka rikomeye ry’igiciro cy’ibikomoka kuri peteroli hirya no hino ku masoko mpuzamahanga, ibigaragaza ko nubwo intambara y’amasasu itaratangira mu buryo bweruye, ariko iy’ubukungu yo yahise yaduka.

Title: Amatora y’abakuru b’ibihugu yitezwe mu bihugu bya Afurika muri 2020
Body:
Politiki ni kimwe mu bivugwaho cyane ku isi, guhera umwaka utangiye kugeza urangiye. Abakuru b’ibihugu ni bamwe mu bagena imirongo migari yayo ku buryo uwo mwanya uba urebwa n’abatari bake, hagakoreshwa inzira zose zaba imbi n’inziza ngo bicare kuri iyo ntebe icurirwamo ibitekerezo biyobora ibihugu bitandukanye.
Politiki ni kimwe mu bivugwaho cyane ku isi, guhera umwaka utangiye kugeza urangiye. Abakuru b’ibihugu ni bamwe mu bagena imirongo migari yayo ku buryo uwo mwanya uba urebwa n’abatari bake, hagakoreshwa inzira zose zaba imbi n’inziza ngo bicare kuri iyo ntebe icurirwamo ibitekerezo biyobora ibihugu bitandukanye.
Uyu mwaka muri Afurika hateganyijwe amatora mu bihugu bitandukanye, azasiga bamwe mbahagurutse muri izo ntebe nkuru mu bihugu byabo, bagaha umwanya abandi bafite ibyerecyezo bishya bijyanye n’ibyo abaturage bifuza.
Muri rusange, ibihugu 22 bya Afurika nibyo bifite amatora muri uyu mwaka ariko icyenda muri byo nibyo bizabamo amatora y’abakuru b’ibihugu.
IGIHE yakusanyije iby’ingenzi ukwiriye kumenya kuri ayo matora ategerejwe na benshi.
Togo
Mu iki gihugu hateganyijwe amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu, tariki 22 Gashyantare. Mu kwezi kwa cumi, ishyaka ritavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi ryavuze ko Jean Piere Fabre ari we mukandida waryo uzaba ahanganye na Perezida uriho Faure Gnassingbé. Nta gutungurana kwitezwe kuko amahirwe agihabwa Faure umaze ku butegetsi imyaka 15.
Burundi
Amatora ateganyijwe muri iki gihugu ni ay’Umukuru w’igihugu, Inteko rusange n’ay’Abadepite. Aya matora ateganyijwe tariki 20 Gicurasi uyu mwaka. Perezida Nkurunziza Pierre yatangaje ko ataziyamamariza indi manda. Aya matora yitezwe kuzandika amateka muri iki gihugu nyuma y’imvururu zadutse guhera mu 2015 ubwo Nkurunziza yiyamarizaga manda ya gatatu itaravuzweho rumwe.
Tanzania
Andi matora ateganyijwe tariki 4 Ukwakira 2020, ni ay’Umukuru w’igihugu. Perezia John Pombe Magufuli wayoboye Tanzania kuva mu mwaka 2015 yitezwe kuyobora indi manda. Nubwo anengwa ibirimo kubangamira ubwisanzure, ashimwa n’abaturage kuba yarabashije guhashya ruswa no kwirukana abayobozi badakora inshingano zabo.
Côte d’Ivoire
Amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu ataganyijwe tariki 31 Ukwakira uyu mwaka. Perezida w’iki gihugu, Alassane Ouattara, wari waratangaje ko atazongera kwiyamamariza indi manda hejuru y’ebyiri amaze kuyobora, yavuze ko azagaragara muri ayo matora.
Burkina Faso
Hateganyijwe amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu n’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko mu Ugushyingo 2020. Uwahoze ari Minisitiri w’intebe muri iki gihugu, Kadré Désiré Ouédraogo yamaze gutangaza ko aziyamamariza umwanya w’Umukuru w’igihugu akazaba ahanganye na Perezida uriho Roch Marc Christian Kaboré.
Ghana
Amatora ateganyijwe muri iki gihugu y’Umukuru w’igihugu azaba tariki 7 Ukuboza 2020.Ishyaka ritavuga rumwe n’Ubutegetsi, National Democratic Congress ryamaze gutangaza ko uwahoze ari Umukuru w’iki gihugu, John Mahama ari we uzaba arihagarariye ahanganye na Perezida uriho, Nana Akufo-Addo.
Niger
Muri iki gihugu hateganyijwe amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu n’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko tariki 27 Ukuboza ndetse n’amatora y’abandi bayobozi batandukanye ateganyijwe mu Ukwakira.
Centrafrique
Amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu ateganyijwe tariki 27 Ukuboza. Umuvugizi w’ishyaka "Kwa Na Kwa" ry’uwahoze ari Perezida w’iki gihugu Francois Bozizé, yatangaje ko aziyamamariza kuyobora iki gihugu.
Seychelles
Hateganyijwe amatora y’Umukuru w’igihu mu Ukuboza. Ishyaka ritavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi, Seychelles National Party ryamaze gutanga Ramkalawan nk’umukandida ku mwanya wa Perezida aho azaba ahanganye na Perezida Danny Faure aziyamamariza indi manda.

Title: Museveni yiyemeje gushyira iherezo ku bibazo biri hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda; Yaba koko akomeje?
Body:
Imvugo ya Museveni yo gushyira iherezo ku bibazo biri mu mubano n’u Rwanda niyo yasorejeho umwaka wa 2019, gusa usesenguye neza wagira amakenga n’ugushidikanya.
Imvugo ya Museveni yo gushyira iherezo ku bibazo biri mu mubano n’u Rwanda niyo yasorejeho umwaka wa 2019, gusa usesenguye neza wagira amakenga n’ugushidikanya.
Ni inshuro ya kabiri abanyarwanda bashobora kuba bagira amakenga n’icyizere gike ku kuba Uganda yakemura ibibazo imaze igihe itera mu mubano wayo n’u Rwanda. Ubwa mbere hari ubwo hasinywaga amasezerano ya Luanda, ubwa kabiri byashingirwa ku magambo ya Museveni asoza umwaka wa 2019.
Mu butumwa yashyize ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter mbere y’uko twinjira mu mwaka mushya wa 2020, Museveni yavuze ko yakiriye intumwa ye Ambasaderi Adonia Ayebare uherutse mu Rwanda afite ubutumwa bugenewe Perezida Kagame ku mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Museveni yavuze ko Ayebare na Perezida Kagame bagiranye ibiganiro byiza ndetse ko mu gihe cya vuba, hagiye gufatwa imyanzuro ishyira iherezo ku bwumvikane buke bumaze igihe kinini mu mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Ati “Vuba aha, impande zombi zigiye gufata imyanzuro ihamye mu guhosha umwuka mubi. Ndabizeza ko Uganda izakora ibyo isabwa mu gushyira mu buryo umubano mwiza w’ibihugu byombi. Ndashimira Perezida Kagame, abavandimwe bacu b’abanyarwanda n’abaturage ba Uganda.”
Ambasaderi Adonia Ayebare wakiriwe muri Village Urugwiro ku mugoroba wo ku Cyumweru tariki ya 29 Ukuboza 2019. Asanzwe ari Intumwa ihoraho ya Uganda mu Muryango w’Abibumbye i New York.
Ubutumwa bwanyujijwe ku rukuta rwa Twitter rw’Ibiro by’Umukuru w’Igihugu bwavugaga ko ubutumwa Ambasaderi Ayebare yari afite, “butanga icyizere” mu gukemura ibibazo bimaze igihe mu mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na RBA kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko iyo ntumwa yari i Kigali mu bikorwa bimaze igihe bigamije gushaka umuti w’ibibazo, ariko ko nyuma y’ibiganiro ikiba ari ingenzi ari ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imyanzuro yabyo.
Ati “Kuvuga rero ngo haje intumwa icyizere cyabonetse, ntabwo nibwira ko ari uko nabivuga, njye navuga ko iyo ari indi ntambwe ikomeje guterwa muri ubwo buryo bwo gushakisha icyatuma ikibazo icyo aricyo cyose cyaba gihari gishobora gukemuka kandi nyine ibyo biva mu bantu mu kuvugana, kuganira.”
Ubutumwa bwa Museveni ku kibazo cya Uganda n’u Rwanda biragoye ko umuntu yabwizera 100%, ngo yishyiremo ko hari ikigiye gukorwa kuko mu gihe yabwandikaga, ibimenyetso bigaragaza ibihabanye n’ibyo yavugaga.
Mbere na mbere ubwo hasinywaga amasezerano y’amahoro ya Luanda, abanyarwanda baketse ko ikibazo gikemutse, ko nta n’umwe uzongera guhohoterwa ari muri Uganda ndetse ko n’abafungiyeyo bagiye kurekurwa. Gusa siko byagenze, kuko byakomeje nk’uko byari bisanzwe, abafungwa bagafungwa, abakorerwa iyicarubozo rigakomeza bakajya bajugunywa ku mipaka bagizwe intere.
Ni nako Uganda kandi yakomeje umubano wayo n’imitwe igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda irimo RNC na FDLR ndetse irinangira ubwo yasabaga kubahiriza amasezerano Museveni yasinywe. Ibi nibyo byatumye intumwa z’u Rwanda na Uganda zinanirwa kumvikana mu biganiro biheruka kubera i Kampala.
Mu gihe Museveni yandikaga ko umuti ugiye kuboneka, ku rundi ruhande ikinyamakuru Red Pepper cyari kimaze gutangaza inkuru ivuga ko abanyarwanda 200 bagamije ibikorwa by’iterabwoba binjiye muri Uganda mu mugambi wo guhungabanya iki gihugu mu bihe by’iminsi mikuru.
Muri iyo nkuru havugwamo ko bamwe muri abo bakora ibikorwa by’iterabwoba batawe muri yombi n’Urwego rushinzwe Umutekano imbere mu gihugu, ISO.
Red Pepper isanzwe iterwa inkunga n’umuvandimwe wa Museveni, Salim Saleh ni kimwe mu binyamakuru byakunze gusiga u Rwanda icyasha no guha rugari abarwanya ubutegetsi bwarwo.
Umwe mu bo cyanditse ko ari abanyarwanda bagamije ibikorwa by’iterabwoba kuri Uganda ni uwitwa Abdul Razak Subwanone, umunyarwanda uba muri Uganda aho acuruza ibyuma by’imodoka akura i Dubai. We n’undi munyarwanda witwa Edward Nsenga ucuruza telefoni bafashwe na ISO mu mukwabu watwawemo abagera kuri 200.
Ikigaragaza umugambi wa Uganda udahinduka ni uko aba banyarwanda bakuwe mu bandi na mbere y’uko bagezwa imbere y’ubutabera ngo biregure, ubu bivugwa ko bafunzwe mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko na ISO mu nzu zayo z’ibanga ahitwa Kyengera, bashinjwa kuba intasi ziturutse mu gihugu cy’igituranyi.
Perezida Kagame mu kiganiro yagiranye na Televiziyo y’u Rwanda, yavuze ko bitumvikana uburyo abanyarwanda bafatirwa muri Uganda bitwa intasi kuko bamwe muri bo batanafite ubwo bushobozi ahubwo baba bashaka imibereho kimwe n’abandi.
Ati “Ibyo kugera ahantu igihugu gihiga abanyagihugu b’abaturanyi kuri ubwo buryo ntabwo byasobanuka. Abandi bakavuga ngo abo baba bagiyeyo, baba bagiye gutata, gutata iki kirimo abana, kirimo abagore, abagabo, kirimo abantu batazi kwandika no gusoma, abantu bari aho bashakisha uko biberaho nk’uko abanya-Uganda benshi bari hano. ”
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko u Rwanda rutigeze rukora nk’umuturanyi warwo ngo rutangire ruhige abaturage ba Uganda.
Ibimenyetso byagiye bijya hanze nyuma y’ibyo abayobozi ba Uganda bakunze kuvuga ku mubano n’u Rwanda, bigaragaza ko abantu bakwiye kwishima mu rugero, ntibizere ko ikibazo cyakemutse ahubwo bagategereza bibaye. Ni uko ubutumwa bwa Museveni bwakwakirwa.

Title: Uko Sheikh Harerimana yahatanye na Perezida Kagame, gutenguhwa na Local Defense n’ibindi
Body:
Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana ni umugabo w’imyaka 64, akaba inararibonye muri Politiki y’u Rwanda dore ko ayizi neza kuva mu myaka ya 1973 ubwo yari asoje ayisumbuye, kugeza mu 1989 aruvamo no mu 1994 arugarukamo ari kumwe na FPR Inkotanyi yahagaritse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana ni umugabo w’imyaka 64, akaba inararibonye muri Politiki y’u Rwanda dore ko ayizi neza kuva mu myaka ya 1973 ubwo yari asoje ayisumbuye, kugeza mu 1989 aruvamo no mu 1994 arugarukamo ari kumwe na FPR Inkotanyi yahagaritse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ni inzobere mu buvanganzo bw’ururimi rw’Icyarabu dore ko abifitemo impamyabumenyi y’icyiciro cya gatatu cya Kaminuza yakuye muri Arabie Saoudite.
Ubwo yari asoje amasomo muri Arabie Saoudite, yagarutse mu Rwanda mu 1983, agirwa Imam wa Kigali ndetse n’Umuyobozi w’ishuri Institut Islamique Al Hidaayat, ikigo gitanga ubumenyi butegura abazaba abavugabutumwa b’idini ya Islam.
Mu 1989 yagiye muri Uganda nk’umwarimu muri Islamic University ari naho yinjiriye mu muryango FPR Inkotanyi akibereye umunyamuryango magingo aya.
Nyuma y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana yabaye Perefe wa Cyangugu, aba Minisitiri w’abakozi ba Leta, aba Minisitiri w’umutekano n’umujyanama wa Perezida, umudepite uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EALA) n’ibindi.
Yagiranye ikiganiro kirambuye na IGIHE, asobanura byinshi mu bibazo u Rwanda rwagiye runyuramo nyuma ya Jenoside, avuga ku bunararibonye bwe muri politiki nk’uburyo yiyamamaje ahanganye na Perezida Kagame ku buyobozi bw’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi, uko yeguye muri EALA, ahazaza ha EAC n’ibindi.
‘Local Defense Forces bibonye ukundi’
Abakuru barabyibuka; Abagabo b’imyenda y’umutuku werurutse, mu bice by’icyaro hari ababitaga uruyumba kubera imyenda n’ingofero bambaraga zasaga n’ibishyimbo byitwa gutyo.
Abo ni bamwe mu bari bagize urwego rushinzwe umutekano mu baturage ‘Local Defense Forces, LDF) rwagiyeho gato nyuma ya Jenoside, rugaseswa rukongera gusubizwaho mu myaka ya 1997/1998.
Urwo rwego rusubiraho Sheikh Harerimana yari Minisitiri w’Umutekano mu gihugu. Rwari rugamije gufasha abaturage kwicungira umutekano, rugahabwa imyitozo y’amezi agera kuri atatu, rukoherezwa iwabo mu giturage gucunga umutekano.
Mu mabwiriza, itsinda ry’abagize LDF hari ubwo ryahabwaga imbunda zo gucunga umutekano ku mugoroba, bwacya zigasubizwa kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ibegereye.
Sheikh Harerimana yavuze ko urwo rwego rwabatengushye, kuko intego zarwo zahindanyijwe n’imyitwarire mibi ya bamwe, bagiraga uruhare mu guhungabanya umutekano w’abo bashinzwe kurinda.
Mu myaka ya 2000 hari nk’aho abo basore bashinjwa kuba barishe barashe abagore batatu b’abacuruzi muri Byumba, muri iyo Perefegitura ahitwa Kivuye nanone mu kabari harasirwa abantu batanu bikozwe n’abagize Local Defense Forces n’ibindi.
Harerimana yagize ati “Abaturage nibo bicaraga bakavuga bati uriya mwana n’uriya nibo dushaka ko bajya muri Local Defense y’aha iwacu. Tuza kugira ibyago imyumvire ntiyaba myiza , abo basore n’abahungu bagombaga no gutanga raporo kuri Polisi ibegereye, hari ubwo bahabwaga n’intwaro nimugoroba zo kurinda agace batuyemo mu gitondo zigasubira kuri polisi, hari aho bitwaye nabi, bakumva ko babaye igitangaza.”
Abagize Local Defense bamwe bishoboye mu byaha nk’ubujura, gufata abagore n’abakobwa ku ngufu n’ibindi.
Bamwe mu bafatwaga barirukanwaga cyangwa bagahanwa ariko isura yabo iza gukomeza guhindana ku buryo bari basigaye bafatwa ukundi n’abaturage bashinzwe kurinda.
Sheikh Harerimana ati “ Uzi ko umuturage yanamubwiraga ngo kuki witwara uko, ati se ni wowe wampaye uyu mwenda? Bibonye ukundi kutari ko, bitari muri gahunda za Leta. Nicyo gituma akenshi bagendaga bakurwamo, bagahindurwa, bigeze basanga ahari muri sisiteme ibashyiraho hashobora kuba harimo ibibazo, haza gufatwa icyemezo ko basimbuzwa.”
Mu byo akeka ko byateraga abo basore kwitwara nabi, Sheikh Harerimana avugamo kuba batarahembwaga kuko bakoraga nk’abakorerabushake.
Local Defense Forces yasimbuwe na DASSO mu 2013, hajyamo abasore n’inkumi bize kandi batojwe neza ndetse banagenerwa umushara ku kwezi.
Nubwo DASSO nayo atari shyashya mu baturage, Sheikh Harerimana abona ko akazi kabo gakorwa neza n’ukoze amakosa akayakora ku giti cye kandi akabibazwa.
Yahatanye na Perezida Kagame ku kuyobora FPR Inkotanyi
Mu 2013, mu matora y’abayobozi b’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi , Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana yiyamamaje ahatanye na Perezida Paul Kagame ku buyobozi bukuru bw’uwo muryango.
Mu majwi yabaruwe, Sheikh yagize amajwi 0.5 %, atsindwa na Perezida Kagame wagize amajwi 99.5 %.
Hari abavuze ko yiyamamaje yikinira kugira ngo Perezida Kagame atiyamamaza wenyine, ariko Sheikh arabihakana.
Uyu musaza uganira kandi agashyenga yagize ati “Ko nabishakaga da! Ntabwo kwari ukwerekana ko hari demokarasi gusa , oya narabishakaga. Nashakaga kuyobora umuryango ariko ngira amahirwe make ndatsindwa kandi ntsindwa nabi cyane.”
Yongeyeho ati “Burya iyo utsinzwe ukanabyemera ntako bisa, n’aho narabyemeye. Bamaze gutangaza amajwi, umanza narabonye nk’arindwi cyangwa umunani ku bihumbi, kandi naje no kumenya nyuma ko n’ijwi rye yari yarimpaye.”
Mu 2015, Sheikh Harerimana yeguye ku mwanya wo guhagararira u Rwanda mu Nteko ya EALA, ku mpamvu yise ize bwite.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko nta kindi cyari cyibyihishe inyuma uretse kuba inshingano yari yarahawe n’umuryango FPR Inkotanyi zari zirangiye.
Ati “Njye ndi umunyamuryango wa FPR Inkotanyi uyemera, aho ndi hose mba ndi mu butumwa bwa FPR Inkotanyi. Aho mba nagiye nk’aho muri EALA nari ndi intumwa ya FPR Inkotanyi. Ubutumwa rero nari ndimo bwari burangiye ndagaruka, ubu ndi mu bundi butumwa na none kandi ndi kubukora neza n’ibyishimo byinshi.”
Nk’umuntu wabaye igihe kinini mu nteko ya EALA y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, yabajijwe no ku hazaza h’uyu muryango wugarijwe n’ibibazo kuri ubu byo kurebana ay’ingwe hagati y’ibihugu bimwe biwugize, no kugenda gahoro kw’imishinga ihuriweho igamije kuwuteza imbere.
Sheikh Harerimana asanga ahanini ikidindiza uyu muryango ari ubwigenge bwa buri gihugu ku myanzuro imwe n’imwe ifite inyungu rusange, ku buryo hagomba kubaho ubwumvikane busesuye buri gihugu kikabanza kubyumva aho gutora ngo byose bigendere ku byo benshi bemeje.
Nubwo harimo ibyo bibazo n’iby’amikoro adahagije, Sheikh Harerimana yizera ko ibihugu bigize EAC bizagera ku ntego byihaye.
Ati “Aho twari tugeze hari hakwiriye kongeramo imbaraga kugira ngo ibintu byihute tuzagere kuri ya ntego imwe yo kugira igihugu kimwe […] Icyakora EAC nkurikije uko yatangiye, aho igeze n’ubushake buhari iracyariho kandi izahoraho na ziriya ntego izazigeraho.”
Uyu mugabo w’abana batanu yagiriye inama urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda, gukomereza ku byiza igihugu cyagezeho birinda kwirara.
Ati “Ntabwo byaturutse mu iraha ryinshi cyane, ntabwo byaturutse mu mudendezo, wasasiwe amaraso y’abanyarwanda, hari abawitangiye. Ntitubifate nk’ibintu byoroshye.”
Kuri ubu Sheikh Harerimana ni umwe mu bagize Urwego Ngishwanama rw’Inararibonye, akaba na Komiseri mu muryango FPR Inkotanyi.
Inkuru bifitanye isano: Abacengezi, ubujura mu basirikare...Ikiganiro na Sheikh Harerimana ku mutekano nyuma ya Jenoside

Title: Icyo wamenya ku itegeko ry’ubwenegihugu ryateje imvururu mu Buhinde
Body:
Leta y’u Buhinde iherutse gushyiraho itegeko ryemerera ubwenegihugu abaturage bava mu bihugu bituranye na bwo, bo mu madini yose usibye abo mu idini ya Islam.
Leta y’u Buhinde iherutse gushyiraho itegeko ryemerera ubwenegihugu abaturage bava mu bihugu bituranye na bwo, bo mu madini yose usibye abo mu idini ya Islam.
Impuguke mu mategeko zo zivuga ko iri tegeko rihabanye cyane n’itegeko Nshinga ry’iki gihugu, riteganya ko amadini yose angana imbere y’amategeko.
Iri tegeko rishya rigenga uburyo bwo kubona ubwenegihugu mu Buhinde, rije nyuma yo kuvugurura iryari risanzwe ryo mu mwaka w’1955, ryemereraga ba nyamuke bafatwaga nabi bo mu madini y’aba- Hindus, Sikhs, Buddhists, Jains, Parsis, n’abakirisitu bava mu bihugu nka Bangladesh, Afghanistan na Pakistan, ariko ntirigire icyo rivuga ku bayisilamu.
Iri tegeko ryageze mu nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Buhinde bigizwemo uruhare cyane n’ishyaka riri ku butegetsi ry’aba-Hindu [Bharatiya Janata Party], ryemejwe na perezida w’iki gihugu Ram Nath Kovind, tariki ya 12 Ukuboza, 2019.
Amashyaka atavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi avuga ko iri tegeko rishya ririmo ivangura, kuko rirobanura idini ya Islam mu gihugu gituwe n’abasaga miliyari 1.3 bizwi neza ko gitanga ubwisanzure ku madini yose. Aba-Islam bo mu Buhinde bangana hafi na 15% by’abaturage bose.
Abanenga iri tegeko bavuga ko byakozwe mu mugambi w’igihe kirekire wa Guverinoma iyobowe na Minisitiri w’intebe Narendra Modi, kuva yajya ku butegetsi mu myaka itandatu ishize.
Ibirego bitandukanye bigaragaza ukutishimira iri tegeko, byatangiye koherezwa mu rukiko rw’ikirenga.
Umuvugizi w’ishyaka rikomeye ritavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi [Congress party], Sanjay Jha, yatangarije Al Jazeera ko iri tegeko riri mu mugambi wa politiki yo kurema amacakubiri y’ishyaka Bharatiya Janata Party, BJP.
Ati “Politiki ya ‘BJP’ ni uguhoza u Buhinde mu mwuka mubi no kuzamura uburakari bw’abaturage cyane cyane mu gihe cy’amatora.”
Mu kwezi gushize, Amit Shah, Minisitiri w’umutekano w’imbere mu gihugu, akaba umwe mu byegera bya Narendra Modi, yatangaje ko igihugu cy’u Buhinde kigiye gutangira kubarura abaturage bose, hagamijwe kureba abimukira bava mu bihugu bituranyi badafite ibyangombwa.
Muri Kanama 2019, ibarura nk’iryo ryiswe ryakorewe muri leta ya Assam iherereye mu majyaruguru ashyira uburasirazuba bw’u Buhinde, aho abaturage hafi miliyoni ebyiri bakuwe ku rutonde rw’abenegihugu.
Minisitiri Amit Shah aherutse kwita abimukira b’abanya- Bangladeshi intozi n’abacengezi, kandi ko ari imbogamizi ku mutekano w’igihugu.
Ishyaka rye ryamaganiye kure iyakirwa ry’impunzi z’aba- Rohingya bo muri Myanmar., rivuga ko bagomba gusubizwa mu gihugu cyabo, nubwo ubwo bwoko bufatwa nka nyamuke bukanabamo benshi b’abayisilamu, buri kwicirwa muri Myanmar.
Uyu mushinga w’itegeko bwa mbere wagejejwe mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko muri Nyakanga 2016, uvugurura ingingo irebana n’ubwenegihugu yo 1955, ivuga ko idini rikwiye kuba ishingiro ryo guhabwa ubwenegihugu, kuko mbere iryo tegeko ntiryateganyaga idini nk’imwe mu ngingo fatizo zo gutanga ubwenegihugu.
Gusa nyuma yo kwemezwa n’abagize inteko Ishinga Amategeko, umutwe w’abadepite, iri tegeko ntiryabashije kugezwa imbere ya sena y’u Buhinde, kubera imyigaragambyo yaberaga muri leta zo mu majyaruguru ashyira uburasirazuba, ndetse n’igitutu cy’abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi.
Ubu itegeko rishya rishyiraho umwihariko kuri leta zo mu majyaruguru ashyira uburasirazuba zari zaragaragayemo imyigaragambyo, rikavuga ko rizashishikariza ibihumbi by’aba-Hindus bava muri Bangladesh guhungira mu Buhinde.
Nkuko biteganywa n’itegeko rishya, abimukira badafite ibyangombwa bagomba kuba bamaze imyaka itandatu ku butaka bw’u Buhinde kugira ngo bemererwe ubwenegihugu, mu gihe itegeko ryo mu 1955 ryo ryasabaga kuba umuntu amaze imyaka 12.
Gusa abanyamategeko bavuga ko iri tegeko rishya rihonyora ingingo ya 14 y’itegeko Nshinga ry’u Buhinde, itanga uburenganzira bungana imbere y’amategeko. Abarinenga bavuga ko rimeze nk’irya Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ukumira aba-islam bo mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe kwaka ubuhungiro.

Title: Iby’ingenzi ku rugendo rwo kweguza Perezida Donald Trump rugeze mu mahina
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo abagize inteko ishinga amategeko ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika batoye ku bwiganze, icyemezo cyo gutakariza icyizere Perezida Donald J. Trump akaba ashobora kubura amahirwe yo kurangiza manda ye isigaje umwaka umwe.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo abagize inteko ishinga amategeko ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika batoye ku bwiganze, icyemezo cyo gutakariza icyizere Perezida Donald J. Trump akaba ashobora kubura amahirwe yo kurangiza manda ye isigaje umwaka umwe.
Gutora ingingo ya mbere yo gukoresha nabi ububasha Trump ahabwa n’itegeko, byatowe n’abadepite 230 kuri 427 bari bari mu nteko; mu gihe iyo kubangamira imirimo y’inteko ishinga amategeko yatowe n’abadepite 229.
Aya matora asobanuye ku buryo butaziguye ko perezida Trump atakarijwe icyizere n’intumwa za rubanda cyo gukomeza kuyobora Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, nubwo urubanza rwa nyuma ruzacibwa na Sena, aho ishyaka ry’aba-Républicains rifite ubwiganze.
Umuyobozi w’aba -Républicains muri Sena ya Amerika, Mitch McConnell, yavuze ko yifuza ko ibiganiro kuri uyu mwanzuro ukomeye byazaba bigufi. Gusa nta kigaragaza ko Sena izahitamo gukura ku buyobozi Perezida Trump kuko abasenateri benshi ari abo mu ishyaka rye.
Gukuraho Perezida Trump bisa n’ibirimo amacenga menshi. Umunsi ku wundi amakuru agenda yisukiranya, agaragaza ko hari abantu benshi babyihishe inyuma, ndetse n’inzira z’ubwiru zinyurwamo ngo iki cyemezo gifatwe.
Ese byatangiye bite? 
Muri Nzeri uyu mwaka, nibwo hamenyekanye amakuru avuga ko umwe mu bakozi bashinzwe ubutasi, wahoze anakorera ikigo cy’ubutasi cya CIA, yagejeje ikirego ku mugenzuzi mukuru w’ubutasi, arega Perezida Trump gukora ibikorwa atemererwa n’amategeko.
Mu kirego cye, avuga ko umwe mu bayobozi bo mu biro bya perezida [White House] wamuhaye amakuru; yari atewe impungenge n’ibyavugiwe mu kiganiro kuri telefone cyo muri Nyakanga 2019, hagati ya Perezida Donald Trump na Perezida wa Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky.
Muri iki kiganiro, Perezida Trump yasabye icyo gihugu cy’amahanga kwivanga mu matora ateganyijwe mu mwaka utaha wa 2020, muri Amerika. Yanashyize igitutu ku gihugu cy’amahanga, agisaba gukora iperereza kuri umwe mu bazahangana nawe mu matora yo muri 2020; byose bigakubirwa mu cyaha cyo gukoresha nabi ububasha ahabwa n’itegeko nk’umukuru w’igihugu.
Umwunganizi mu mategeko wa Trump, Rudolph Giuliani n’intumwa nkuru ya leta, William Barr, bashyirwa mu majwi ko bafite uruhare rutaziguye muri ibi bikorwa; ndetse ko n’abayobozi bakuru mu biro by’umukuru w’igihugu bashatse gukingira ikibaba Trump kuko bazi neza uburemere bw’ibyavuzwe na Trump.
Inzira iteganywa n’amategeko kugira ngo umukozi wo mu biro bishinzwe iperereza atange ikirego cy’ibikorwa biri gukorwa, kandi bitandukanye n’amategeko yarakurikijwe. Uwatanze iki kirego yakigejeje ku mugenzuzi mukuru w’ubutasi, uyu nawe wagombaga kukigeza ku muyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ubutasi ku rwego rw’igihugu, nyuma yo gusuzuma uburemere bwacyo.
Gusa umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ubutasi ku rwego rw’igihugu, Joseph Maguire, ntiyigeze ashyikiriza iki kirego inteko ishinga amategeko, nkuko yabisabwaga n’amategeko; ahubwo yahisemo kugisha inama ibiro bishinzwe ubujyanama muri minisiteri y’ubutabera; ibi nabyo byanzura ko icyo atari ikibazo cyihutirwa nyamara izi mpande zombi nta na rumwe rufite ububasha bwo gufata uwo mwanzuro.
Kuwa 19 Nzeri, nibwo hamenyekanye ko kudashyirwa ahagaragara kw’iki kirego, byagizwemo uruhare na perezida Trump wifuzaga ko Ukraine itangira iperereza kuri Hunter Biden, umuhungu wa Joe Biden, wo mu ishyaka ry’abademokarate, wahoze ari Visi Perezida.
Kutavuga rumwe kuri iki kibazo byakomeje kwiyongera, kugera ubwo kuwa 25 Nzeri, 2019, ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White House] byemeye ko raporo ikubiyemo ibiregwa Trump n’amajwi y’ikiganiro kuri telefone hagati ya Trump na Zelensky bishyirwa ahagaragara.
Kuva icyo gihe Trump n’abamushyigikiye batangiye kwamagana ibikubiye muri icyo kirego, bavuga ko bidafite agaciro kandi uwabitangaje nta bumenyi buhagije afite kubyo yaregeye.
Ni iki mu by’ukuri Trump yaganiriye na Zelensky?
Ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White house] byashize hanze ikiganiro Trump yagira na perezida wa Ukraine, byibwira ko bishobora kuzagaragaza neza Trump, ndetse bigahosha umwuka mubi wari utangiye kuzamuka, gusa ibi si ko byagenze.
Ibyo biganiro bigaragaza ko Trump yashatse guhuza inkunga Amerika iha Ukraine, no gusaba Ukraine gukora iperereza kuri Hunter Biden; ndetse n’ubugambanyi bwabaye mu matora yo muri 2016.
