Raporo y’Umuryango w’Abibumbye yo muri Nzeri 2019, igaragaza ko nta cyizere cy’imigendekere myiza y’amatora mu Burundi mu 2020, mu gihe hakiri Perezida wigaragaza nk’igitangaza’.
Loni ivuga ko ari Perezida wigwijeho ububasha bwose we n’ishyaka rye CNDD FDD, n’ibyaha bishinjwa urubyiruko rw’ishyaka rye ruzwi nk’Imbonerakure rushinjwa guhutaza uburenganzira bw’abaturage n’abatavuga rumwe na Leta.
Icyakora Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Burundi, Ezechiel Nibigira, aherutse kubwira Inteko rusange ya Loni, ko mu gihugu hari umwuka mwiza uzatuma amatora agenda neza.
Somalia
Amatora yo muri Somalia ni ingenzi cyane ku mutekano w’akarere. Iki ni igihugu kimaze igihe mu mvururu. Hashize imyaka 50 Perezida atorwa n’itsinda ry’abantu bake baba batoranyijwe, kubera ubwoba bw’uko hateguwe amatora rusange abaturage bakitabira, bishobora guteza imvururu n’umutekano muke.
Mu matora ya 2009, aya 2012 na 2017 hose abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko na Perezida bagiye batorwa n’abantu 14 000 babaga batoranyijwe ngo bahagararire ubwoko buba muri icyo gihugu.
N’uyu munsi haracyari impungenge niba amatora yo muri Somalia koko azaba dore ko aya Perezida aherutse yabereye muri parikingi y’ikibuga cy’indege.
Ikibazo cy’umutwe w’iterabwoba wa al Shabaab ndetse no kuba abatavuga rumwe na Leta baherutse gushinja Perezida Mohamed Abdullahi Farmaajo gushaka kuguma ku butegetsi biteye impungenge ku mutekano w’amatora ateganyijwe.
Guverinoma yatangaje ko yiteguye gukoresha amatora agaca mu mucyo kandi buri muturage wemerewe gutora agatora. Guverinoma yanavuze ko vuba aha izageza ku Nteko Ishinga Amatora umushinga w’amatora kugira ngo wemezwe.
Icyakora, iki gihugu cyiracyafite ikibazo cyo kuvugurura Itegeko Nshinga. Nubwo itsinda ryahawe kurivugurura ryagejeje ku Nteko umushinga w’itegeko, haracyari imbogamizi.
Iya mbere ni uko nta matora ya kamarampaka ashobora kuba hatarakemuka ikibazo cy’agace ka Somaliland kifata nk’igihugu ukwacyo mu gihe Somalia igafata nk’agace kayo.
Mu bindi kandi ivugurura ry’itegeko Nshinga rigomba kureba harimo aho umurwa mukuru ukwiriye kuba, uburyo ubuyobozi bwa za Leta zigize icyo gihugu bukorana na Leta nkuru n’ibindi.
Mu gihe ivugurura ry’itegeko Nshinga ritaraba, n’tegeko rigenga amatora ntirizashoboka kuko abantu ntibashobora gutangira kwiyandikisha hataraboneka itegeko rigenga amatora kandi naryo rigomba kugenwa n’Itegeko Nshinga.
Indi mbogamizi ni umutekano muke. Igice kinini cy’igihugu kiracyari mu maboko y’umutwe wa al Shabaab, bivuze ko aho hantu al shabaab ifite amatora atazashoboka. No mu murwa mukuru Mogadishu naho umutekano waho ntiwizewe.
Ibyo bigaragazwa n’uko tariki 28 Ukuboza 2019, imodoka itezemo igisasu yaturikiye aho abantu basakirwa mu murwa mukuru kigahitana abantu 78.
Perezida Farmaajo yavuze ko icyo gitero ari icy’iterabwoba kandi kitazihanganirwa, icyakora abatavuga rumwe na we bamushinja kubembekereza al shabaab kuko uduce Leta yigaruriye guhera mu 2017 ubwo Farmaajo yajyaga ku butegetsi ari duke.
Ethiopia
Amatora ateganyijwe muri Gicurasi 2020, ni aya mbere azaba abaye guhera Minisitiri w’Intebe wahawe n’igihembo cyitiriwe Nobel, Dr Abiy Ahmed agiye ku butegetsi.
Umwanzuro aherutse gufata wo gusesa amashyaka yose yari agize Ihuriro EPRDF (Ethiopian People’s Revolutionary Democratic Front), agashinga ishyaka rya PP watumye havuka impungenge n’umwuka mubi mu gihugu.
Hari abadashyigikiye iryo shyaka PP kuko risa nk’irije guhanagura umuco n’umuhate bashyizeho bubaka amashyaka yabo mu myaka 30 ishize. Abatabyumva cyane ni abo mu mashyaka nka Tigray Peoples Liberation Front (TPLF), n’igice cy’ishyaka Oromo Peoples Democratic Organisation (OPDO) ari naryo Abiy aturukamo, rishobora no kumurwanya agatsindwa.
Amavugurura yakozwe na Dr Abiy yazanye umucyo muri Ethiopia yahoze ifatwa nk’igihugu kibangamira uburenganzira bwa muntu ariko byanateje imvururu zishingiye ku turere zitewe n’abandi bantu bakomeye bafite inyota y’ubutegetsi.
Guhera mu 1995, Ethiopia yagiye ikora amatora mu gihe cyagenwe. Icyakora, uretse mu 2005, nta na rimwe higeze habaho amatora arimo guhangana kugaragara nkuko The East African yabitangaje.

Title: Umwuka w’intambara ukomeje gututumba hagati ya Amerika na Iran
Body:
Nyuma y’igitero cyagabwe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu rukerera rwo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, kigahitana Gen Qasem Soleimani, wari usanzwe ayobora umutwe udasanzwe w’ingabo zirinda abategetsi bakomeye muri Iran; impungenge n’ubwoba bw’intambara bikomeje kwiyongera ku batari bake bakurikiranira hafi politiki ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ndetse n’abatuye mu burasirazuba bwo hagati.
Nyuma y’igitero cyagabwe na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika mu rukerera rwo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, kigahitana Gen Qasem Soleimani, wari usanzwe ayobora umutwe udasanzwe w’ingabo zirinda abategetsi bakomeye muri Iran; impungenge n’ubwoba bw’intambara bikomeje kwiyongera ku batari bake bakurikiranira hafi politiki ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ndetse n’abatuye mu burasirazuba bwo hagati.
Iki gitero cyategetswe na Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Donald Trump, cyanahitanye Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis, wari umuyobozi wungirije w’umutwe bivugwa ko ufashwa na Iran witwa (Popular Mobilization Forces), ibiro by’ubutasi bya Amerika (CIA) byemeje ko ariwo wateguye ukanagaba igitero kuri Ambasade ya Amerika mu mujyi wa Bagdad mu minsi ishize.
Gen Qasem Soleimani na Abu Mahdi al-Muhandis barasiwe ku kibuga cy’indege cya Iraq i Bagdad, bari mu modoka hamwe n’abandi bantu batanu.
Umuyobozi w’ikirenga muri Iran, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, wahise ategeka iminsi itatu y’icyunamo mu gihugu hose, yavuze ko hateganyijwe kwihorera gukomeye ku bishe Gen Qasem Soleimani.
Perezida wa Iran, Hassan Rouhani, na we yashimangiye ko igihugu cye kizakora ibishoboka byose kikihorera, aho yunganiwe na minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga muri Iran, Javad Zarif, wavuze ko igitero cya Amerika ari icy’iterabwoba.
Ati “Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika zizirengera ingaruka z’ubujiji bwazo.”
Gen Qasem Soleimani yakundwaga kandi agafatwaga n’abanya-Iran benshi nk’umwe mu bantu bashobora kurinda ubusugire bw’igihugu cyabo. Ubuhangange bwe kandi bwareberwaga mu ishusho y’uko yafatwaga nka nomero ya kabiri mu bafata ibyemezo muri Iran.
Abasesenguzi bavuga iki kuri uyu mwuka w’intambara?
Abademokarate benshi bavuga ko icyemezo cya Trump gishobora gutuma intambara yeruye irota, kandi bakamunenga ko yagifashe atabanje kugisha inama Inteko Ishinga Amategeko.
Kuba Soleimani yari umwanzi wa Amerika hari abademokarate babyemeza ariko bakavuga ko kwica umuntu wa kabiri ukomeye muri Iran kandi bigakorwa nta bwumvikane n’Inteko ishinga amategeko ari ikosa rishobora gushyira akarere kose Iran ihereremo mu ntambara.
Joe Biden wabaye Visi perezida wa Amerika ku ngoma ya Barrack Obama, we yeruye avuga ko Trump yakojeje agati mu ntozi.
Andrew Yang uteganya kwiyamamaza ku mwanya w’umukuru w’igihugu, ahagarariye ishyaka ry’abademokarate yagize ati “ Uko mbibona turashaka intambara na Iran ariko nsanga byaba byiza turebye kure tukirinda gushyira abaturage bacu batuye muri kariya karere mu kaga ko kwibasirwa n’abanzi bacu.”
Elizabeth Warren, na we wifuza kuzahagararira ishyaka ry’abademokarate mu matora, yavuze ko icyemezo cya Trump kitarimo ubushishozi.
Ati “Soleimani yari umwicanyi, wahitanye ubuzima bw’abantu benshi barimo n’amagana y’abanyamerika, ariko iki cyemezo kitarimo ubushishozi cyazamuye umwuka w’intambara hagati yacu na Iran, kandi gishobora gutuma hapfa abantu benshi mu karere ko mu burasirazuba bwo hagati Iran iherereyemo. Icy’ingenzi cyari gikwiye ni ukwirinda indi ntambara.”
Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u Burusiya, busanzwe ari umuterankunga wa mbere wa Iran, yavuze ko igitero cya Amerika kirongera ibibazo mu burasirazuba bwo hagati.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko aba ‘republicains’ bo bavuga ko kwica uwo mugabo byari amahitamo akwiye kuko yari afite amaraso y’abanyamerika mu biganza bye, kandi yari imbogamizi ikomeye ku mutekano w’abanyamerika babarizwa mu karere ko mu burasirazuba bwo hagati n’inyungu zabo.
Lindsey Graham, umusenateri uhagarariye leta ya Carolina y’Epfo yagize ati “Wakoze bwana Perezida kubwo guhagararira Amerika. Iki gikorwa cya Perezida Trump n’ingabo zacu, ni igisubizo nyacyo ku bushotoranyi bwa Iran bwari burangajwe imbere na Gen Soleimani n’abamushyigikiye.”
Yongeyeho ati “Niba Iran ikomeje gutera Amerika n’abadushyigikiye, bagomba kubyishyura ku kiguzi kinini, kirimo no gusenya amariba yabo ya peteroli. Kuri leta ya Iran, niba mushaka kuguma mu bucuruzi bwa peteroli, mureke Amerika n’abadushyigikiye, kandi muhagarike gutera inkunga imitwe y’iterabwoba hirya no hino ku isi.”
Hari amakuru avuga ko iki gitero cyahitanye Gen Soleimani, ingabo za Israel zaba zakigizemo uruhare. Nta muyobozi n’umwe muri Israel wari wagira icyo avuga kuri iki gitero kuko abaminisitiri bose babujijwe kugira icyo babivugaho kuko bishobora gukururira akaga icyo gihugu.
Umutwe wa Hezbollah ubarizwa muri Liban, ukaba ushyigikiwe na Iran wahamagariye isi yose guhuriza hamwe bagahorera urupfu rwa Gen Soleimani.
Umuyobozi w’uyu mutwe, Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah, yagize ati “Intego ya Leta Zunze Ubummwe za Amerika mu karere ntikwiye kugerwaho binyuze mu cyaha gikomeye cyo kwicwa abajenerali.”
Minisitiri w’intebe wa Israel wari mu ruzinduko mu Bugereki, yahise arusubika rutarangiye nyuma yo kumva urupfu rwa Gen Soleimani, mu gihe Naftali Bennett, wari wamusigariyeho yahise atumiza inama y’igitaraganya yigaga ku mutekano i Tel Aviv, ndetse na za ambasade n’ibiro bihagarariye inyungu z’ibindi bihugu bahabwa umuburo wo ku rwego rwo hejuru.
Minisitiri w’ububanyi n’amahanga w’u Bufaransa, Amelie de Montchalin, yavuze ko igihugu cye kizakomeza gukora uko gishoboye mu guteza imbere ituze n’umutekano mu karere k’uburasirazuba bwo hagati nyuma y’ibitero bya Amerika.
Ati “Ibiri kuba nibyo twatinyaga, umwuka mubi hagati ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika uri kwiyongera.”
Mu minsi ishize Gen Soleimani yari yaravuze ijambo ryarakaje Amerika, aho yagize ati “Ndakubwiye wowe Trump umukinnyi w’urusimbi, ndakubwiye, umenye ko turi hafi yawe kuruta uko ubikeka. Uzatangiza intambara, ariko nitwe dufite ubushobozi bwo kuzayisoza.”
Ibibazo hagati ya leta ya Washington na Tehran byazamutse nyuma yuko Donald Trump akuye igihugu cye mu masezerano yo muri 2015 arebana no kubuza Iran gucura intwaro za kirimbuzi.
Aya masezerano yabuzaga Iran kwigwizaho ibitwaro bya kirimbuzi mu gihe cy’imyaka 10, yafatwaga na benshi nk’intambwe ikomeye yatewe na Perezida Barack Obama muri politiki y’ububanyi n’amahanga.
Kuva mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Gatanu, abantu benshi biraye mu mihanda yo mu murwa mukuru Tehran, bigaragambya bamagana urupfu rwa Gen Soleimani.
Ikindi kibazo kimaze kwigaragaza, ni izamuka rikomeye ry’igiciro cy’ibikomoka kuri peteroli hirya no hino ku masoko mpuzamahanga, ibigaragaza ko nubwo intambara y’amasasu itaratangira mu buryo bweruye, ariko iy’ubukungu yo yahise yaduka.

Title: Amatora y’abakuru b’ibihugu yitezwe mu bihugu bya Afurika muri 2020
Body:
Politiki ni kimwe mu bivugwaho cyane ku isi, guhera umwaka utangiye kugeza urangiye. Abakuru b’ibihugu ni bamwe mu bagena imirongo migari yayo ku buryo uwo mwanya uba urebwa n’abatari bake, hagakoreshwa inzira zose zaba imbi n’inziza ngo bicare kuri iyo ntebe icurirwamo ibitekerezo biyobora ibihugu bitandukanye.
Politiki ni kimwe mu bivugwaho cyane ku isi, guhera umwaka utangiye kugeza urangiye. Abakuru b’ibihugu ni bamwe mu bagena imirongo migari yayo ku buryo uwo mwanya uba urebwa n’abatari bake, hagakoreshwa inzira zose zaba imbi n’inziza ngo bicare kuri iyo ntebe icurirwamo ibitekerezo biyobora ibihugu bitandukanye.
Uyu mwaka muri Afurika hateganyijwe amatora mu bihugu bitandukanye, azasiga bamwe mbahagurutse muri izo ntebe nkuru mu bihugu byabo, bagaha umwanya abandi bafite ibyerecyezo bishya bijyanye n’ibyo abaturage bifuza.
Muri rusange, ibihugu 22 bya Afurika nibyo bifite amatora muri uyu mwaka ariko icyenda muri byo nibyo bizabamo amatora y’abakuru b’ibihugu.
IGIHE yakusanyije iby’ingenzi ukwiriye kumenya kuri ayo matora ategerejwe na benshi.
Togo
Mu iki gihugu hateganyijwe amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu, tariki 22 Gashyantare. Mu kwezi kwa cumi, ishyaka ritavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi ryavuze ko Jean Piere Fabre ari we mukandida waryo uzaba ahanganye na Perezida uriho Faure Gnassingbé. Nta gutungurana kwitezwe kuko amahirwe agihabwa Faure umaze ku butegetsi imyaka 15.
Burundi
Amatora ateganyijwe muri iki gihugu ni ay’Umukuru w’igihugu, Inteko rusange n’ay’Abadepite. Aya matora ateganyijwe tariki 20 Gicurasi uyu mwaka. Perezida Nkurunziza Pierre yatangaje ko ataziyamamariza indi manda. Aya matora yitezwe kuzandika amateka muri iki gihugu nyuma y’imvururu zadutse guhera mu 2015 ubwo Nkurunziza yiyamarizaga manda ya gatatu itaravuzweho rumwe.
Tanzania
Andi matora ateganyijwe tariki 4 Ukwakira 2020, ni ay’Umukuru w’igihugu. Perezia John Pombe Magufuli wayoboye Tanzania kuva mu mwaka 2015 yitezwe kuyobora indi manda. Nubwo anengwa ibirimo kubangamira ubwisanzure, ashimwa n’abaturage kuba yarabashije guhashya ruswa no kwirukana abayobozi badakora inshingano zabo.
Côte d’Ivoire
Amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu ataganyijwe tariki 31 Ukwakira uyu mwaka. Perezida w’iki gihugu, Alassane Ouattara, wari waratangaje ko atazongera kwiyamamariza indi manda hejuru y’ebyiri amaze kuyobora, yavuze ko azagaragara muri ayo matora.
Burkina Faso
Hateganyijwe amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu n’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko mu Ugushyingo 2020. Uwahoze ari Minisitiri w’intebe muri iki gihugu, Kadré Désiré Ouédraogo yamaze gutangaza ko aziyamamariza umwanya w’Umukuru w’igihugu akazaba ahanganye na Perezida uriho Roch Marc Christian Kaboré.
Ghana
Amatora ateganyijwe muri iki gihugu y’Umukuru w’igihugu azaba tariki 7 Ukuboza 2020.Ishyaka ritavuga rumwe n’Ubutegetsi, National Democratic Congress ryamaze gutangaza ko uwahoze ari Umukuru w’iki gihugu, John Mahama ari we uzaba arihagarariye ahanganye na Perezida uriho, Nana Akufo-Addo.
Niger
Muri iki gihugu hateganyijwe amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu n’Inteko Ishinga Amategeko tariki 27 Ukuboza ndetse n’amatora y’abandi bayobozi batandukanye ateganyijwe mu Ukwakira.
Centrafrique
Amatora y’Umukuru w’igihugu ateganyijwe tariki 27 Ukuboza. Umuvugizi w’ishyaka "Kwa Na Kwa" ry’uwahoze ari Perezida w’iki gihugu Francois Bozizé, yatangaje ko aziyamamariza kuyobora iki gihugu.
Seychelles
Hateganyijwe amatora y’Umukuru w’igihu mu Ukuboza. Ishyaka ritavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi, Seychelles National Party ryamaze gutanga Ramkalawan nk’umukandida ku mwanya wa Perezida aho azaba ahanganye na Perezida Danny Faure aziyamamariza indi manda.

Title: Museveni yiyemeje gushyira iherezo ku bibazo biri hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda; Yaba koko akomeje?
Body:
Imvugo ya Museveni yo gushyira iherezo ku bibazo biri mu mubano n’u Rwanda niyo yasorejeho umwaka wa 2019, gusa usesenguye neza wagira amakenga n’ugushidikanya.
Imvugo ya Museveni yo gushyira iherezo ku bibazo biri mu mubano n’u Rwanda niyo yasorejeho umwaka wa 2019, gusa usesenguye neza wagira amakenga n’ugushidikanya.
Ni inshuro ya kabiri abanyarwanda bashobora kuba bagira amakenga n’icyizere gike ku kuba Uganda yakemura ibibazo imaze igihe itera mu mubano wayo n’u Rwanda. Ubwa mbere hari ubwo hasinywaga amasezerano ya Luanda, ubwa kabiri byashingirwa ku magambo ya Museveni asoza umwaka wa 2019.
Mu butumwa yashyize ku rukuta rwe rwa Twitter mbere y’uko twinjira mu mwaka mushya wa 2020, Museveni yavuze ko yakiriye intumwa ye Ambasaderi Adonia Ayebare uherutse mu Rwanda afite ubutumwa bugenewe Perezida Kagame ku mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Museveni yavuze ko Ayebare na Perezida Kagame bagiranye ibiganiro byiza ndetse ko mu gihe cya vuba, hagiye gufatwa imyanzuro ishyira iherezo ku bwumvikane buke bumaze igihe kinini mu mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Ati “Vuba aha, impande zombi zigiye gufata imyanzuro ihamye mu guhosha umwuka mubi. Ndabizeza ko Uganda izakora ibyo isabwa mu gushyira mu buryo umubano mwiza w’ibihugu byombi. Ndashimira Perezida Kagame, abavandimwe bacu b’abanyarwanda n’abaturage ba Uganda.”
Ambasaderi Adonia Ayebare wakiriwe muri Village Urugwiro ku mugoroba wo ku Cyumweru tariki ya 29 Ukuboza 2019. Asanzwe ari Intumwa ihoraho ya Uganda mu Muryango w’Abibumbye i New York.
Ubutumwa bwanyujijwe ku rukuta rwa Twitter rw’Ibiro by’Umukuru w’Igihugu bwavugaga ko ubutumwa Ambasaderi Ayebare yari afite, “butanga icyizere” mu gukemura ibibazo bimaze igihe mu mubano w’ibihugu byombi.
Mu kiganiro yagiranye na RBA kuri uyu wa Kabiri, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko iyo ntumwa yari i Kigali mu bikorwa bimaze igihe bigamije gushaka umuti w’ibibazo, ariko ko nyuma y’ibiganiro ikiba ari ingenzi ari ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’imyanzuro yabyo.
Ati “Kuvuga rero ngo haje intumwa icyizere cyabonetse, ntabwo nibwira ko ari uko nabivuga, njye navuga ko iyo ari indi ntambwe ikomeje guterwa muri ubwo buryo bwo gushakisha icyatuma ikibazo icyo aricyo cyose cyaba gihari gishobora gukemuka kandi nyine ibyo biva mu bantu mu kuvugana, kuganira.”
Ubutumwa bwa Museveni ku kibazo cya Uganda n’u Rwanda biragoye ko umuntu yabwizera 100%, ngo yishyiremo ko hari ikigiye gukorwa kuko mu gihe yabwandikaga, ibimenyetso bigaragaza ibihabanye n’ibyo yavugaga.
Mbere na mbere ubwo hasinywaga amasezerano y’amahoro ya Luanda, abanyarwanda baketse ko ikibazo gikemutse, ko nta n’umwe uzongera guhohoterwa ari muri Uganda ndetse ko n’abafungiyeyo bagiye kurekurwa. Gusa siko byagenze, kuko byakomeje nk’uko byari bisanzwe, abafungwa bagafungwa, abakorerwa iyicarubozo rigakomeza bakajya bajugunywa ku mipaka bagizwe intere.
Ni nako Uganda kandi yakomeje umubano wayo n’imitwe igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda irimo RNC na FDLR ndetse irinangira ubwo yasabaga kubahiriza amasezerano Museveni yasinywe. Ibi nibyo byatumye intumwa z’u Rwanda na Uganda zinanirwa kumvikana mu biganiro biheruka kubera i Kampala.
Mu gihe Museveni yandikaga ko umuti ugiye kuboneka, ku rundi ruhande ikinyamakuru Red Pepper cyari kimaze gutangaza inkuru ivuga ko abanyarwanda 200 bagamije ibikorwa by’iterabwoba binjiye muri Uganda mu mugambi wo guhungabanya iki gihugu mu bihe by’iminsi mikuru.
Muri iyo nkuru havugwamo ko bamwe muri abo bakora ibikorwa by’iterabwoba batawe muri yombi n’Urwego rushinzwe Umutekano imbere mu gihugu, ISO.
Red Pepper isanzwe iterwa inkunga n’umuvandimwe wa Museveni, Salim Saleh ni kimwe mu binyamakuru byakunze gusiga u Rwanda icyasha no guha rugari abarwanya ubutegetsi bwarwo.
Umwe mu bo cyanditse ko ari abanyarwanda bagamije ibikorwa by’iterabwoba kuri Uganda ni uwitwa Abdul Razak Subwanone, umunyarwanda uba muri Uganda aho acuruza ibyuma by’imodoka akura i Dubai. We n’undi munyarwanda witwa Edward Nsenga ucuruza telefoni bafashwe na ISO mu mukwabu watwawemo abagera kuri 200.
Ikigaragaza umugambi wa Uganda udahinduka ni uko aba banyarwanda bakuwe mu bandi na mbere y’uko bagezwa imbere y’ubutabera ngo biregure, ubu bivugwa ko bafunzwe mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko na ISO mu nzu zayo z’ibanga ahitwa Kyengera, bashinjwa kuba intasi ziturutse mu gihugu cy’igituranyi.
Perezida Kagame mu kiganiro yagiranye na Televiziyo y’u Rwanda, yavuze ko bitumvikana uburyo abanyarwanda bafatirwa muri Uganda bitwa intasi kuko bamwe muri bo batanafite ubwo bushobozi ahubwo baba bashaka imibereho kimwe n’abandi.
Ati “Ibyo kugera ahantu igihugu gihiga abanyagihugu b’abaturanyi kuri ubwo buryo ntabwo byasobanuka. Abandi bakavuga ngo abo baba bagiyeyo, baba bagiye gutata, gutata iki kirimo abana, kirimo abagore, abagabo, kirimo abantu batazi kwandika no gusoma, abantu bari aho bashakisha uko biberaho nk’uko abanya-Uganda benshi bari hano. ”
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko u Rwanda rutigeze rukora nk’umuturanyi warwo ngo rutangire ruhige abaturage ba Uganda.
Ibimenyetso byagiye bijya hanze nyuma y’ibyo abayobozi ba Uganda bakunze kuvuga ku mubano n’u Rwanda, bigaragaza ko abantu bakwiye kwishima mu rugero, ntibizere ko ikibazo cyakemutse ahubwo bagategereza bibaye. Ni uko ubutumwa bwa Museveni bwakwakirwa.

Title: Uko Sheikh Harerimana yahatanye na Perezida Kagame, gutenguhwa na Local Defense n’ibindi
Body:
Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana ni umugabo w’imyaka 64, akaba inararibonye muri Politiki y’u Rwanda dore ko ayizi neza kuva mu myaka ya 1973 ubwo yari asoje ayisumbuye, kugeza mu 1989 aruvamo no mu 1994 arugarukamo ari kumwe na FPR Inkotanyi yahagaritse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana ni umugabo w’imyaka 64, akaba inararibonye muri Politiki y’u Rwanda dore ko ayizi neza kuva mu myaka ya 1973 ubwo yari asoje ayisumbuye, kugeza mu 1989 aruvamo no mu 1994 arugarukamo ari kumwe na FPR Inkotanyi yahagaritse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ni inzobere mu buvanganzo bw’ururimi rw’Icyarabu dore ko abifitemo impamyabumenyi y’icyiciro cya gatatu cya Kaminuza yakuye muri Arabie Saoudite.
Ubwo yari asoje amasomo muri Arabie Saoudite, yagarutse mu Rwanda mu 1983, agirwa Imam wa Kigali ndetse n’Umuyobozi w’ishuri Institut Islamique Al Hidaayat, ikigo gitanga ubumenyi butegura abazaba abavugabutumwa b’idini ya Islam.
Mu 1989 yagiye muri Uganda nk’umwarimu muri Islamic University ari naho yinjiriye mu muryango FPR Inkotanyi akibereye umunyamuryango magingo aya.
Nyuma y’urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu, Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana yabaye Perefe wa Cyangugu, aba Minisitiri w’abakozi ba Leta, aba Minisitiri w’umutekano n’umujyanama wa Perezida, umudepite uhagarariye u Rwanda mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EALA) n’ibindi.
Yagiranye ikiganiro kirambuye na IGIHE, asobanura byinshi mu bibazo u Rwanda rwagiye runyuramo nyuma ya Jenoside, avuga ku bunararibonye bwe muri politiki nk’uburyo yiyamamaje ahanganye na Perezida Kagame ku buyobozi bw’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi, uko yeguye muri EALA, ahazaza ha EAC n’ibindi.
‘Local Defense Forces bibonye ukundi’
Abakuru barabyibuka; Abagabo b’imyenda y’umutuku werurutse, mu bice by’icyaro hari ababitaga uruyumba kubera imyenda n’ingofero bambaraga zasaga n’ibishyimbo byitwa gutyo.
Abo ni bamwe mu bari bagize urwego rushinzwe umutekano mu baturage ‘Local Defense Forces, LDF) rwagiyeho gato nyuma ya Jenoside, rugaseswa rukongera gusubizwaho mu myaka ya 1997/1998.
Urwo rwego rusubiraho Sheikh Harerimana yari Minisitiri w’Umutekano mu gihugu. Rwari rugamije gufasha abaturage kwicungira umutekano, rugahabwa imyitozo y’amezi agera kuri atatu, rukoherezwa iwabo mu giturage gucunga umutekano.
Mu mabwiriza, itsinda ry’abagize LDF hari ubwo ryahabwaga imbunda zo gucunga umutekano ku mugoroba, bwacya zigasubizwa kuri sitasiyo ya Polisi ibegereye.
Sheikh Harerimana yavuze ko urwo rwego rwabatengushye, kuko intego zarwo zahindanyijwe n’imyitwarire mibi ya bamwe, bagiraga uruhare mu guhungabanya umutekano w’abo bashinzwe kurinda.
Mu myaka ya 2000 hari nk’aho abo basore bashinjwa kuba barishe barashe abagore batatu b’abacuruzi muri Byumba, muri iyo Perefegitura ahitwa Kivuye nanone mu kabari harasirwa abantu batanu bikozwe n’abagize Local Defense Forces n’ibindi.
Harerimana yagize ati “Abaturage nibo bicaraga bakavuga bati uriya mwana n’uriya nibo dushaka ko bajya muri Local Defense y’aha iwacu. Tuza kugira ibyago imyumvire ntiyaba myiza , abo basore n’abahungu bagombaga no gutanga raporo kuri Polisi ibegereye, hari ubwo bahabwaga n’intwaro nimugoroba zo kurinda agace batuyemo mu gitondo zigasubira kuri polisi, hari aho bitwaye nabi, bakumva ko babaye igitangaza.”
Abagize Local Defense bamwe bishoboye mu byaha nk’ubujura, gufata abagore n’abakobwa ku ngufu n’ibindi.
Bamwe mu bafatwaga barirukanwaga cyangwa bagahanwa ariko isura yabo iza gukomeza guhindana ku buryo bari basigaye bafatwa ukundi n’abaturage bashinzwe kurinda.
Sheikh Harerimana ati “ Uzi ko umuturage yanamubwiraga ngo kuki witwara uko, ati se ni wowe wampaye uyu mwenda? Bibonye ukundi kutari ko, bitari muri gahunda za Leta. Nicyo gituma akenshi bagendaga bakurwamo, bagahindurwa, bigeze basanga ahari muri sisiteme ibashyiraho hashobora kuba harimo ibibazo, haza gufatwa icyemezo ko basimbuzwa.”
Mu byo akeka ko byateraga abo basore kwitwara nabi, Sheikh Harerimana avugamo kuba batarahembwaga kuko bakoraga nk’abakorerabushake.
Local Defense Forces yasimbuwe na DASSO mu 2013, hajyamo abasore n’inkumi bize kandi batojwe neza ndetse banagenerwa umushara ku kwezi.
Nubwo DASSO nayo atari shyashya mu baturage, Sheikh Harerimana abona ko akazi kabo gakorwa neza n’ukoze amakosa akayakora ku giti cye kandi akabibazwa.
Yahatanye na Perezida Kagame ku kuyobora FPR Inkotanyi
Mu 2013, mu matora y’abayobozi b’Umuryango FPR Inkotanyi , Sheikh Abdul Karim Harerimana yiyamamaje ahatanye na Perezida Paul Kagame ku buyobozi bukuru bw’uwo muryango.
Mu majwi yabaruwe, Sheikh yagize amajwi 0.5 %, atsindwa na Perezida Kagame wagize amajwi 99.5 %.
Hari abavuze ko yiyamamaje yikinira kugira ngo Perezida Kagame atiyamamaza wenyine, ariko Sheikh arabihakana.
Uyu musaza uganira kandi agashyenga yagize ati “Ko nabishakaga da! Ntabwo kwari ukwerekana ko hari demokarasi gusa , oya narabishakaga. Nashakaga kuyobora umuryango ariko ngira amahirwe make ndatsindwa kandi ntsindwa nabi cyane.”
Yongeyeho ati “Burya iyo utsinzwe ukanabyemera ntako bisa, n’aho narabyemeye. Bamaze gutangaza amajwi, umanza narabonye nk’arindwi cyangwa umunani ku bihumbi, kandi naje no kumenya nyuma ko n’ijwi rye yari yarimpaye.”
Mu 2015, Sheikh Harerimana yeguye ku mwanya wo guhagararira u Rwanda mu Nteko ya EALA, ku mpamvu yise ize bwite.
Yabwiye IGIHE ko nta kindi cyari cyibyihishe inyuma uretse kuba inshingano yari yarahawe n’umuryango FPR Inkotanyi zari zirangiye.
Ati “Njye ndi umunyamuryango wa FPR Inkotanyi uyemera, aho ndi hose mba ndi mu butumwa bwa FPR Inkotanyi. Aho mba nagiye nk’aho muri EALA nari ndi intumwa ya FPR Inkotanyi. Ubutumwa rero nari ndimo bwari burangiye ndagaruka, ubu ndi mu bundi butumwa na none kandi ndi kubukora neza n’ibyishimo byinshi.”
Nk’umuntu wabaye igihe kinini mu nteko ya EALA y’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, yabajijwe no ku hazaza h’uyu muryango wugarijwe n’ibibazo kuri ubu byo kurebana ay’ingwe hagati y’ibihugu bimwe biwugize, no kugenda gahoro kw’imishinga ihuriweho igamije kuwuteza imbere.
Sheikh Harerimana asanga ahanini ikidindiza uyu muryango ari ubwigenge bwa buri gihugu ku myanzuro imwe n’imwe ifite inyungu rusange, ku buryo hagomba kubaho ubwumvikane busesuye buri gihugu kikabanza kubyumva aho gutora ngo byose bigendere ku byo benshi bemeje.
Nubwo harimo ibyo bibazo n’iby’amikoro adahagije, Sheikh Harerimana yizera ko ibihugu bigize EAC bizagera ku ntego byihaye.
Ati “Aho twari tugeze hari hakwiriye kongeramo imbaraga kugira ngo ibintu byihute tuzagere kuri ya ntego imwe yo kugira igihugu kimwe […] Icyakora EAC nkurikije uko yatangiye, aho igeze n’ubushake buhari iracyariho kandi izahoraho na ziriya ntego izazigeraho.”
Uyu mugabo w’abana batanu yagiriye inama urubyiruko rw’u Rwanda, gukomereza ku byiza igihugu cyagezeho birinda kwirara.
Ati “Ntabwo byaturutse mu iraha ryinshi cyane, ntabwo byaturutse mu mudendezo, wasasiwe amaraso y’abanyarwanda, hari abawitangiye. Ntitubifate nk’ibintu byoroshye.”
Kuri ubu Sheikh Harerimana ni umwe mu bagize Urwego Ngishwanama rw’Inararibonye, akaba na Komiseri mu muryango FPR Inkotanyi.
Inkuru bifitanye isano: Abacengezi, ubujura mu basirikare...Ikiganiro na Sheikh Harerimana ku mutekano nyuma ya Jenoside

Title: Icyo wamenya ku itegeko ry’ubwenegihugu ryateje imvururu mu Buhinde
Body:
Leta y’u Buhinde iherutse gushyiraho itegeko ryemerera ubwenegihugu abaturage bava mu bihugu bituranye na bwo, bo mu madini yose usibye abo mu idini ya Islam.
Leta y’u Buhinde iherutse gushyiraho itegeko ryemerera ubwenegihugu abaturage bava mu bihugu bituranye na bwo, bo mu madini yose usibye abo mu idini ya Islam.
Impuguke mu mategeko zo zivuga ko iri tegeko rihabanye cyane n’itegeko Nshinga ry’iki gihugu, riteganya ko amadini yose angana imbere y’amategeko.
Iri tegeko rishya rigenga uburyo bwo kubona ubwenegihugu mu Buhinde, rije nyuma yo kuvugurura iryari risanzwe ryo mu mwaka w’1955, ryemereraga ba nyamuke bafatwaga nabi bo mu madini y’aba- Hindus, Sikhs, Buddhists, Jains, Parsis, n’abakirisitu bava mu bihugu nka Bangladesh, Afghanistan na Pakistan, ariko ntirigire icyo rivuga ku bayisilamu.
Iri tegeko ryageze mu nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Buhinde bigizwemo uruhare cyane n’ishyaka riri ku butegetsi ry’aba-Hindu [Bharatiya Janata Party], ryemejwe na perezida w’iki gihugu Ram Nath Kovind, tariki ya 12 Ukuboza, 2019.
Amashyaka atavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi avuga ko iri tegeko rishya ririmo ivangura, kuko rirobanura idini ya Islam mu gihugu gituwe n’abasaga miliyari 1.3 bizwi neza ko gitanga ubwisanzure ku madini yose. Aba-Islam bo mu Buhinde bangana hafi na 15% by’abaturage bose.
Abanenga iri tegeko bavuga ko byakozwe mu mugambi w’igihe kirekire wa Guverinoma iyobowe na Minisitiri w’intebe Narendra Modi, kuva yajya ku butegetsi mu myaka itandatu ishize.
Ibirego bitandukanye bigaragaza ukutishimira iri tegeko, byatangiye koherezwa mu rukiko rw’ikirenga.
Umuvugizi w’ishyaka rikomeye ritavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi [Congress party], Sanjay Jha, yatangarije Al Jazeera ko iri tegeko riri mu mugambi wa politiki yo kurema amacakubiri y’ishyaka Bharatiya Janata Party, BJP.
Ati “Politiki ya ‘BJP’ ni uguhoza u Buhinde mu mwuka mubi no kuzamura uburakari bw’abaturage cyane cyane mu gihe cy’amatora.”
Mu kwezi gushize, Amit Shah, Minisitiri w’umutekano w’imbere mu gihugu, akaba umwe mu byegera bya Narendra Modi, yatangaje ko igihugu cy’u Buhinde kigiye gutangira kubarura abaturage bose, hagamijwe kureba abimukira bava mu bihugu bituranyi badafite ibyangombwa.
Muri Kanama 2019, ibarura nk’iryo ryiswe ryakorewe muri leta ya Assam iherereye mu majyaruguru ashyira uburasirazuba bw’u Buhinde, aho abaturage hafi miliyoni ebyiri bakuwe ku rutonde rw’abenegihugu.
Minisitiri Amit Shah aherutse kwita abimukira b’abanya- Bangladeshi intozi n’abacengezi, kandi ko ari imbogamizi ku mutekano w’igihugu.
Ishyaka rye ryamaganiye kure iyakirwa ry’impunzi z’aba- Rohingya bo muri Myanmar., rivuga ko bagomba gusubizwa mu gihugu cyabo, nubwo ubwo bwoko bufatwa nka nyamuke bukanabamo benshi b’abayisilamu, buri kwicirwa muri Myanmar.
Uyu mushinga w’itegeko bwa mbere wagejejwe mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko muri Nyakanga 2016, uvugurura ingingo irebana n’ubwenegihugu yo 1955, ivuga ko idini rikwiye kuba ishingiro ryo guhabwa ubwenegihugu, kuko mbere iryo tegeko ntiryateganyaga idini nk’imwe mu ngingo fatizo zo gutanga ubwenegihugu.
Gusa nyuma yo kwemezwa n’abagize inteko Ishinga Amategeko, umutwe w’abadepite, iri tegeko ntiryabashije kugezwa imbere ya sena y’u Buhinde, kubera imyigaragambyo yaberaga muri leta zo mu majyaruguru ashyira uburasirazuba, ndetse n’igitutu cy’abatavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi.
Ubu itegeko rishya rishyiraho umwihariko kuri leta zo mu majyaruguru ashyira uburasirazuba zari zaragaragayemo imyigaragambyo, rikavuga ko rizashishikariza ibihumbi by’aba-Hindus bava muri Bangladesh guhungira mu Buhinde.
Nkuko biteganywa n’itegeko rishya, abimukira badafite ibyangombwa bagomba kuba bamaze imyaka itandatu ku butaka bw’u Buhinde kugira ngo bemererwe ubwenegihugu, mu gihe itegeko ryo mu 1955 ryo ryasabaga kuba umuntu amaze imyaka 12.
Gusa abanyamategeko bavuga ko iri tegeko rishya rihonyora ingingo ya 14 y’itegeko Nshinga ry’u Buhinde, itanga uburenganzira bungana imbere y’amategeko. Abarinenga bavuga ko rimeze nk’irya Trump wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ukumira aba-islam bo mu bihugu bimwe na bimwe kwaka ubuhungiro.

Title: Iby’ingenzi ku rugendo rwo kweguza Perezida Donald Trump rugeze mu mahina
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo abagize inteko ishinga amategeko ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika batoye ku bwiganze, icyemezo cyo gutakariza icyizere Perezida Donald J. Trump akaba ashobora kubura amahirwe yo kurangiza manda ye isigaje umwaka umwe.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu nibwo abagize inteko ishinga amategeko ya Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika batoye ku bwiganze, icyemezo cyo gutakariza icyizere Perezida Donald J. Trump akaba ashobora kubura amahirwe yo kurangiza manda ye isigaje umwaka umwe.
Gutora ingingo ya mbere yo gukoresha nabi ububasha Trump ahabwa n’itegeko, byatowe n’abadepite 230 kuri 427 bari bari mu nteko; mu gihe iyo kubangamira imirimo y’inteko ishinga amategeko yatowe n’abadepite 229.
Aya matora asobanuye ku buryo butaziguye ko perezida Trump atakarijwe icyizere n’intumwa za rubanda cyo gukomeza kuyobora Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, nubwo urubanza rwa nyuma ruzacibwa na Sena, aho ishyaka ry’aba-Républicains rifite ubwiganze.
Umuyobozi w’aba -Républicains muri Sena ya Amerika, Mitch McConnell, yavuze ko yifuza ko ibiganiro kuri uyu mwanzuro ukomeye byazaba bigufi. Gusa nta kigaragaza ko Sena izahitamo gukura ku buyobozi Perezida Trump kuko abasenateri benshi ari abo mu ishyaka rye.
Gukuraho Perezida Trump bisa n’ibirimo amacenga menshi. Umunsi ku wundi amakuru agenda yisukiranya, agaragaza ko hari abantu benshi babyihishe inyuma, ndetse n’inzira z’ubwiru zinyurwamo ngo iki cyemezo gifatwe.
Ese byatangiye bite? 
Muri Nzeri uyu mwaka, nibwo hamenyekanye amakuru avuga ko umwe mu bakozi bashinzwe ubutasi, wahoze anakorera ikigo cy’ubutasi cya CIA, yagejeje ikirego ku mugenzuzi mukuru w’ubutasi, arega Perezida Trump gukora ibikorwa atemererwa n’amategeko.
Mu kirego cye, avuga ko umwe mu bayobozi bo mu biro bya perezida [White House] wamuhaye amakuru; yari atewe impungenge n’ibyavugiwe mu kiganiro kuri telefone cyo muri Nyakanga 2019, hagati ya Perezida Donald Trump na Perezida wa Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky.
Muri iki kiganiro, Perezida Trump yasabye icyo gihugu cy’amahanga kwivanga mu matora ateganyijwe mu mwaka utaha wa 2020, muri Amerika. Yanashyize igitutu ku gihugu cy’amahanga, agisaba gukora iperereza kuri umwe mu bazahangana nawe mu matora yo muri 2020; byose bigakubirwa mu cyaha cyo gukoresha nabi ububasha ahabwa n’itegeko nk’umukuru w’igihugu.
Umwunganizi mu mategeko wa Trump, Rudolph Giuliani n’intumwa nkuru ya leta, William Barr, bashyirwa mu majwi ko bafite uruhare rutaziguye muri ibi bikorwa; ndetse ko n’abayobozi bakuru mu biro by’umukuru w’igihugu bashatse gukingira ikibaba Trump kuko bazi neza uburemere bw’ibyavuzwe na Trump.
Inzira iteganywa n’amategeko kugira ngo umukozi wo mu biro bishinzwe iperereza atange ikirego cy’ibikorwa biri gukorwa, kandi bitandukanye n’amategeko yarakurikijwe. Uwatanze iki kirego yakigejeje ku mugenzuzi mukuru w’ubutasi, uyu nawe wagombaga kukigeza ku muyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ubutasi ku rwego rw’igihugu, nyuma yo gusuzuma uburemere bwacyo.
Gusa umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ubutasi ku rwego rw’igihugu, Joseph Maguire, ntiyigeze ashyikiriza iki kirego inteko ishinga amategeko, nkuko yabisabwaga n’amategeko; ahubwo yahisemo kugisha inama ibiro bishinzwe ubujyanama muri minisiteri y’ubutabera; ibi nabyo byanzura ko icyo atari ikibazo cyihutirwa nyamara izi mpande zombi nta na rumwe rufite ububasha bwo gufata uwo mwanzuro.
Kuwa 19 Nzeri, nibwo hamenyekanye ko kudashyirwa ahagaragara kw’iki kirego, byagizwemo uruhare na perezida Trump wifuzaga ko Ukraine itangira iperereza kuri Hunter Biden, umuhungu wa Joe Biden, wo mu ishyaka ry’abademokarate, wahoze ari Visi Perezida.
Kutavuga rumwe kuri iki kibazo byakomeje kwiyongera, kugera ubwo kuwa 25 Nzeri, 2019, ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White House] byemeye ko raporo ikubiyemo ibiregwa Trump n’amajwi y’ikiganiro kuri telefone hagati ya Trump na Zelensky bishyirwa ahagaragara.
Kuva icyo gihe Trump n’abamushyigikiye batangiye kwamagana ibikubiye muri icyo kirego, bavuga ko bidafite agaciro kandi uwabitangaje nta bumenyi buhagije afite kubyo yaregeye.
Ni iki mu by’ukuri Trump yaganiriye na Zelensky?
Ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White house] byashize hanze ikiganiro Trump yagira na perezida wa Ukraine, byibwira ko bishobora kuzagaragaza neza Trump, ndetse bigahosha umwuka mubi wari utangiye kuzamuka, gusa ibi si ko byagenze.
Ibyo biganiro bigaragaza ko Trump yashatse guhuza inkunga Amerika iha Ukraine, no gusaba Ukraine gukora iperereza kuri Hunter Biden; ndetse n’ubugambanyi bwabaye mu matora yo muri 2016. Zelensky wagaraje gushaka kumvikana, ahanini bitewe nuko yifuzaga ko Amerika imugurisha ibisasu bya “Javelin anti-tank missiles”, Trump yamubwiye ko Rudy Giuliani ari we muntu yizeye babiganiraho.
Ni iki abagize inteko ishinga amategeko bibanzeho mu gusesengura impamvu batakariza icyizere Trump?
Amakuru avuga ko Nancy Pelosi, uyobora inteko ishinga amategeko yifuzaga kumva ibirego byose bishinja Trump gukoresha nabi ububasha ahabwa nka perezida; gusa abademokarate bibanze ku ngingo yo gutakariza icyizere Trump bareba cyane ku kibazo cya Ukraine, aho kureba ibibazo byose bigaragaza imyitwarire idahwitse ye.
Adam Schiff, uyobora akanama karebana n’ubutasi mu nteko ishinga amategeko, yagaragaje ibibazo bine bifuzaga gukoraho iperereza.
Icya mbere bifuzaga kumenya niba Trump yarongeye gusaba ubufasha igihugu cy’amahanga mu kwivanga mu matora. Icya kabiri bashakaga kumenya niba ibiro by’umukuru w’igihugu [White House] byaremeye ko bigirana inama na Ukraine, ari uko Ukraine yemeye gutangiza iperereza mu cyimbo cya Trump.
Icya gatatu, bifuzaga kumenya niba Ukraine yari ifite impamvu yo kwizera ko itazahabwa inkunga ya gisirikare, kugeza igihe  itangirije iperereza rya Trump. Icya kane, bifuzaga kumenya niba hari impamvu zifatika zateye Trump kwitwara atyo.
Trump yisobanura ate?
Perezida Trump n’abamushyigikiye bemeza ko nta kidasanzwe yakoze. Bemeza ko nta nta gitutu bashyizeho Ukraine ngo ibakorere ibitemewe n’amategeko.
Ni iki Joe Biden ahuriyeho na Ukraine? 
Dusubije amaso inyuma ubwo Joe Biden yari Visi Perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ubutegetsi bwa Obama bwagerageje gutera inkunga Ukraine mu makirimbirane ifitanye n’u Burusiya. Abanyaburayi na Amerika bahisemo gushaka uburyo bakuraho Viktor Shokin, wari umushinjacyaha mukuru wa Ukraine, kuko basangaga ruswa yibasiye abayobozi bakuru muri iki gihugu, ari imbogamizi mu gukomeza imbaraga za Ukraine.
Viktor Shokin yafatwaga nk’ufite uruhare runini muri icyo kibazo; yakuwe ku mwanya we, mu mavugurura yakozwe bitegetswe na Amerika n’abanyaburayi; aho Joe Biden yivugiye ko ariwe wategetse ko hafatirwa inkunga ya miliyari imwe y’amadorari kugeza igihe Ukraine ishyize mu bikorwa icyifuzo cyabo.
Hunter Biden ahurira he n’iki kibazo?
Hunter yamaze igihe kinini cy’ubuzima bwe akora ubucuruzi mu izina rya se (Joe Biden). Yagiraga uruhare rutaziguye mu biganiro byari bigamije kwinjiriza inyungu ubucuruzi bwa se, ndetse akaba n’umuyobozi muri banki yaterwaga inkunga na se.
Hunter Biden yahawe umwanya mu nama y’ubuyobozi y’ikigo cya Amtrak, mu buryo atari akwiye na gato; ndetse anashyirwa mu nama y’ubuyobozi y’ikigo cy’ingufu cya Ukraine [Burisma].
Ibikorwa bya Hunter byaramenyekanye cyane muri politiki y’abademokarate. Igihe yari mu Bushinwa ari kumwe na se mu ruzinduko rw’akazi; yagiranye ibiganiro n’umuyobozi wa banki ya Private Equity, aho bamwe mu bayobozi bakuru mu biro bya perezida batangiye gukeka ko ari gushaka uburyo bwo kwishakira inyungu ze bwite; ibintu bitari byarigeze bikorwa mu biro by’umukuru w’igihugu.
Hunter kandi ngo yari azi neza ko imyitwarire ye irebwa nk’ikibazo mu myaka yabanje, mu gihe cy’amatora.
 Kwinjirira amatora ya Amerika
Trump akeka ko ikigo cyitwa ‘Crowdstrike’ gifitanye umubano na Ukraine kandi ko cyahishe ububiko bw’amabanga ya komite nyobozi mu ishyaka ry’abademokarate, bibye hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga mu gihe cy’amatora ya 2016. Trump yifuzaga ko Ukraine iha Amerika ubwo bubiko bw’amabanga.
‘Crowdstrike’ ni ikigo cyo muri Amerika, cyashinzwe ku bufatanye n’umurusiya wahungiye muri Amerika akiri umwana. Iki kigo cyahawe akazi na komite nyobozi y’ishyaka ry’abademokarate kugira ngo kibafashe kumenya uburyo ubutumwa bwa bamwe mu bayobozi b’abademokarate bwinjiwemo mu gihe cy’amatora ya 2016.
Trump ahangayikishijwe nuko iki kigo kitigeze giha ububiko bw’amabanga cyasesenguye FBI cyangwa undi uwo ariwe wese, nyamara muri Ukraine nta hantu ho guhisha ubwo bubiko bw’amabanga hahari, kandi nta n’impamvu ifatika yatuma babuhisha.
Trump atsimbarara ku ngingo ivuga ko u Burusiya butigeze bwinjira mu mabanga y’abademokarate; ahubwo ari ibinyoma byahimbwe n’ikigo ‘Crowdstrike’ kuko aricyo cyahishe ibimenyetso mu rwego rwo guhimbira ibyaha ubutegetsi bwe n’u Burusiya.
Gutakariza icyizere Perezida bikorwa bite?
Hifashishijwe ingero kuri Nixon na Clinton baheruka kweguzwa, komite ishinzwe iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko mu nteko nshingamategeko niyo igira uruhare runini muri iki gikorwa. Iyi komite yumva abatangabuhamya, igategura ibirego irega perezida mu buryo bwemewe n’amategeko, n’ingingo zijyana nabyo, igakora amatora, byakwemezwa bikoherezwa mu nteko rusange y’abagize inteko nshingamategeko bagakora amatora nabo, ingingo imwe cyangwa zose zatorwa ku bwiganze, Perezida agatakarizwa ikizere.
Kuri perezida Trump we, ikibazo cye cyanyuze mu nzira ebyiri mu gihe kimwe, aho urwego rw’ubutasi rwakoze iby’ibanze, rukora raporo ruyoherereza komite ishinzwe iyubahirizwa ry’amategeko, ari nayo yateguye ibirego bishinjwa Trump.
Nyuma y’ibyemejwe n’abagize inteko nshingamategeko umutwe w’abadepite, umutwe wa Sena niwo uzaca urubanza rwa nyuma rwemeza niba Trump yeguzwa cyangwa agakomeza kuyobora Amerika.
Mu rubanza rwa Sena, uhagarariye perezida mu mategeko niwe uburana kuko perezida ubwe ntagomba kuba ari muri icyo cyumba cy’iburanisha.
Perezida w’urukiko rw’ikirenga niwe ugena uburyo icyemezo cya Sena gishyirwa mu bikorwa, ariko Sena nayo ishobora gutora ivuguruza icyemezo cye.
Kugira ngo kandi icyemezo cya Sena gitorwe, bisaba ko 2/3 by’abasenateri bacyemeza (aba-senateri 67 ku 100). Sena ya Amerika irimo aba-senateri 53 bo mu ishyaka ry’aba-Repubulikani, bisobanuye ko kugira ngo Trump akurwe ku buyobozi, 20 muri bo basabwa gutora bihuje n’abademokarate.
Trump akuwe ku buyobozi byagenda bite?
Itegeko rivuga ko perezida wa Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika akuweho, asimburwa na visi perezida; Ubu Mike Pence niwe wasimbura Trump. Igihe baba baviriyeho rimwe, umukuru w’inteko nshingamategeko Nancy Pelosi niwe wayobora; gusa bisa n’ibidashoboka kuko aba-republicains ntibiteguye gukora icyatuma Pelosi ahabwa umwanya wa perezida.
Uza ku mwanya wa kane mu rukurikirane rw’abasimbura Trump ni Mike Pompeo, umunyabanga wa leta; gusa uyu nawe afite aho ahuriye n’ibibazo bya Ukraine. Uwa gatanu ni ushinzwe imari ya leta Steven Mnuchin, ari nawe udafite imbogamizi n’imwe yamubuza kuba perezida wa Amerika.

Title: Perezida Kagame yifuza kuzasimburwa n’umugore (Video)
Body:
Perezida Paul Kagame yatangaje ko politiki yo guteza imbere abagore imaze gutanga umusaruro mwiza mu iterambere ry’igihugu, akifuza na we yazasimburwa n’umugore ku kuyobora u Rwanda.
Perezida Paul Kagame yatangaje ko politiki yo guteza imbere abagore imaze gutanga umusaruro mwiza mu iterambere ry’igihugu, akifuza na we yazasimburwa n’umugore ku kuyobora u Rwanda.
Yabigarutseho kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 19 Ukuboza ubwo yagaragazaga uko igihugu gihagaze mu ijambo yagejeje ku bitabiriye inama ya 17 y’Umushyikirano.
Imbere y’ibihumbi byitabiriye iyo nama, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko guteza imbere abagore byahinduye byinshi mu buzima bw’igihugu ku buryo bisigaye binigaragaza ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Yagize ati “ Mwabonye muri iyi minsi ibijyanye n’uburinganire abagore n’abagabo ku Isi yose ibihugu ijana na mirongo turi mu ba mbere 10, mu by’ukuri hari aho bagera ngirango abantu bakarambirwa u Rwanda bagashaka kurugabanyiriza ubundi twagakwiye kuba turi mu ba mbere batanu ariko turi mu ba mbere 10 nabyo turabyemera.”
Perezida Kagame yagaragaje ko uwo mwanya atari mwiza cyane kuko u Rwanda rwigeze kuza mu bihugu bitandatu bya mbere mu guteza imbere uburinganire bw’abagabo n’abagore, gusa agaragaza ko n’aho ruri atari habi.
Yavuze ko politiki y’uburinganire n’ubwuzuzanye ijya kujyaho, akamaro kayo kagaragaraga kandi n’abandi bamaze kubibona.
Ati “Iyi politiki imaze imyaka twayikoze tuyemera kandi twumva akamaro kayo kandi ifite umusaruro ugaragarira n’abandi babona ko bikora ariko dukore n’ibindi tugera mu ba mbere batanu. Hari akazi ko gukora kenshi bafatanyije n’abagabo. Abadamu bamaze kugira aho bagera, dushyiremo umuvuduko dufatanye mu bucuruzi mu buyobozi, ubutabera, abashinzwe umutekano, abashinzwe byose.”
Ashingiye ku byagezweho ku bufatanye n’abagore, Perezida Kagame yavuze ko yifuza ko umunsi umwe umugore yazayobora u Rwanda.
Ati “Njye nifuza rimwe ko uyu mwanya mwampaye ubukurikira uzatwarwa n’umugore, abagabo bari hano niba ndi bubakire simbizi ariko nabo bashobora kuba ari byo bashaka.”
Perezida Kagame yasabye abanyarwanda gukomeza kongera imbaraga mubyo bakora, kuko hari byinshi byagezweho benshi batumvaga ko byashoboka.
Kuva mu 2003 Itegeko Nshinga rigena ko mu myanya yose itorerwa mu buyobozi no muri guverinoma, abagore bagomba kugiramo 30%.
Perezida w’Urwego Ngishwanama rw’inararibonye mu Rwanda, Rutaremara Tito yigeze gusobanura ko gushyira abagore mu buyobozi ari “ubushake bwa politiki bujyanye n’ibibera mu Rwanda. Nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, abagore banganaga hafi na 70% by’abaturage bose.’’
Muri Guverinoma, abagore bangana na 50 %, mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko mu Mutwe w’Abadepite mu Rwanda bangana na 61.3% bavuye kuri 14% mu 1994. U Rwanda nirwo ruyoboye ibindi bihugu byo ku Isi mu kugira abagore benshi mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko.
Mu bucamanza ni 49.6% mu gihe mu buyobozi bw’inama njyanama z’uturere abagore ari 41%. Mu burezi abakobwa bitabira amashami y’imibare, ubumenyi n’ikoranabuhanga bavuye kuri 56.7% muri 2015 bagera kuri 63.9% muri 2018, na ho abitabira amashuri y’imyuga n’ubumenyingiro bavuye 41.8% muri 2015 bagera kuri 43.8% muri 2018, mu gihe abagore bigisha muri aya mashuri bavuye kuri 32.9% muri 2010 bakagera kuri 42.7% muri 2018.
Abagore 59.99% bafite ubutaka basangiye n’abo bashakanye mu gihe 24.63% bafite ubutaka bihariye. Ibi bigatuma 38% by’abagore bakorana n’ibigo by’imari, batanze ingwate ku butaka bwabo. Abagore bakorana n’ibigo by’imari na bo bikubye 2 mu myaka 4, aho bavuye kuri 36% muri 2012 bagera kuri 63% muri 2016.

Title: 2019: Umwaka w’amarira n’imiborogo mu birindiro by’abarwanya u Rwanda
Body:
Umwaka wa 2019 usa n’utazasibangana mu mitwe yitwa ko irwanya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, kuko usize abo udahitanye imigambi yabo iri mu kangaratete ndetse abandi bari mu mazi abira, kuko isaha iyo ari yo yose ibintu byabahindukiraho.
Umwaka wa 2019 usa n’utazasibangana mu mitwe yitwa ko irwanya Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, kuko usize abo udahitanye imigambi yabo iri mu kangaratete ndetse abandi bari mu mazi abira, kuko isaha iyo ari yo yose ibintu byabahindukiraho.
Kuva mu myaka ishize, umutwe wavugwaga cyane wari FDLR kuva mu myaka ya 2000, aho yashinzwe n’abagize uruhare muri Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994. Habanje gushingwa RDR, haza ALIR 1 na ALIR 2, nyuma yo kuba FDLR baza gutandukana havuka CNRD na RUD-Urunana.
Magingo aya FDLR na RUD Urunana ni imitwe ikomeje kubangamira umutekano w’u Rwanda, nubwo nayo itorohewe muri uyu mwaka urimo kugana ku musozo.
Umuyobozi wa FDLR yaguye muri gereza abandi bagwa mu bihuru
Muri Mata 2006 nibwo Dr Ignace Murwanashyaka wayoboraga FDLR yafatiwe mu Majyepfo y’u Budage avuye gusura abarwanyi muri RDC. Mu 2015 urukiko rwa Stuttgart rwamuhamije ibyaha hamwe na Straton Musoni wari umwungirije.
Muri Mata 2019 nibwo inkuru yabaye kimomo ko Murwanashyaka yaguye muri gereza atarangije igifungo cy’imyaka 13 yakatiwe, maze urwamutwaye rutangira kototera abamukoreye mu ngata.
Bidateye kabiri, muri uko kwezi kwa Mata nibwo Nsekanabo Jean Pierre uzwi nka Lt. Col Abega Kamara wari ushinzwe iperereza muri FDLR na Nkaka Ignace uzwi nka La Forge Fils Bazeye wari umuvugizi wayo, bagejejwe imbere y’urukiko kugira ngo baburane ku ifungwa n’ifungurwa ry’agateganyo.
Abo bombi inkuru y’ifatwa ryabo yabaye kimomo mu Ukuboza 2018, ko bafatiwe ku mupaka wa Bunagana bavuye muri Uganda mu nama yabaye hagati ya tariki 15-16 Ukuboza, yahuje abahagarariye RNC ya Kayumba Nyamwasa na FDLR.
Bivugwa ko byari ku butumire bw’ubuyobozi bwa Uganda, hagamijwe kunoza umubano hagati y’iyo mitwe y’iterabwoba n’inzego za gisirikare za Uganda no kunoza imikoranire mu migambi yo guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Uganda ushinzwe ubutwererane bw’akarere, Philemon Mateke, byatangajwe ko ari we wari umuhuza wabo, na we uyu mwaka umusize atorohewe kuko nubwo Perezida Yoweri Museveni akomeje kumuryamaho, amakuru y’iperereza akomeje kumushyira hanze ko yari n’inyuma y’igitero abarwanyi ba RUD Urunana bagabye i Musanze ahazwi nko mu Kinigi mu ijoro ryo ku wa 4 Ukwakira, kigahitana abaturage 14.
Ibya FLN byasubiwemo
Umwaka ushize waranzwe n’ibitero binyuranye byagiye byigambwa n’umutwe wa FLN, wari ufite Nsabimana Callixte wiyise Sankara, nk’umuvugizi wawo.
Muri Nyakanga 2018 abantu bitwaje intwaro zirimo n’imbunda bateye abaturage mu Murenge wa Nyabimata babasahura amatungo, ibiribwa, imyenda n’amafaranga. Mu ijoro ryo ku wa 19 Kamena 2018 nabwo abantu bitwaje imbunda, bishe barashe abantu babiri muri Nyaruguru, bakomeretsa batandatu barimo n’Umunyamabanga Nshingwabikorwa w’Umurenge wa Nyabimata, Nsengiyumva Vincent, batwika n’imodoka ye na moto y’umuturage.
Mbere yaho tariki ya 10 Kamena 2018, amabandi yitwaje intwaro gakondo hamwe n’imbunda, yateye abaturage bo mu Murenge wa Ngera mu Karere ka Nyaruguru arabakomeretsa abatwara n’imitungo irimo amafaranga, televiziyo, inkweto n’ibindi. Ibyo bitero byatangiye kujya byigambwa n’umutwe wa FLN, mu ijwi rya Nsabimana Callixte nk’umuvugizi.
Muri Mata 2019 nibwo inkuru yabaye kimomo ko Nsabimana yafatiwe muri Comores. Ubwo yagezwaga imbere y’urukiko ku wa 23 Gicurasi 2019, Nsabimana yabwiye urukiko ko nta byinshi afite byo kwireguza kuko ibyaha 16 akurikiranyweho bimwe yabikoze ku giti cye ibindi bigakorwa n’umutwe yari abereye umuvugizi.
Ubu afunzwe by’agateganyo mbere yo gutangira kuburana mu mizi, aregwa ibyaha birimo iremwa ry’umutwe w’ingabo ritemewe, Icyaha cy’iterabobwoba ku nyungu za politiki, gukora no kugira uruhare mu bikorwa by’iterabwoba, gutanga amabwiriza mu gikorwa cy’iterabwoba, kuba mu mutwe w’iterabwoba, icyaha cyo kugambana no gushishikariza abandi gukora iterabwoba n’ibyaha by’ubwicanyi n’ubwinjiracyaha bw’ubwicanyi.
Aregwa kandi gufata bugwate, gukwiza amakuru atariyo cyangwa icengezamatwara rigamije kwangisha leta y’u Rwand amu bihugu by’amahanga, guhakana Jenoside, kwiba yitwaje intwaro, gutwika, kugirana umubano na leta y’amahanga hagamijwe gushoza intambara, gukora cyangwa gukoresha impapuro mpimbano, gukubita no gukomeretsa ku bushake no gutanga, kwakira no gushishikariza kwakira ibikomoka ku iterabwoba.
Amakuru ataremezwa ahamya ko Herman Nsengimana wasimbuye Nsabimana muri FLN, na we mu minsi ishize yacakiriwe mu mashyamba ya RDC hamwe n’abandi barwanyi benshi.
Abakuru ba FDLR bishwe umusubizo
Muri Nzeri 2019 nibwo Ingabo za Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo, FARDC, zemeje ko zishe Lieutenant General Sylvestre Mudacumura wayoboraga umutwe wa FDLR, yicirwa mu gace ka Bwito mu Ntara ya Kivu y’Amajyaruguru.
Nyuma y’iminsi mike, nibwo FARDC, binyuze mu bikorwa byiswe ‘Sokola 2’ yeretse itangazamakuru bane mu barwanyi ba FDLR, bahoze ari abarinzi ba Gen Mudacumura.
Mudacumura yahoze mu Ngabo z’u Rwanda mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, yabaye mu mutwe w’abarindaga Perezida Juvenal Habyarimana ndetse yari umuyobozi wungirije wawo.
Nyuma yo gutsinda urugamba rwo kubohora igihugu n’ingabo zari iza RPA, Gen Mudacumura na bagenzi be bafashe iy’ishyamba, aho bakoreye ibyaha ndengakamere ku baturage bo mu Burasirazuba bwa RDC.
Mbere yo kwicwa, Mudacumura yashakishwaga n’urukiko mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha akekwaho ibyaha icyenda byiganjemo iby’intambara n’iyicarubozo yakoze hagati y’umwaka wa 2009 na 2010. Yagizwe Umugaba Mukuru w’Ingabo za FDLR nyuma y’itahuka rya rya General Paul Rwarakabije wawuyoboraga mbere ye.
Urukiko Mpuzamahanga mpanabyaha rw’i La Haye mu Buholandi rwamushyiriyeho impapuro zisaba ko atabwa muri yombi 13 Nyakanga 2012. Gusa yari atarafatwa.
Isasu ryavuze mu birindiro bya P5
Umutwe wa P5 umaze igihe ufite ibirindiro mu mashyamba ya RDC, ni umwe mu itarahiriwe n’imigambi yo gutera u Rwanda, nyuma yo gushingwa n’ihuriro ry’amashyaka atanu ariyo Amahoro People’s Congress, Forces Démocratiques Unifieés – Inkingi (FDU-Inkingi); People’s Defence Pact-Imanzi (PDP-Imanzi), Rwanda National Congress (RNC) na PS Imberakuri ya Bernard Ntaganda, maze uragizwa Kayumba Nyamwasa.
Uyu mutwe Kayumba aheruka kuwusaba kuvana abarwanyi bawo muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo ngo wegere umupaka wa Uganda aho bivugwa ko wari wizeye guhabwa inkunga ifatika kurusha izo wahabwaga uri hafi y’u Burundi, ariko inzira ntiyabwira umugenzi.
Ku wa 19 Mata ngo nibwo bimutse, bageze Kalehe bahura n’umutwe wa MRCD uyoborwa na Gen Irategeka, bababwira ko ngo bo batangiye akazi muri Nyungwe.
Bamaze kuruhuka ngo bakomeje urugendo "rutabahiriye na gatoya," kuko bageze muri Gatoyi i Masisi, bahuye n’ibico byinshi bya FARDC, bararaswa, bamwe bafatwa mpiri abandi bishyikiriza Monusco.
Ubwo bari imbere y’urukiko i Kigali, abenshi bahurizaga ku kuvuga ko bashyikirijwe u Rwanda ku wa 18 Kamena 2019, nubwo hari abo byamenyekanye ko batashye bucece bakanagera mu kigo kinyuzwamo abavuye ku rugerero i Mutobo, ariko mu iperereza bikaza gutahurwa ko urugendo rwabo rutacukirizwa aho, berekezwa mu nkiko.
Ubu abarwanyi 25 bayobowe na Rtd Major Mudathiru Habib bari kuburanira mu rukiko rwa gisirikare mu Rwanda, ndetse uyu we yarashwe ukuguru ku buryo kwangiritse bikomeye, ariko ntabura kurandatwa n’ingabo z’u Rwanda yiteguraga kugabaho igitero.
Gen Musabyimana wa RUD Urunana yarishwe
Mu ijoro ryo ku wa 4 Ukwakira rishyira ku wa 5 Ukwakira 2019, abagizi ba nabi biganjemo abitwaje intwaro gakondo bateye mu Murenge wa Kinigi mu Karere ka Musanze bica abaturage 14 abandi barakomereka.
Ku wa 6 Ukwakira nibwo Polisi y’u Rwanda yatangaje ko inzego z’umutekano zishe abagizi ba nabi 19 ndetse abandi batanu mu bagabye icyo gitero, bafatwa mpiri.
Nyuma y’urupfu rw’abambari be, ku wa 10 Ugushyingo 2019 Gen Musabyimana Juvenal uzwi nka Jean Michel Africa wayoboraga RUD Urunana, yishwe na FARDC.
Uyu yaguye mu gitero gikomeye FARDC yagabye mu gace ka Binza hafi y’umupaka w’iki gihugu na Uganda. Uyu mugabo wabaye mu ngabo za ex-FAR, yari umwe mu barwanyi b’umutwe wa FDLR/FOCA mbere y’uko ucikamo ibice akajya muri RUD-Urunana.
Vuruguvurugu muri RNC
Mu gihe abiyemeje gufata intwaro ngo barwanye u Rwanda bakomeje gutikira umunsi ku munsi, abibumbiye mu mutwe w’iterabwoba wa RNC nabo umwaka wa 2019 ubasize ahabi.
Uyu mwaka usize mu rungabangabo umuryango wa Benjamin Rutabana, wabuze kuva muri Nzeri ubwo yajyaga mu bikorwa by’uwo mutwe muri Uganda, ugashinja Kayumba Nyamwasa n’abandi bayobozi ba RNC kuba inyuma y’ibura rye.
Rutabana ngo yahagurutse i Bruxelles ku wa Gatatu tariki 4 Nzeri 2019 agana Entebbe muri Uganda. Yabanje guhagarara i Dubai mbere yo kugera ku kibuga cy’indege cya Entebbe ku wa 5 Nzeri saa 13:50. Yakomeje kuvugana kuri telefoni n’umugore we Diane Rutabana, ku wa 8 Nzeri ntiyongera kumva ijwi rye.
Amakuru ahamya ko Rutabana yagiranye ubwumvikane buke na bagenzi be b’abayobozi muri RNC kuko yarakajwe n’uko abarwanyi ba P5 bari mu nkiko i Kigali, mu gihe ubwo bajyaga gutabwa muri yombi, Kayumba yahaye itegeko Major Habib Mudathiru wari ubayoboye kubavana muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo bakajya ku mupaka wa Uganda, aho bazahabwa inkunga zihagije kurusha izo bahabwaga hafi y’u Burundi.
Icyo gihe ngo Kayumba yarenze ku nama zatanzwe na Rutabana, nyamara abo barwanyi bajya kwimuka, barakoresheje $12000 yoherejwe na Ben Rutabana kuri Western Union i Bujumbura.
Uburakari bwa Rutabana agashaka kwaka ibisobanuro Kayumba wagushije ingabo zabo mu biganza by’uwo bahanganye, ngo byaba impamvu yatumye ashaka ‘kumwumvisha’, kuko umusirikare muto yari ashatse kubaza byinshi ‘Jenerali’, ndetse bikekwa ko ubwo Rutabana yajyaga muri Uganda yari agiye mu bikorwa bya gisirikare, arenze ku gushaka kwa Kayumba.
Hejuru y’ibyo, bamwe mu bayobozi ba RNC muri Canada baheruka guhambirizwa bashinjwa gusuzugura ubuyobozi bukuru bw’ishyaka.
Mu birukanwe muri RNC harimo Simeon Ndwaniye wari Umuhuzabikorwa w’akarere ka Windsor na Jean Paul Ntagara wari Umuhuzabikorwa wungirije w’Intara ya Canada akaba n’umubitsi wayo, wari uherutse guhagarikwa ashinjwa gufatira umutungo w’ihuriro.
Harimo kandi Achille Kamana wari komiseri ushinzwe ubukangurambaga mu ntara ya Canada akaba n’umuhuzabikorwa w’akarere ka Ottawa-Gatineau, na Tabitha Gwiza wari komiseri ushinzwe abari n’abategarugori mu ntara ya Canada n’umubitsi mu karere ka Windsor.
Uyu Gwiza ni mushiki wa Ben Rutabana waburiwe irengero wari na komiseri ushinzwe kongera ubushobozi muri RNC, bakaba abavandimwe ba Adeline Rwigara.
Gwiza avuga ko kugeza ubu ikibazo cy’ibura rya Rutabana ahinduka umwanzi muri RNC, ku buryo urebye uko abakuru muri RNC babyitwaramo, ubona ko ari bo bari hejuru y’ibura rya Ben Rutabana.
Kugeza ubu amakuru anakomeje kuvugwa ko Kayumba Nyamwasa na we yaba atorohewe ku buyobozi bwa RNC, ku buryo isaha n’isaha ashobora kwirukanwa ku buyobozi bw’uyu mutwe mu bijyanye n’igisirikare, kimwe n’abandi bafatanya kuyobora.
Ntabwo ikibazo kirarangira
Nubwo hari abagerageje guhungabanya umutekano bakabyishyurira ikiguzi kiri hejuru, bigaragaza ko urugendo rukiri rurerure, ku buryo inzego zishinzwe umutekano ari ngombwa kugarira zigakomeza.
Umutwe wa FDLR uheruka kwimika Pacifique Ntawunguka "Omega". Mu kiganiro yahaye urubyiruko rugera kuri 200 rubarizwa mu muryango w’abanyeshuri barokotse Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu 1994, mu 2016, Umujyanama wa Perezida wa Repubulika mu by’umutekano, Gen James Kabarebe, yahishuye uburyo Gen Ntawunguka wamubwiye ko azagaruka mu Rwanda ari uko nta mututsi ukirurimo.
Hari kandi n’umuyobozi mukuru wa FDLR, Gen Byiringiro Victor Rumuli bakunze kwita Victor Rumuri cyangwa Michel Byiringiro.
Uretse abo, mu minsi ishize nibwo Faustin Twagiramungu uba mu Bubiligi, yumvikanye ashishikariza abantu batandukanye kwinjira mu mitwe irwanya Leta y’u Rwanda, aho ubu ari umwe mu bayobozi b’ihuriro MRCD rifite umutwe wa FLN. Ni umutwe ahuriramo na Paul Rusesabagina wamenyekanye kubera Hotel Rwanda.
Ku wa Gatanu nibwo Perezida wa Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo, aho iyi mitwe yose yabonye urubuga rwo gucura imigambi yayo, Felix Tshisekedi, yatangarije Inteko Ishinga amategeko ko mu bikorwa byo kurwanya imitwe yitwaje intwaro ikorera muri icyo gihugu, ingabo z’igihugu zimaze gufata abarwanyi 1712 b’umutwe wa CNRD.
Yavuze ko ubwo yageraga ku butegetsi, ibice bitandukanye by’igihugu byari byugarijwe n’ibikorwa by’imitwe yitwaje intwaro, ariko uyu munsi, kubera guhamagararira iyi mitwe gushyira intwaro hasi n’ibikorwa bya FARDC, amahoro amaze kugaruka muri Kasai, ndetse no muri Tanganyika ni mu gihe cya vuba.
Gusa ngo ikibazo gikomeye gisigaye mu majyaruguru mu bice bya Beni na Butembo, muri Ituri, mu bice bya Minembwe, Uvira, Baraka na Fizi, Shabunda na Kalehe.
Yakomeje ati “Ku baturuka Kalehe, ndashaka gushimira ingabo zacu zimaze gusenya 95% by’ibirindiro by’umutwe witwaje intwaro wa CNRD, aho abarenga 1712 bafashwe, barimo 245 bitwaje intwaro n’abayobozi 10 mu bya politiki b’uwo mutwe w’abagizi ba nabi.”
Yashimangiye ko ibikorwa Guverinoma ye yatangije byo gutsinsura imitwe yitwaje intwaro bidateze guhagarara, kugeza igihe iyi mitwe izavira burundu ku butaka bw’igihugu.

Title: U Burusiya n’u Bufaransa mu ihangana ryeruye ryo kwigarurira Centrafrique
Body:
Centrafrique ni igihugu cyakunze kugaragra nk’ikidashamaje cyane ibihugu bikomeye nubwo gifite umutungo kamere nka diyama, zahabu na Uranium. Nubwo kandi gifite ubutunzi kamere bwinshi, nacyo ubwacyo nta bushobozi gifite bwo kububyaza umusaruro.
Centrafrique ni igihugu cyakunze kugaragra nk’ikidashamaje cyane ibihugu bikomeye nubwo gifite umutungo kamere nka diyama, zahabu na Uranium. Nubwo kandi gifite ubutunzi kamere bwinshi, nacyo ubwacyo nta bushobozi gifite bwo kububyaza umusaruro.
Ni igihugu cyaranzwe n’intambara z’urudaca kuva cyabona ubwigenge. Inshuro nyinshi cyakunze kubaho ku nkunga y’igisirikare cy’amahanga.
Igihugu cyadutsemo imvururu mu 2012 zasize ibihumbi by’abaturage bishwe, abasaga miliyoni bava mu byabo. Izo mvururu zaturutse ku nyeshyamba ziyitirira kuba izo mu idini ya Islam, Séléka n’iz’abakirisitu ziyise anti Balaka.
Muri Gashyantare 2019 i Khartoum, Leta yasinye amasezerano n’imitwe 14 y’inyeshyamba, bitanga agahenge ariko ntibyahagaritse ibitero n’ubwicanyi bikozwe na bamwe.
Muri iyi myaka ishize, icyo gihugu cyabengutswe n’ibihugu bikomeye by’umwihariko u Bufaransa bwabanye nacyo kuva mu bukoloni n’u Burusiya buje vuba.
Ihangana ry’u Burusiya n’u Bufaransa muri Centrafrique
Mu Ugushyingo 2017, Loni yakuriyeho u Burusiya ibihano ku kugurisha intwaro muri Centrafrique maze icyo gihugu gitangira kugurishayo intwaro nto. Guhera ubwo u Burusiya bwatangiye kwiyegereza icyo gihugu mu bya gisirikare kugeza aho bwanatanze umujyanama wihariye mu by’umutekano wa Perezida Faustin-Archange Touadéra.
Mu majyepfo ashyira uburengerazuba bw’Umurwa Mukuru Bangui, hashinzwe ikigo cy’imyitozo ya gisirikare aho abasirikare ba Centrafrique batozwa n’Abarusiya ari naho hafatwa nk’ibirindiro bikuru bya gisirikare.
U Burusiya ni nabwo bwagize uruhare mu isinywa ry’amasezerano y’amahoro aherutse hagati ya Leta n’imitwe 14 y’inyeshyamba. Uko kwiyegereza Centrafrique k’u Burusiya ntikwashimishije na gato u Bufaransa, bwabaye muri icyo gihugu guhera mu bihe by’ubukoloni.
U Bufaransa, umutware ushaje
Mu gihe cy’ubukoloni, hari igice cyiswe Ubangi-Shari cyahoze mu cyitwaga Afrique-Équatoriale française, igice kirimo ibihugu nka Tchad, Gabon na Congo cyakolonizwaga n’u Bufaransa.
Icyo gice cyaje kujya kuri Centrafrique. Muri icyo gihe, ubutegetsi bw’u Bufaransa muri Ubangi-Shari bwaranzwe no gusahura bujyana mu Bufaransa, gufata nabi abaturage no kwica bamwe mu baturage.
Ibyo byatumye abaturage binubira u Bufaransa. Icyakora na nyuma y’ubukoloni, u Bufaransa bwakomeje kugira ijambo rikomeye ku butegetsi bwa Centrafrique ariko abaturage basa nk’abatabyishimiye.
Uruhare rw’u Bufaransa rwakomeje guhamya ibirindiro ndetse hafi buri muyobozi wese wayoboye Centrafrique yajyagaho ku ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi ryagizwemo uruhare n’u Bufaransa.
Urugero nka François Bozizé yagiye ku butegetsi mu 2003 ku ihirikwa ry’ubutegetsi ryateguwe n’u Bufaransa. Icyo gihe u Bufaransa bwabonaga uwari perezida, Ange-Félix Patassé atangiye kubatera umugongo.
Ibintu byatangiye guhinduka mu 2013 ubwo Centrafrique yabonaga Perezida mushya, Michel Djotodia wari uyoboye inyeshyamba za Séléka zahiritse Bozizé nyuma yo gusinyana amasezerano akanga kuyashyira mu bikorwa.
Djotodia ni we Perezida wa mbere Centrafrique yagize nta ruhare rugaragara rw’u Bufaransa mu kujyaho kwe.
Djotodia amaze kujya ku butegetsi, bamwe mu ngabo ze za Séléka batangiye kugenda bica abaturage hirya no hino mu gihugu cyane cyane abakirisitu. Byabaye ikibazo gikomeye Perezida ananirwa kubihagarika, afata umwanzuro wo gusesa Séléka nubwo nabyo bisa nk’ibitarahise bitanga umusaruro.
Mu Ukuboza 2013, ubugizi bwa nabi muri Centrafrique bwari bumaze gukaza umurego, inyeshyambva za Séléka zibasiye abakirisitu, n’inyeshyamba z’abakirisitu, anti –Balaka zibasiye abaturage b’abayisilamu ku buryo Umuryango w’Abibumbye wagize impungenge ko bishobora kuba Jenoside.
Akanama ka Loni gashinzwe umutekano kahise kemeza kohereza ingabo muri icyo gihugu mu butumwa bw’amahoro bwiswe MISCA. Nubwo Loni yari yemeje ko ingabo zijya muri ubwo butumwa ziba izo ku mugabane wa Afurika, u Bufaransa bwasabye ko bwajya gutanga ubufasha bw’igihe gito, bwiswe Operation Sangaris.
Abasesenguzi bavuga ko kugaruka k’u Bufaransa atari impuhwe nyinshi bwari bufitiye Centrafrique ahubwo ari ukwisubiza ijambo ryabwo muri icyo gihugu cyagendaga ritakara.
Ubufasha bw’u Bufaransa ntacyo bwakoze ngo buhagarike ubugizi bwa nabi nubwo bwari buri gushora amafaranga menshi muri icyo gikorwa, na nyuma y’aho Perezida Djotodia avuye ku butegetsi. Isura y’u Bufaransa muri icyo gihugu yarushijeho guhindana ubwo hasokaga raporo ivuga ko ingabo z’u Bufaransa zafashe abagore n’abakobwa ku ngufu muri Centrafrique.
Muri Gashyantare 2016, hatowe Perezida mushya Faustin-Archange Touadéra, u Bufaransa buvana ingabo zabwo muri icyo gihugu zisimburwa n’iz’Umuryango w’Abibumbye, mu butumwa bwiswe MINUSCA.
Mu gihe ingabo z’u Bufaransa zari zivuye muri Centrafrique, u Burusiya bwabonye icyuho, butangira gufasha no gutera inkunga igisirikare na Leta ya Centrafrique.
Nyuma y’uko ingabo z’u Bufaransa ziviriye muri icyo gihugu mu 2016, Perezida Touadéra wari ukimara gutorwa yabonye ko byaba byiza ashatse ikindi gihugu gikomeye yishingikiriza.
U Bufaransa n’ibindi bihugu by’i Burayi byatangiye gukemanga ubufasha bw’u Burusiya, nubwo icyo gihugu cyo kivuga ko kirajwe ishinga no kugarura amahoro, ibindi bihugu bisanga ari uburyo bwo kugira ijambo rinini mu bihugu cyane ibya Afurika.
Bamwe bakeka ko u Burusiya bufasha icyo gihugu mu bya gisirikare ngo buhabwe umutungo kamere urimo amabuye y’agaciro yifashishwa mu gukora ibyuma by’ikoranabuhanga. Mu by’ukuri amasezerano ari hagati y’u Burusiya na Centrafrique ntarashyirwa ahagaragara ari nabyo bitera inkeke u Bufaransa, u Burayi na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Ikirushaho gutera inkeke ibi bihugu, ni uko u Burusiya bwaje muri Centrafrique no mu buryo bw’abikorera. Byinshi mu bigo bicunga umutekano bituruka mu Burusiya, nk’icyizwi cyane cyitwa Wagner Group.
Bivugwa ko kandi u Burusiya bwabonye amasezerano atandukanye yo gucukura diyama na zahabu mu bice bigenzurwa n’inyeshyamba ari nabyo byatumye bwinjira mu bikorwa byo guhuza impande zitavuga rumwe.
Mu 2018, u Burusiya bwagoganye n’Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe mu guhuza impande zitavuga rumwe. U Burusiya bwashakaga guhuza izo mpande mu buryo bwabwo mu gihe Afurika Yunze Ubumwe nayo yashakaga kubikora ukwayo. Iyo migirire y’u Burusiya yamaganywe cyane n’ibihugu by’amahanga birimo u Burayi na Amerika.
Icyakora, Afurika Yunze Ubumwe yaje kubasha kwiyegurira ubwo buhuza bw’u Burusiya ari nabyo byabyaye amasezerano y’amahoro yo muri Gashyantare 2019. Bamwe mu bayobozi b’imitwe y’inyeshyamba bahawe ubuyobozi muri Guverinoma nubwo bitahagaritse ubugizi bwa nabi nkuko byari byitezwe.
Abaturage benshi ba Centrafrique bishimira icyemezo Perezida wabo yafashe, cyo kwigizayo u Bufaransa bwaranzwe no gutoba icyo gihugu kuva kibonye ubwigenge. Icyakora, ntibashimishijwe n’uburyo amasezerano ya Khartoum yagenze kuko ubutabera bwaguranywe amahoro nayo batarabona neza kugeza ubu.
Ni ukuvuga ko abaturage basanga aho guhana abo bari mu mitwe y’inyeshyamba bishe ibihumbi by’abaturage, bagororewe imyanya muri Leta.
Uko kwinjira k’u Burusiya muri iki gihugu kandi byaciyemo ibice abari muri Leta kuko hari abiyumva ku ruhande rw’Abafaransa n’abandi biyumva ku ruhande rw’Abarusiya.
Perezida wa Centrafrique ubwo yahuraga na Vladmir Putin w’u Burusiya mu Ukwakira uyu mwaka yavuze ko bakeneye inkunga nyinshi ya gisirikare ivuye ku Barusiya.
Yagize ati “Hakenewe intwaro zikomeye ngo tugire igisirikare gihamye. Twizeye ko abafatanyabikorwa bacu b’Abarusiya bazaduha intwaro nini, imodoka z’intambara, imbunda zikomeye n’izindi ntwaro zizadufasha kugira ubushobozi mu by’ingabo n’umutekano.”
Icyakora ntabwo u Burusiya burabasha kwirukana burundu u Bufaransa muri Centrafrique. Hari agatsinda gato k’abasirikare b’u Bufaransa gafatanya n’ingabo za Centrafrique kurinda ikibuga cy’indege. Iki gihugu kandi cyiracyatanga ubufasha ku ngabo za Loni ziri mu butumwa bw’amahoro muri Centrafrique.
Icyo gihugu kandi ifaranga bakoresha ni iry’ibihugu byahoze bikolonijwe n’u Bufaransa, CFA, n’amadevize menshi y’icyo gihugu ari muri Banki Nkuru y’u Bufaransa.
U Burusiya n’u Bufaransa bisa n’ibyatangiye no guhangana mu itangazamakuru. Nko muri Kamena 2019, Ibiro Ntaramakuru by’Abarusiya byatangaje ko abanyamakuru batatu b’Abarusiya bishwe umwaka ushize bari muri Centrafrique bigizwemo uruhare n’intasi z’u Bufaransa.
Icyakora nubwo ibihugu byombi bigihataniye ubutware muri Centrafrique, imvururu zo ntizahagaze ndetse uko guhangana gushobora gusubiza ibintu irudubi, hakaduka izindi nyeshyamba zishamikiye ku kutumvikana kwabyo cyangwa kimwe kikaba cyatera inkunga imitwe y’inyeshyamba kigamije kwirukana ikindi.

Title: Kuryumaho k’u Bubiligi kuri Twagiramungu uhamagarira abantu kujya mu mutwe w’iterabwoba kwamaganiwe kure
Body:
Hanze aha benshi bakomeje kwamagana bikomeye uburyo Guverinoma y’u Bubiligi icumbikiye Faustin Twagiramungu n’inzego z’umutekano z’icyo gihugu bikomeje kuruca bikarumira nyuma y’aho uyu mukambwe agaragaye ari kuvuga amagambo akangurira abanyarwanda kuyoboka umutwe w’iterabwoba FLN ndetse anabasaba kurwanya leta y’u Rwanda hifashishijwe intwaro n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubugizi bwa nabi.
Hanze aha benshi bakomeje kwamagana bikomeye uburyo Guverinoma y’u Bubiligi icumbikiye Faustin Twagiramungu n’inzego z’umutekano z’icyo gihugu bikomeje kuruca bikarumira nyuma y’aho uyu mukambwe agaragaye ari kuvuga amagambo akangurira abanyarwanda kuyoboka umutwe w’iterabwoba FLN ndetse anabasaba kurwanya leta y’u Rwanda hifashishijwe intwaro n’ibindi bikorwa by’ubugizi bwa nabi.
Si ubwa mbere Twagiramungu atangaje amagambo atavugwaho rumwe bigatera benshi kumwamaganira kure kuko n’umwaka ushize yagiye kuri Twitter yandika ko Jenoside mu Rwanda yakozwe na FPR hamwe n’Ingabo zari iza FAR. Icyo gihe yokejwe igitutu ku mbuga nkoranyambaga biratinda.
Ubushinjacyaha bw’u Rwanda nabwo icyo gihe bwatangaje ko bwiteguye gukora iperereza ku magambo ya Faustin Twagiramungu uba mu buhungiro mu Bubiligi, kuko ashobora kuba agize ibyaha byo gupfobya Jenoside.
Muri Kamena uyu mwaka, Twagiramungu w’imyaka 74 yinjiye ku mugaragaro mu ihuriro MRCD riyobowe na Paul Rusesabagina, mu bufatanye bwiswe ubwo guhuza imbaraga mu kurwanya ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda, hakoreshejwe inzira zose.
Iryo huriro rishamikiyeho umutwe w’inyeshyamba wa FLN wagiye wigamba inshuro nyinshi kugaba ibitero by’iterabwoba ku baturage mu Ntara y’Amajyepfo n’Iburengerazuba bigahitana bamwe. FLN kandi irimo abahoze muri FDLR, biganjemo abasize bakoze Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Twagiramungu yahise agirwa Visi Perezida wa MRCD aba n’umuvugizi wayo.
Ku mbuga nkoranyambaga guhera kuri iki cyumweru, hatangiye gukwirakwiza igice cy’amashusho agize ikiganiro Twagiramungu yagiranye na bimwe mu binyamakuru bishamikiye ku barwanya Leta y’u Rwanda baba mu mahanga.
Ni amashusho arimo amagambo akarishye, ahamagarira abanyarwanda kwinjira mu mutwe wa FLN.
Umunyamakuru yumvikana abaza Twagiramungu ati “Ubwo murasaba abanyarwanda gusanga FLN ngo nabo bajye kurwana?”
Twagiramungu yamusubije agira ati “Cyane. Ndabivuga ndanguruye ijwi cyane. Ntabwo dushobora gupfa nk’ibimonyo. Yafashe intwaro azifatishije amaboko abiri, twe tuzazifatisha amaboko abiri twongereho ahari n’izindi ngufu.”
Mu bagaragaje ko Twagiramungu akabije kurengera, ku isonga harimo Umunyambaganga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Amb Olivier Nduhungirehe.
Abinyujije kuri Twitter yagize ati “Ntabwo bikwiriye kubona umuntu utuye ku butaka bw’u Bubiligi ahamagarira ku mugaragaro abanyarwanda kwinjira mu mutwe witwaje intwaro uri guteza umutekano muri RDC no mu karere.”
"Journalist: So, you urge Rwandans to join FLN [armed group in eastern DRC] & to fight?@FTwagiramungu: Absolutely!"
It's unacceptable to see a Belgian resident openly calling, from the Belgian territory, Rwandans to join an armed group that is destabilising #DRC & the region. https://t.co/BYQWTJMmQV
— Amb. Olivier J.P. Nduhungirehe (@onduhungirehe) December 1, 2019
Ubwo butumwa bwa Nduhungirehe bwakurikiwe n’ubundi butandukanye, bwose busaba Guverinoma y’u Bubiligi gufata Twagiramungu amagambo avuga akayasobanura imbere y’ubutabera.
Umuyobozi mu Rwego rw’Igihugu rw’Imiyoborere (RGB) Ushinzwe Imitwe ya Politiki n’Imiryango Itari iya Leta, Justus Kangwagye yagize ati “Kwita kuri ibi cyangwa kutabyitaho k’u Bubiligi, nibyo bizagaragaza aho buhagaze.”
Uwitwa Jules Kayitsinga yagize ati “Ariko ko avugira i Bruxelles, naze ajye gufata iyo mbunda maze arebe uko bamubagira ibisiga dayimoni ze zikagenda zigiye dore ko bizi gushukana gusa byo byibereye i Burayi. Uyu Twagiramungu akwiriye gutabwa muri yombi sinzi icyo Guverinoma y’u Bubiligi itegereje.”
Kanangire Christian na we akoresheje Twitter, yavuze ko bibabaje kuba Twagiramungu akomeje kuvuga amagambo nk’ayo, ubutegetsi bw’u Bubiligi abamo bwicecekeye.
Yagize ati “Minisiteri y’ububanyi n’amahanga y’u Bubiligi yaba izi ko umuturage wabo Faustin Twagiramungu ari guhamagarira abantu kujya mu bikorwa bihungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda? Byaba se byemewe n’amategeko y’u Bubiligi? Amaze igihe kinini mu bikorwa bigamije guhungabanya u Rwanda ariko ntabibazwe na Guverinoma y’u Bubiligi n’inzego zishinzwe umutekano.”
Damien Nkaka we yavuze ko biteye isoni ku muntu nka Twagiramungu, ushuka urubyiruko kureka gukora ibiteza imbere igihugu ngo bajye mi ishyamba, mu gihe abana be bo bameze neza.
Ati “Umukuru mubi Rukokoma! Wiyemeje gushora urubyiruko mu ntambara wigaramiye i Burayi! Ngaho rero murusome urwo mwashigishe! Ikibabaza ni abo mushora mu ntambara abanyu biga za Burayi za Amerika, abandi mubakiniraho Politiki y’amabwa.”
Si ubwa mbere abanyarwanda bagaragaje ko u Bubiligi busa nk’ubwabaye ikibuga cy’abategura ibikorwa bigamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda. Icyo gihugu cyavuzweho kenshi kwemerera bamwe mu banyarwanda bahaba kujya gusura no gukora ubukangurambaga bugamije inkunga zo gufasha imitwe y’iterabwoba n’indi ifite intego yo guhirika ubutegetsi bw’u Rwanda ku mbaraga.
Ku bijyanye n’ibyo Twagiramungu ashinjwa, mu gitabo cy’amategeko ahana ibyaha mu Rwanda, ingingo ya 200 ivuga ko umuntu wese urema umutwe w’ingabo utemewe, ushishikariza abandi kuwujyamo, utuma uremwa cyangwa ugirana amasezerano na wo, abikoresheje impano, igihembo, iterabwoba, igitugu cyangwa kwizezwa izindi nyungu abigirira gushyigikira igitero cy’intambara cy’ingabo zindi zitari izemewe z’igihugu aba akoze icyaha. Iyo abihamijwe n’urukiko, ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’imyaka icumi (ariko kitarenze imyaka cumi n’itanu.
Ingingo ya 204 ivuga ko umuntu wese, mu ruhame, ukoresha imvugo, inyandiko z’ubwoko bwose, amashusho cyangwa ibimenyetso by’amoko yose, bimanitswe, bitanzwe, biguzwe cyangwa bigurishijwe cyangwa bitangajwe mu bundi buryo bwose, uwangisha rubanda ubutegetsi buriho, utera imvururu mu baturage ashaka ko basubiranamo cyangwa utera rubanda intugunda ashaka kubyutsa imidugararo muri Repubulika y’u Rwanda, aba akoze icyaha. Iyo abihamijwe n’urukiko, ahanishwa igifungo kitari munsi y’imyaka icumi ariko kitarenze imyaka cumi n’itanu.
Twagiramungu yabaye Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Rwanda nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, ageza mu 1995 ubwo yeguraga. Yahungiye mu Bubiligi agaruka mu 2003 aje kwiyamamariza umwanya w’Umukuru w’Igihugu nk’umukandida wigenga, gusa aza gutsindwa aho yagize amajwi 3.62% mu gihe Perezida Paul Kagame yagize 95.0%.

Title: Besigye yahakanye ibyo guhura na Perezida Kagame, anavuga ku bibazo by’u Rwanda na Uganda
Body:
Kizza Besigye yabeshyuje amakuru yakwirakwijwe na leta Uganda ko muri Nzeri yahuriye na Perezida Kagame muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, avuga ko uwo muhuro utigeze ubaho, gusa ko nubwo yagira abayobozi ahura nabo bitageze aha Museveni wahuye n’abakuriye umutwe w’iterabwoba ushaka guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda.
Kizza Besigye yabeshyuje amakuru yakwirakwijwe na leta Uganda ko muri Nzeri yahuriye na Perezida Kagame muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, avuga ko uwo muhuro utigeze ubaho, gusa ko nubwo yagira abayobozi ahura nabo bitageze aha Museveni wahuye n’abakuriye umutwe w’iterabwoba ushaka guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda.
Kizza Besigye yabigarutseho mu kiganiro yagiranye n’ikinyamakuru The East African, aho yavuze ku ngingo zitandukanye zirimo politiki mu gihugu cye.
Ku wa 28 Nzeri ikinyamakuru cya Guverinoma ya Uganda The New Vision, cyatangaje inkuru yari ifite umutwe ugira uti “Besigye na Kagame bahuriye muri USA.”
Inkuru y’uguhura kwa Perezida Kagame na Museveni yashoboraga guhabwa uburemere idakwiye bijyanye n’uburyo Col (Rtd) Dr Kizza Besigye, akunze guhangana na Museveni mu buryo bweruye ariko akoresheje ishyaka rya politiki ryemewe, mu gihe u Rwanda rushinja Museveni gushyigikira imitwe y’iterabwoba igamije guhungabanya umutekano warwo.
Besigye yabajijwe ku byavuzwe ku guhura kwe na Perezida Kagame, niba koko byarabayeho nibyo baba baraganiriye. Mu gusubiza, yabihakanye yivuye inyuma anashimangira ko nta na gahunda yo guhura ihari.
Ati “Ntabwo nigeze mpura na Perezida Kagame, ndetse nta na gahunda yo guhura nawe. Ubwo mperuka mu Rwanda ni igihe Gen Fred Rwigema yari agiye gushyingurwa mu cyubahiro mu 1995.”
Besigye yavuze ko “mu bigaragara hari intambara hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda” gusa ashimangira ko abona nta nyungu u Rwanda rwagira mu kurwana n’iki gihugu cy’igituranyi.
Yakomeje agira ati “ Museveni yemeye ko yahuye ku mpamvu zitandukanye n’abayobozi b’umutwe witwaje intwaro ushaka guhungabanya u Rwanda.”
“Ntabwo ntekereza ko u Rwanda rushaka kurwana na Uganda, kuko kurwana na Uganda bizasubiza inyuma u Rwanda mu ngeri nyinshi. Uyu mubano w’imbeba n’injangwe ukwiriye kubonwa guhera mu myaka y’ishingwa rya FPR ubwo Museveni yayifataga nk’uburyo bwe bwo kwagura ubutegetsi.”
Besigye yavuze ko kuba Uganda ivuga ko yagiranye ibiganiro na Perezida Kagame ari uburyo bwo gushaka kuyobya uburari ku bibazo bihari iki gihugu gikwiye gukemura.
Ati “Nk’uko tujya tubivuga mu rurimi rwa gisirikare, ubu bari gushyira imbere intwaro z’ubwirinzi, mu kuvuga ko Besigye yahuye na Kagame. Ariko niyo nza kuba ndi uhura na Kagame, ntabwo ndi umuntu urwanya leta nkoresheje intwaro. Ndi umuyobozi wemewe. Mfite uburenganzira bwose bwo guhura n’abayobozi bo mu karere kacu, yaba abo mu Rwanda, Kenya cyangwa se ikindi gihugu.”
“Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba Museveni yiyita ko ahagazeho, ni ubufatanye hagati y’abaturage bo mu bihugu biwugiye, ntabwo ari ingoma y’ubutegetsi bwawo.”
Aya makuru yo guhura kwa Besigye na Kagame yakwirakwijwe na Uganda, akijya hanze yamaganywe n’abayobozi batandukanye b’u Rwanda barimo Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Olivier Nduhungirehe, na Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Uganda.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Nduhungirehe Olivier, yavuze ko ko inkuru z’uko guhura ari impuha.
Ati “Ibi ni bimwe mu binyoma n’icengezamatwara ribi komisiyo ihuriweho yashyizweho n’amasezerano ya Luanda hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda yiyemeje guhagarika!”
Uwo wari umwe mu myanzuro y’inama ya mbere yahuje intumwa z’u Rwanda na Uganda hari n’abahuza bo muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo na Angola, yabereye muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’amahanga y’u Rwanda ku wa 16 Nzeri 2019.
Haganirwaga ku ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’amasezerano yasinywe hagati ya Uganda n’u Rwanda, i Luanda muri Angola ku wa 21 Kanama.
Umwanzuro wavugaga ko ibihugu byombi "byemeranyije guhagarika icengezamatwara iryo ari ryo ryose ribangamiye kimwe muri ibi bihugu, ryaba irinyuzwa mu bitangazamakuru byemewe cyangwa imbuga nkoranyambaga."
Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Uganda nayo yavuze ko gukwiza amakuru nk’aya “bigomba guhagarara”, kuko “amasezerano ya Luanda adashobora gushyirwa mu bikorwa hakiri icengezamatwara nk’iri.”
Fake news @newvisionwire!
This is the kind of lies and negative propaganda that the Ad Hoc Commission of the #Luanda Memorandum of Understanding between #Rwanda and #Uganda committed to stop! https://t.co/wYTgPz4PzR
— Amb. Olivier Nduhungirehe (@onduhungirehe) September 28, 2019
Fake news @newvisionwire @rkabushenga
The Ad Hoc Commission of the #Luanda Memorandum of Understanding between #Rwanda and #Uganda can not be implemented with such negative propaganda, it must stop. pic.twitter.com/4e1G9porja
