Title: U Rwanda rwasabye Uganda guhindura itariki y’ibiganiro ku mubano w’ibihugu byombi
Body:
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yandikiye iya Uganda iyisaba ko ibiganiro ku iyubahirizwa ry’amasezerabo yashyiriweho umukono i Luanda muri Angola byagombaga kubera i Kampala muri Uganda ku wa 18 uku kwezi bisubikwa.
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda yandikiye iya Uganda iyisaba ko ibiganiro ku iyubahirizwa ry’amasezerabo yashyiriweho umukono i Luanda muri Angola byagombaga kubera i Kampala muri Uganda ku wa 18 uku kwezi bisubikwa.
Ibaruwa isaba isubikwa ry’ibi biganiro byagombaga kuba ku nshuro ya kabiri nyuma y’ibiheruka kubera i Kigali ku wa 16 Nzeri, yatanzwe na Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri iki gihugu kuri uyu wa Kane.
Ni inama ya kabiri irimo gutegurwa ya komisiyo ihuriweho y’u Rwanda na Uganda yashyizweho n’amasezerano hagati ya Perezida Paul Kagame na Yoweri Museveni basinyiye i Luanda muri Angola, ku wa 21 Kanama, agamije guhosha ubwumvikane buke bumaze iminsi hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Amb. Nduhungirehe Olivier, yabwiye IGIHE ko u Rwanda rwandikiye Uganda rusaba ko ibiganiro byari biteganyijwe ku wa mbere w’icyumweru gitaha bisubikwa kubera ko abari kuzaruhagarira bafite izindi nshingano bazaba barimo.
Ati “Twasabye ko iyi nama isubikwa kubera ko bamwe mu bagize itsinda ryacu bagombaga kujya Kampala [mu biganiro] batari kuboneka kubera izindi nshingano bafite.”
Amb. Nduhungirehe utavuze byinshi kuri izo nshingano, yavuze ko ibaruwa imenyesha izo mpinduka u Rwanda rwayohereje mu gitindo cyo ku wa 14 Ugushyingo, runasaba Uganda yari kuzakira abazitabira kurumenyesha indi tariki ikaganirwaho.
Ati “Twanasabye Guverinoma ya Uganda kutumenyesha indi tariki twakumvikanaho kugira ngo iyo nama iterane. Twabandikiye ejo mu gitondo, turacyategereje.”
Umuvugizi wa Guverinoma, Ofwono Opondo, yanditse kuri Twitter yemeza ko babimenyeshejwe kandi ‘u Rwanda nirwo rwasabye ko bisubikwa, itariki nshya izatangazwa’.
Izi mpinduka zibaye nyuma y’uko ubutumire Uganda yaheruka guha u Rwanda kuri iyi nama yifuzaga ko iba ku wa 13 Ugushyingo bwabanje gutangazwa n’ikinyamakuru Chimpreports cyo muri Uganda u Rwanda rutaramenyeshwa, ibintu Amb. Nduhungirehe yavuze ko bitangaje.
Icyo gihe yanditse kuri Twitter ati “Biratangaje kumenyera ibi mu binyamakuru byo muri Uganda. Ntabwo u Rwanda rwigeze ruganirizwa ku itariki iyo ari yo yose, kandi yaba Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga y’u Rwanda cyangwa Ambasade y’u Rwanda muri Uganda, nta wakiriye ubwo butumire.”
Ibibazo hagati y’ibihugu byombi byafashe indi ntera ubwo mu myaka ibiri ishize Abanyarwanda batangiye gufatirwa muri Uganda bagakorerwa iyicarubozo, abandi bagafungwa mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko, bashinjwa kuba intasi z’u Rwanda.
Icyo kibazo cyiyongereyeho kubangamira ubucuruzi bw’Abanyarwanda muri Uganda, ndetse Uganda ishinjwa gutera inkunga imitwe yitwaje intwaro igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda. Ni impamvu zatumye u Rwanda rugira inama abaturage barwo yo "kutajya muri Uganda."
Mu nama ya mbere, u Rwanda rwahaye Uganda urutonde rw’Abanyarwanda bafungiwe muri icyo gihugu, yemera kugenzura ayo makuru hagamijwe ko abari kuri urwo rutonde banyuzwa mu nzira zigenwa n’ubutabera, no kurekura abo bizagaragara ko nta bimenyetso bihari cyangwa ibyaha bakurikiranwaho.
Ibiganiro bitegerejwe kubera muri Uganda bizibanda ku kureba niba ibyaganiriweho mu nama ya mbere birimo kubahirizwa uko bikwiye.

Title: Minisiteri eshanu, Perezida w’imitwe yombi y’Inteko: Biruta, Umunyapolitiki wadomye mu mfuruka zose
Body:
22 na 23, niyo mibare y’ingenzi isobanura urugendo rwa Dr Vincent Biruta muri politiki y’u Rwanda. Ni we muntu umaze igihe kinini muri Guverinoma y’u Rwanda kurusha abandi bose bayirimo uyu munsi kuko yayinjiyemo bwa mbere mu 1997 nka Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, bisobanuye ko amaze imyaka 22 ayikandagiyemo ndetse ni Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa 23 w’u Rwanda kuva rwabona ubwigenge.
22 na 23, niyo mibare y’ingenzi isobanura urugendo rwa Dr Vincent Biruta muri politiki y’u Rwanda. Ni we muntu umaze igihe kinini muri Guverinoma y’u Rwanda kurusha abandi bose bayirimo uyu munsi kuko yayinjiyemo bwa mbere mu 1997 nka Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, bisobanuye ko amaze imyaka 22 ayikandagiyemo ndetse ni Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa 23 w’u Rwanda kuva rwabona ubwigenge.
Ni umwe mu bagabo bayoboye mu nzego zitandukanye kandi zikomeye mu gihugu, kuko usibye kuba Minisitiri, yicaye mu mwanya wa kabiri ukomeye mu gihugu, aho yari Perezida wa Sena mu gihe cy’imyaka umunani.
Ni umugabo wubatse amateka kuva kera, kuko yize ibijyanye n’ubuganga ndetse abikora mu bihe u Rwanda rwari rukomerewe, aho yatanze umusanzu ukomeye mu kuvura Ingabo za RPA zari muri CND mu gihe we n’umuryango we bari bahahungiye.
Afite ubunararibonye muri politiki y’u Rwanda
Dr Biruta usanzwe ari Perezida w’ishyaka rya PSD, amaze kuyobora Minisiteri eshanu kandi zifite inshingano zitandukanye, ndetse zinahabanye gusa zihuriye ku kubaka u Rwanda.
Kuva mu 1997 kugera mu 1999, yinjiye muri Guverinoma nka Minisitiri w’Ubuzima, nyuma yaho amara umwaka umwe [kugera mu 2000] ari Minisitiri w’Imirimo rusange, gutwara abantu n’itumanaho.
Yayoboye kandi Inteko Ishinga Amategeko mu gihe cy’inzibacyuho mu myaka itatu hagati ya 2000 na 2003, aho yavuye aba Perezida wa Sena kugera mu 2011.
Mu Ukuboza 2011, yagizwe Minisitiri w’Uburezi kugeza muri Nyakanga 2014, nyuma yaho agirwa Minisitiri w’Umutungo Kamere yaje guhindurwa Minisiteri y’Ibidukikije kugera ku wa Kane Ugushyingo 2019 ubwo yagirwaga Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga.
Yahise aba Minisitiri wa 23 uyoboye Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga kuva u Rwanda rwabona ubwigenge, n’uwa 10 nyuma ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi.
Ni umwe muri 14 bayoboye iyi Minisiteri batarigeze baba aba Ambasaderi b’u Rwanda n’uwa cyenda uyiyoboye yarabaye umuyobozi w’izindi minisiteri.
Avuga neza indimi mpuzamahanga
Kimwe mu by’ingenzi mu kuyobora iyi Minisiteri, ni ukuba uyihabwa agomba kuba azi nibura indimi ebyiri mpuzamahanga zikoreshwa cyane mu bubanyi n’amahanga, ari zo Igifaransa n’Icyongereza.
Izi ndimi zikenewe mu ruhando mpuzamahanga, hafatiwe ku miryango u Rwanda rubarizwamo, runafitemo inshingano.
Biruta waminuje mu bijyanye n’ubuganga muri Université Libre de Bruxelles, avuga neza Igifaransa hamwe n’Icyongereza, bimugira umugabo ushoboye kuri iyi ngingo.
Yanditse izina ku rwego mpuzamahanga
Inama mpuzamahanga nyinshi zigamije kwiga ku bijyanye no kubungabunga ibidukikije zabaye kuva mu 2014, Dr Biruta yarazitabiriye ahagarariye u Rwanda, akanatangamo ibitekerezo bifatika.
Ni ibintu byatumye amenyekana cyane bijyanye na gahunda u Rwanda rwimakaje yo kurengera ibidukikije, binyuze mu guca ibikoresho bya pulasitiki n’ibindi bifitanye isano n’imyuka yangiza ikirere.
Amasezerano mpuzamahanga yose u Rwanda rwasinyaga muri iyi ngeri, niwe wayashyiragaho umukono, akayobora n’inama nyinshi rwabaga rwahawe, urugero ni nk’ijyanye n’amasezerano ya Kigali [Kigali Amendment].
Ibi bituma ku ruhando mpuzamahanga izina rye ritumvikana nk’irishya mu matwi y’abandi bayobozi, kuko abenshi bagiye bamwumva kubera urugendo rw’u Rwanda rwo kurengera ibidukikije.

Title: Ni iki cyihishe inyuma y’ubugizi bwa nabi bwibasiye Abanyamulenge muri Congo?
Body:
Mu mezi make ashize, mu misozi miremire ya Minembwe muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo hubuye ubugizi bwa nabi bwibasiye abo mu bwoko bw’Abanyamulenge biganje mu batuye ako gace.
Mu mezi make ashize, mu misozi miremire ya Minembwe muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo hubuye ubugizi bwa nabi bwibasiye abo mu bwoko bw’Abanyamulenge biganje mu batuye ako gace.
Ni ubugizi bwa nabi bukomoka ku bitero abaturage bagabwaho n’inyeshyamba bavuga ko ari iz’umutwe wa Mai Mai ziganjemo abanye-Congo biyita gakondo, bafata Abanyamulenge nk’abanyamahanga.
Ubutegetsi bwa Komini Minembwe muri Teritwari ya Fizi butangaza ko nibura abantu ibihumbi 70 bahungiye mu murwa mukuru w’iyo komini, mu gihe Umuryango w’Abibumbye utangaza ko ubariyemo n’abahungiye mu tundi duce no mu mahanga bose bagera ku bihumbi 200 kubera izo mvururu.
Ibitero bikabije byubuye muri Nzeri uyu mwaka, ubwo abarwanyi ba Mai Mai bahukaga mu Banyamulenge bakabasahura inka, amaduka ndetse inzu nyinshi zigatwikwa ari nako bica bagakomeretsa abandi.
Abategetsi bo mu Minembwe bavuga ko ababatera ari abo muri Mai Mai bo mu bwoko bw’abafulero, aba-Bembe, aba-Nyendu n’imitwe yitwaje intwaro y’abanyamahanga nka RED Tabara, na FNL yo mu Burundi .
Ni ibitero bikomeje kugabwa ku Banyamulenge, mu gihe iruhande rwabo hari ibirindiro by’Ingabo za Congo (FARDC) n’iz’Umuryango w’Abibumbye zishinzwe kugarura amahoro mu burasirazuba bwa Congo (Monusco).
Burugumesitiri wa Komine Minembwe, Gadi Mukiza, aherutse kubwira BBC ko ukurikije uburyo baterwa ingabo za Leta zihari zirebera zikababwira ko nta mabwiriza zahawe yo kurwana, bifite ikindi bihishe.
Ati “Hari ibigaragaza ko bashyigikiwe kuko bafite amasasu atarangira, bafite umuriri utarangira.”
Mukiza yavuze ko imisozi myinshi yari ituweho n’Abanyamulenge isigayeho ubusa, imitungo yabo yaranyazwe n’inzu zabo ziratwikwa, bikaba byarahagaritse ubuzima bw’abaturage.
Ati “ Mu gasantere ka Minembwe niho hasigaye. Barahiga ahari umunyamulenge hose ngo bamwice, bamwangaze. Impunzi nazo zifite ibibazo byinshi. Dusigaranye isoko rimwe andi yarahagaze. Amashuri hirya ya centrre nta na hamwe biga. Amashuri menshi yarahiye andi yarasenyutse.”
Hari umutwe w’Abanyamulenge witwa Twirwaneho, wajyaga uhangana n’ingabo za Mai Mai n’abandi bashaka kubagabaho ibitero cyangwa kubasahura inka ariko Mukiza yavuze ko ubu nta mbaraga bafite kuko inyeshyamba za Mai Mai ziri kuza ku bwinshi kandi zikibasira abaturage badafite ibirwanisho.
Abatuye mu Minembwe bagiye bumvikana bavuga ko ingabo za Leta zanga ku batabara kuko ngo zisanga ari intambara y’amoko zitabona uko zinjiramo, nyamara abaturage bo bakavuga ko ibyo atari byo.
Umwe mu baturage yagize ati “Barwana abasirikare barebera, Mai Mai baraza bakabanyuramo bagatwika imihana iri imbere yabo n’inyuma yabo , bagafata inka bakazinyuza mu nkambi z’abo (abasirikare).”
Mukiza na we yemeje ko hafi y’ibiro bya Komine no mu bindi bice bya Minembwe hari ahari ibirindiro by’ingabo za Congo nyamara ngo ntacyo bakora ngo bahagarike ibitero bya Mai Mai.
Ati “N’aho bateye abasirikare babagayo bigasa nk’aho Mai Mai irushije ingufu ingabo za Leta, nibyo tutumva neza.”
Moise Nyarugabo, umudepite uturuka mu Minembwe yabwiye BBC ko ikibazo cy’ubwo bugizi bwa nabi bakibwiye abayobozi batandukanye barimo na Perezida Felix Tshisekedi bakabizeza kugikemura ariko nta cyakozwe.
Perezida Tshisekedi mu kwezi gushize ubwo yari mu ruzinduko mu Burasirazuba bw’igihugu yavuze ko yiteguye kuba yapfa ariko muri ako gace hakaboneka amahoro.
Nyarugabo yavuze ko ubwo bugizi bwa nabi bushobora kuba bushyigikiwe na bamwe mu bayobozi b’ingabo kuko hari ibyo Tshisekedi yategetse ko bikorwa ntibibe.
Ibyo abihera ku mutwe w’ingabo uba mu Minembwe Tshisekedi yari yasabye ko wasimburwa n’izo muri Bunia. Hashize iminsi mike izari mu Minembwe zaragiye zisiga ubugizi bwa nabi bwa Mai Mai bumeze nabi, zigenda izo muri Bunia zitaraza ngo kuko nazo zitari zakabonye abazisimbura.
Nyarugabo yagize ati “Nk’umukuru w’igihugu yatubwiye ko ababajwe n’ibyo bintu kandi ko agiye kugira icyo abikoraho ariko usanga abagomba kubishyira mu bikorwa ari bo bari mu mugambi wo gusenyera Abanyamulenge.”
Ubuyobozi bw’igisirikare cya Congo buherutse gukorana inama n’abagaba bakuru b’ingabo z’u Rwanda, u Burundi, na Uganda ngo bahuze imbaraga zigamije kurwanya imitwe yitwaje intwaro mu Burasirazuba bwa Congo.
Général Léon-Richard Kasonga, umuvugizi wa FARDC yavuze ko ubufasha bakeneye ku ngabo z’ibyo bihugu ari uguhanahana amakuru n’iperereza ubundi bakifasha ibikorwa byo kurwanya iyo mitwe.
Yagize ati “Dufite ubushobozi bwo kugaba ibitero , ntabwo twigeze dutumira ingabo z’amahanga ngo zize kudufasha ariko icyo dukorana ni uguhanahana amakuru n’iperereza. Turahamagarira inyeshyamba zose kurambika intwaro hasi kuko nyuma bizaba bibi.”
Burugumesitiri Mukiza yavuze ko ubuzima bw’Abanyamulenge bahungiye hafi ya komine buri mu kaga kuko nta bufasha bafite bwaba ubw’aho kuba, ibyo kurya, ubuvuzi, amashuri n’ibindi.
Yavuze ko banafite ubwoba kuko inyeshyamba za Mai Mai ziri mu birometero bitarenze umunani uturutse aho impunzi nyinshi ziri ku buryo isaha n’isaha bashobora guterwa nubwo ingabo za Leta ziri hafi aho.
Bamwe mu Banyamulenge bavuga ko mu kwezi gushize nibura inka zabo zisaga ibihumbi 26 zanyazwe n’aba Mai Mai.
Abaturage bavuga ko ubwo bugizi bwa nabi buri gukongezwa cyan en’imitwe yitwaje intwaro y’abanyamahanga iboneka muri ako gace.
Abantu batandukanye barimo abanyarwanda babinyujije ku mbuga nkoranyambaga bagiye bamaganye ubu bugizi bwa nabi, ahanini bugirwamo uruhare n’imitwe irimo n’iyiterabwoba nka FDLR na RNC igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda.
Abanyamulenge ni umuryango mugari w’abaturage babarizwa muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo hafi y’umupaka wayo n’u Burundi, Tanzania n’u Rwanda.
Ubwoko bw’Abanyamulenge bwiganje cyane mu Ntara ya Kivu y’Amajyepfo, hafi y’inkombe z’Ikiyaga cya Tanganyika gihuza u Burundi na Tanzania hamwe n’agace k’Amajyaruguru ashyira Uburasirazuba bwa Zambia.
Politiki ya Congo yakunze kugenda ibagaragura, rimwe bakitwa abanyamahanga ubundi bakitwa abaturage bemewe ari nabyo byakomeje gukongeza kutarebwa neza n’abandi baturage biyumva nka kavukire ba Congo.
Amafoto: Internet

Title: Icyo impuguke zivuga ku mahanga akomeje kwiyegereza Afurika
Body:
Abakuru b’ibihugu na za Guverinoma za Afurika baherutse guhurira mu Mujyi wa Sochi mu Burusiya, mu nama yahuzaga iki gihugu n’Umugabane wa Afurika yiga ku mubano w’impande zombi muri iki gihe ndetse no kwagura ubutwererane muri politiki, ubukungu, tekiniki n’umuco.
Abakuru b’ibihugu na za Guverinoma za Afurika baherutse guhurira mu Mujyi wa Sochi mu Burusiya, mu nama yahuzaga iki gihugu n’Umugabane wa Afurika yiga ku mubano w’impande zombi muri iki gihe ndetse no kwagura ubutwererane muri politiki, ubukungu, tekiniki n’umuco.
Iyi nama y’iminsi ibiri yabaye nyuma y’izindi zimaze kumenyererwa zirimo izihuza Umugabane wa Afurika n’Ubumwe bw’i Burayi, Afurika n’u Bufaransa, Afurika n’u Buhinde, Afurika n’u Bushinwa, Afurika n’ibindi bihugu by’ibihangange nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika.
Umuntu yakwibaza icyo bivuze n’icyo bimaze kuba muri iyi myaka Umugabane wa Afurika uhanzwe amaso n’ibihugu by’ibihangange biharanira kuyobora Isi aho bidasiba guhamagaza abakuru b’ibihugu bya Afurika mu nama ziba zigamije kwiga ku mubano wihariye n’ubuhahirane hagati yabyo na Afurika.
Uburyo ibihugu by’i Burayi na Amerika bikomeje gushaka kwiyegereza Afurika ni imwe mu ngingo zaganiriweho mu kiganiro Isi ya None cyo kuri Radio Rwanda cyari cyatumiwemo impuguke mu miterere y’Isi na politiki mpuzamahanga zirimo Senateri Dr Havugimana Emmanuel, Alex Nizeyimana na Emery Nzirabatinya.
Senateri Dr Havugimana yavuze ko umutungo kamere hirya no hino ku Isi, uri kugenda ukendera aho usigaye ari muri Afurika ku buryo usanga hari ibihugu bimwe na bimwe nka Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo ifite amabuye y’agaciro, za Centrafrique, Guinée n’ahandi.
Kuki u Burusiya?
Kuva mu 2015, u Burusiya bwatangiye gusinyana amasezerano y’imikoranire n’ibihugu bya Afurika, aho bwasinye ajyanye n’ibya gisirikare n’ibihugu 21 ndetse mu myaka icumi ishize ubuhahirane hagati yabwo n’uyu mugabane bwavuye kuri miliyari 5.7 z’amadolari bugera kuri 20.4 z’amadolari mu 2018.
Nzirabatinya Emery yavuze ko mu myaka 20 ishize Perezida w’u Burusiya, Perezida Vladimir Putin, yasuye Afurika yo munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara inshuro eshatu gusa nabwo yageraga muri Afurika y’Epfo.
Yakomeje agira ati “Muri izo nshuro eshatu aho yagiye ni mu gihugu kimwe gusa nabwo ku nyungu zigaragara, ahantu yibanze ahanini byari Afurika y’Amajyaruguru yari yaragiye muri Algeria na za Misiri. Aho umuntu yareba impamvu yabyo, ni ubukungu kamere.”
Mu 2018, nibwo Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Burusiya, Sergey Lavrov, yatangiye kugendera ibihugu byo munsi y’Ubutayu bwa Sahara ndetse aza no kugera mu Rwanda muri Kamena.
Nzirabatinya yavuze ko “bageze aho bikorera isuzuma basanga Abashinwa barabirangije kare, Abanyaburayi barabibonye kare, nk’ubu tuzi neza ko mu ntangiro za 2020, igihugu cy’u Bwongereza kizakorana inama na Afurika.”
Afurika ni umugeni uri kureshywa
Muri iki kinyejana cya 21, ibihugu bikomeye ku Isi, biri gushakira isoko muri Afurika. Nk’u Burusiya nicyo gihugu cya mbere gitanga ingano nyinshi ku Isi ariko nabwo hari ibyo budafite birimo n’ikawa n’ibindi biboneka muri Afurika gusa.
Nzirabatinya yagize ati “Ibyo bituma mvuga iki rero? Afurika ni umugeni mwiza warezwe neza uri kureshywa n’abasore bafite ifaranga. Ni ukuvuga ngo aba bantu bari kuza bakoze ubushakashatsi bwimbitse bazi ibyo dufite twe tutabizi ariko nabo badafite iwabo.”
Abahanga bavuga ko u Burusiya bushaka isoko muri Afurika ry’ibintu bitatu by’ingenzi aribyo ubuhanga bwa gisirikare n’ibikoresho kandi ibihugu byose byo ku Isi usanga bikeneye ubwirinzi.
Ikindi ni uguhagarara ku cyo bashaka bakakinambaho kandi iki gihugu cyateye imbere mu rwego rw’ingufu zaba izikomoka ku mashanyarazi n’amazi, ibi ariko bikajyana n’inganda zateye imbere.
Ubwo yatangizaga iyi nama ihuza Afurika n’u Burusiya, Perezida Vladimir Putin yabwiye abayobozi bitabiriye ko yifuza gukuba kabiri ubucuruzi u Burusiya bwakoreraga muri Afurika.
Yavuze ko icyifuzo cye ari uko u Burusiya bugirana umubano mwiza na Afurika ushingiye ku bwubahane, bitandukanye n’ibihugu by’i Burayi ashinja gukoresha igitugu n’iterabwoba kuri Afurika.
Kugeza ubu u Burusiya bufitanye umubano mu bya gisirikare n’ibihugu bisaga 30 bya Afurika.

Title: Hong Kong yatangiye ibiganiro biganisha ku ishoramari ryayo mu Rwanda
Body:
Inama y’iterambere ry’ubucuruzi muri Hong Kong yatangiye ibiganiro n’Urugaga rw’abikorera mu Rwanda (PSF) bigamije kureba uburyo Abanyarwanda bakorana ubucuruzi na Hong Kong mu buryo bworoshye.
Inama y’iterambere ry’ubucuruzi muri Hong Kong yatangiye ibiganiro n’Urugaga rw’abikorera mu Rwanda (PSF) bigamije kureba uburyo Abanyarwanda bakorana ubucuruzi na Hong Kong mu buryo bworoshye.
Ubwo bucuruzi bwitezweho korohereza inganda zo mu Rwanda gukurayo ibicuruzwa.
Umuyobozi mukuru ushinzwe ibikorwa muri PSF, Faustin Karasira, yavuze ko ibiganiro na Hong Kong bigamije kureba imikoranire n’u Rwanda harebwa uburyo abanyarwanda bakorana ubucuruzi na Hong Kong mu buryo bworoshye.
Hakazababo no gutumiza ibicuruzwa bizafasha inganda z’u Rwanda muri gahunda ya ‘Made in Rwanda’.
Ati “Mu mikoranire harimo kohereza ibintu hariya cyangwa mu gutumiza ibintu bikenewe hano cyane cyane bidufasha gutuma inganda zikora muri gahunda ya ‘Made in Rwanda’.”
Karasira yavuze ko mu mwaka utaha hari abashoramari mu nzego zitandukanye bagera kuri 200 bo muri Hong Kong bazitabira ibikorwa bizategurwa na PSF i Kigali, bizabahuza n’Abanyarwanda mu nzego zitandukanye bazashoramo imari.
Ati “Abo ngabo nibaza hano bizabafasha kureba ishoramari riri mu gihugu, ndetse n’ukuntu bakorana n’abandi bafatanyabikorwa hano mu Rwanda.”
Ku ruhande rwa Hong Kong, ngo gukorera mu Rwanda bizabafasha kugera mu bindi bihugu byo mu Karere k’a Afurika y’Iburasirazuba mu buryo bworoshye.
Hong kong isanzwe izwiho ubucuruzi bukomeye mu bijyanye n’ibiribwa ndetse n’ibinyobwa, ndetse igira imurikabikorwa mu bihugu bitandukanye. Mu biganiro irimo na PSF harimo no kuba imurikabikorwa nk’iryo ryazabera mu Rwanda.
Inama y’iterambere ry’ubucuruzi muri Hong Kong yashinzwe mu 1996 igamije guteza imbere ubucuruzi bwa Hong Kong n’ibigo byaho mu mahanga.
Daniel Lam ushinzwe ibikorwa bya Hong Kong mu burasirazuba bwo hagati no muri Afurika, yavuze ko u Rwanda ari isoko ryiza muri Afurika agendeye ku bukungu bwarwo mu myaka itanu ishize.
Ati “U Rwanda ni isoko ry’ingenzi muri Afurika. Tubona ari ngombwa guteza imbere ubufatanye mu by’ubukungu na Hong Kong."
Umujyanama mu by’ubukungu muri ambasade ya Repubulika y’abaturage y’u Bushinwa mu Rwanda, Wang Jiaxin, yatangaje ko Hong Kong ari agace ko mu Bushinwa gafite ubukungu buteye imbere bitewe n’aho gaherereye.
Ati “Ndatekereza ko u Rwanda n’u Bushinwa bizaganira ukuntu imishinga mito n’icirirtse yaterwa inkunga kandi Hong Kong ni igihugu gifite ubunararibonye ku buryo bwo guteza imbere iyo mishinga, ni kimwe mu byo u Rwanda rwaganira na Hong Kong.”
Hong Kong ni igice cy’igihugu cy’u Bushinwa gifite imiyoborere yihariye, ntabwo ari igihugu cyigenga nubwo mu buzima bwayo ikora ibikorwa bya buri munsi nk’igihugu cyigenga.
Raporo y’umuryango w’ubukungu ku Isi yo mu 2018 yerekana ko Hong Kong ari iya kabiri mu kugira ibikorwa remezo. Ni iya karindwi mu bihugu bifite ubucuruzi bwagutse, ikaba ku mwanya wa munani mu bohereza ibicuruzwa byinshi mu mahanga.
Hong kong niyo icururuza ibiryo na divayi nyinshi ku mugabane wa Aziya, ikagira ubwato bunini bwa kane ku isi butwara ibicuruzwa. Mu 2018 yabashije kwinjiza miliyari $1000 zavuye mu bucuruzi.
Amafoto: Dushimimana Ami Pacifique

Title: Bombori bombori irakomeje muri RNC, uwari Umuvugizi wayo yeguye
Body:
Jean Paul Turayishimye wari Umuvugizi w’Umutwe w’iterabwoba "RNC" yeguye ku mwanya we nyuma y’iminsi ishize n’ubundi uvugwamo ibibazo, cyane icy’iburirwa irengero rya Ben Rutabana, umwe mu bayoboke bawo.
Jean Paul Turayishimye wari Umuvugizi w’Umutwe w’iterabwoba "RNC" yeguye ku mwanya we nyuma y’iminsi ishize n’ubundi uvugwamo ibibazo, cyane icy’iburirwa irengero rya Ben Rutabana, umwe mu bayoboke bawo.
Ubwegure bwa Turayishimye bwatangajwe na Gervais Condo usanzwe ari Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa RNC mu nyandiko yashyize ahagaragara ku wa 24 Ukwakira 2019. Nta mpamvu n’imwe yigeze itangazwa y’icyaba cyatumye ava kuri iyi mirimo, byatumye benshi mu basesenguzi mu bya politiki bemeza ko "muri RNC bombori bombori ikomeje guca ibintu".
Jean Paul Turayishimiye utuye i Boston muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe z’Amerika bivugwa ko ari we cyegera cya hafi cya Kayumba Nyamwasa, Umuyobozi Mukuru wa RNC utuye muri Afurika y’Epfo aho yahungiye ubutabera.
Afite uruhushya rwa burundu rwo gutura muri Amerika, ni umwe mu bikomerezwa bya RNC akaba umucurabwenge w’uwo mutwe haba mu migambi yo gutegura ibitero, muri make azwi nk’umuyobozi ukuriye ubutasi.
Ni umwe mu bacurabwenge w’ibitero bya grenade byibasiye Kigali mu 2010
Turayishimiye avugwaho kuba umwe mu bacurabwenge b’ibitero bya gerenade byahitanye inzirakarengane ndetse no kuba mu migambi mibisha igamije kwibasira u Rwanda.
Byagaragaye neza ubwo Nshimiyimana Joseph uzwi nka Camarade yagezwaga mu rukiko akurikiranyweho uruhare mu bitero bya grenade byagabwe mu isoko rya Kicukiro tariki 13 Nzeri 2013. Icyo gitero cyahitanye abantu babiri, batandatu barakomereka.
Nshimiyimana icyo gihe yivugiye ko yinjijwe muri ibyo bikorwa na Jean Paul Turayishimiye ndetse ko ari na we wamuhaye amabwiriza n’amafaranga yo kujya kugaba icyo gitero.
Jean Paul Turayishimiye ni na we wakoreshaga Joel Mutabazi n’abo bari bafatanyije barimo Caporal Kalisa mu mugambi wabo wapfubye wo guhitana Umukuru w’Igihugu.
Amakuru yemeza ko RNC yari yapanze kugaba igitero ku Mukuru w’Igihugu mu matora ya 2017 hagamijwe ‘guhungabanya abantu mu mutwe’. Icyo gikorwa ngo cyagombaga kujyana no kwangiza bimwe mu bikorwa remezo bikomeye ku buryo byari kugaragara ko Guverinoma itakibashije kugenzura igihugu.
Bivugwa kandi ko Turayishimiye yari yategetse ibyitso bya RNC i Kigali kumukusanyiriza amakuru yose ku bikorwaremezo nk’ibiraro n’ahandi muri Kigali kugira ngo bizagabirweho igitero rimwe, bituritswe mu gihe cy’amatora ya 2017.
Ngo imyitozo yo kugaba ibi bitero yagombaga kubera muri kimwe mu bihugu bituranyi by’u Rwanda. Mu myitozo hagomba kwigishwa uburyo bwo kugaba ibitero ukoresheje ibiturika.
Zimwe mu nyandiko z’inkiko ku manza zaciriwe i Kigali zigaragaza ko akazi ko gushaka abazatera za grenade kari kashinzwe uwitwa Patrick Rukundo, wahoze anakorera umutwe wa FDLR na RNC i Kampala.
Yifashishije kuba aba i Kampala hazwi nko mu ndiri y’abakozi ba RNC, Rukundo yahakoreraga yubaka agatsiko k’ibyitso bya RNC biri mu Rwanda.
Bivugwa ko ibitero mu matora ya Perezida byagombaga kugabwa mu byiciro bibiri. Icya mbere kwari ugushwanyaguza ibikorwa remezo bigateza akavuyo. Ibyo byari guha urwaho icyiciro cya kabiri. Ubwo nibwo abandi bantu bari kujya gukwirakwiza inyandiko ziriho ibihuha “Tracts” kugira ngo bakomeze guteza imidugararo, ubuyobozi bugaragare ko bwananiwe.
Turayishimye yagarutsweho mu rubanza rw’abo kwa Rwigara
Turayishimye Jean Paul yavuzwe mu rubanza rw’abo kwa Rwigara, aho Perezida w’Urukiko Rukuru yanamuhamagaje we na Thabita Gwiza, Mukangarambe Xaverine, Mushayija Edmond bakunze kwita Sacyanwa.
Yeguye mu gihe Ben Rutabana usanzwe ari komiseri muri RNC ushinzwe kongera ubushobozi amaze ukwezi aburiwe irengero ubwo yari mu rugendo yatangiye ku wa 5 Nzeri 2019 muri Uganda. Umuryango we uri mu rungabangabo rwo kubura uyu mugabo kuva mu kwezi gushize ubwo yajyaga mu bikorwa by’uwo mutwe muri Uganda, ugashinja Kayumba Nyamwasa n’abandi bayobozi bawo kuba inyuma y’ibura rye.
Urugendo rwe muri Uganda rwavuzwe bwa mbere n’umuryango we mu ibaruwa yasakaye isaba ubuyobozi bwa RNC kumugarura mu muryango.
Uruvunganzoka rw’ibibazo byugarije RNC rwiyongeraho uburyo ingabo zayo zari ziteguye kugaba ibitero-shuma ku Rwanda zanyukanyukiwe mu mashyamba ya Congo Kinshasa n’ingabo za FARDC, benshi muri bo bahasiga ubuzima, abandi barahambirwa, bazanwa mu Rwanda kwitaba ubutabera.
Indi nkuru wasoma: Umwiryane, gucikamo ibice n’umuvumba w’amarira; ibyaranze imyaka 8 RNC imaze ishinzwe

Title: Tariki 24 Ukwakira, intangiriro y’indunduro ya Mobutu Sese Seko wa Zaïre
Body:
Intambara ya mbere ya Congo ni imwe mu ntambara zikomeye zabayeho mu mateka ya Afurika ndetse ijya initirirwa kuba Intambara nyafurika ya mbere y’Isi kubera uburemere bwayo. Tariki 24 Ukwakira 1996 nibwo yanzitse.
Intambara ya mbere ya Congo ni imwe mu ntambara zikomeye zabayeho mu mateka ya Afurika ndetse ijya initirirwa kuba Intambara nyafurika ya mbere y’Isi kubera uburemere bwayo. Tariki 24 Ukwakira 1996 nibwo yanzitse.
Ni intambara ikomeye kuko niyo yashyize iherezo ku butegetsi bw’umunyagitugu Mobutu Sese Seko wari umaze imyaka 32 ayoboye Zaïre nk’urugo rwe, kugeza ubwo hari bamwe bari baramufashe nk’Imana cyangwa se umuntu utazapfa, nawe akabyuririraho akiyita Umwami wa Zaïre
Imyaka 32 ku butegetsi bwa Mobutu yayimaze yishakira abanzi ari nabo bamurunduye, haba imbere mu gihugu no ku rwego mpuzamahanga.
Mu myaka ya 1990, ubukungu bwa Zaïre bwari aharindimuka , aho umuturage yabonaga nibura amadolari atagera kuri magana atatu ku mwaka, ugize imyaka 49 akiriho akaba ari umurame.
Muri iyo myaka kandi Mobutu yari ku gitutu mpuzamahanga, aho ibihugu bikomeye byifuzaga kandi bigashyigikira impinduka n’amaraso mashya mu buyobozi bw’ibihugu bya Afurika, byasaga n’ibiyobowe cyami nta jambo abaturage bafite.
Ibihugu nka Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’u Bufaransa byashyigikiye Mobutu mu mizo ya mbere, byari bitangiye kumukuraho amaboko bimutegeka gukuraho ubutegetsi bw’ishyaka rimwe, akemera amashyaka menshi.
Igisirikare cya Zaïre (FAZ) nacyo cyari aharindimuka kuko imyitwarire mibi yari ikigeze kure ahanini kubera kudahembwa no kutagira ubuyobozi buhamye, byatumaga bahuka mu baturage gusahura, bikongera isura mbi ya Mobutu mu baturage.
Binavugwa ko ngo hari ubwo Mobutu yigeze kubaza abasirikare be uburyo bataka kudahembwa kandi yarabahaye imbunda!.
Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, imbarutso y’indunduro ya Mobutu

Nyuma y’uko Ingabo zari iza FPR Inkotanyi zihagarikiye Jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu Rwanda, Interahamwe n’ingabo za Leta bayishyize mu bikorwa bahise bahungira mu burasirazuba bwa Zaïre, hafi y’imbibi z’u Rwanda.
Ubusanzwe amategeko mpuzamahanga ntabwo yemera ko impunzi zishyirwa hafi y’umupaka w’igihugu zahunze, nyamara izavuye mu Rwanda zo zahawe rugari, maze ingabo zahoze ari iza Leta y’u Rwanda yakoze Jenoside, abahoze mu butegetsi n’abandi batangira kwisuganyiriza ku butaka bwa Zaïre ya Mobutu ngo bagaruke kugaba ibitero kuri Leta nshya yari imaze kujyaho mu Rwanda.
Inkunga ikomeye yatangwaga ivuye muri Guverinoma ya Zaïre yari iyobowe na Mobutu Sese Seko.
U Rwanda rwamenyesheje imiryango mpuzamahanga icyo kibazo ibyima amatwi, rufata umwanzuro wo kwambuka muri Zaïre gusenya inkambi impunzi zisuganyirizagamo ngo zigabe ibitero mu Rwanda, banashishikariza impunzi zabyifuzaga gutaha kuza.
Uko kwinjira k’u Rwanda muri Zaïre kwahaye ingufu indi mitwe itaravugaga rumwe na Leta ya Mobutu, nibwo umutwe wa Alliance des forces démocratiques pour la libération du Congo (AFDL) wari uyobowe na Laurent-Désiré Kabila watangije ibitero bihereye mu Burasirazuba bwa Zaïre maze ukomeza ujya gufata ubutegetsi i Kinshasa.
Intambara yahise yanzika, AFDL ishyigikiwe n’u Rwanda na Uganda, Angola, Eritrea, Ethiopia, Zambia na Zimbabwe n’inyeshyamba nka SPLA yashakaga ubwigenge bwa Sudani y’Epfo.
Kubera ubukene, ruswa n’ubwirasi muri Guverinoma ya Mobutu, abaturage benshi bagiye ku ruhande rw’inyeshyamba biba impinduramatwara kurusha uko byari intambara.
Uruhande rwa Mobutu rwagerageje kwirwanaho rushyigikiwe na Sudani ndetse n’Inyeshyamba za UNITA zashakaga ubutegetsi muri Angola. Ni nabyo byatumye Angola ishyigikira uruhande rwashakaga gukuraho Mobutu dore ko yo yaninjiyemo nyuma.
Mobutu wari no mu bihe bibi arembejwe na kanseri, yahaye ibiraka abacanshuro benshi bo kumufasha gusubiza inyuma inyeshyamba n’abari bazishyigikiye ariko biba iby’ubusa kuko umunsi ku munsi barushagaho kwegera umurwa mukuru Kinshasa.
Kwinjira kwa Angola mu ntambara noneho kongereye ingufu uruhande rwa Kabila rwarwanyaga Mobutu, ku buryo bugaragara barusha ingabo za Leta imbaraga.
Mu mezi ya nyuma y’urugamba, ingabo za Mobutu ntizari zigiteye ikibazo inyeshyamba ahubwo ikibazo cyasigaye ari ibikorwa remezo bike nk’imihanda byorohereza inyeshyamba kugera i Kinshasa.
Tariki 16 Gicurasi 1997, Mobutu wasaga n’uwabuze epfo na ruguru, yahunze igihugu, bucya Laurent Desire Kabila n’ingabo ze batangaza ko bafashe igihugu bashyiraho Guverinoma nshya.
Mobutu yabanje guhungiro muri Togo, avayo ajya muri Maroc ari naho yaje kugwa nyuma y’amezi ane azize kanseri y’ubugabo bw’epfo (Prostate cancer) tariki 7 Nzeri 1997.
Kabila amaze kujya ku butegetsi, yahindutse u Rwanda atangira gukorana n’abasize bakoze Jenoside na we atangira kubafasha ngo bazagaruke gutera u Rwanda. Nibyo byagejeje ku ntambara ya kabiri ya Congo.

Title: Depite Munyangeyo Théogène yagizwe umuvugizi w’Ihuriro ry’Imitwe ya Politiki mu Rwanda
Body:
Ihuriro Nyunguranabitekerezo ry’Imitwe ya Politiki mu Rwanda ryatoye Depite Munyangeyo Théogène kuribera Umuvugizi naho Musanabaganwa Eugenie atorerwa kuba umuvugizi wungirije waryo.
Ihuriro Nyunguranabitekerezo ry’Imitwe ya Politiki mu Rwanda ryatoye Depite Munyangeyo Théogène kuribera Umuvugizi naho Musanabaganwa Eugenie atorerwa kuba umuvugizi wungirije waryo.
Aba bombi batowe kuri uyu wa 24 Ukwakira 2019, mu nama rusange y’iri huriro yabereye ku cyicaro cyaryo ku Kacyiru.
Depite Munyangeyo ubarizwa mu ishyaka riharanira Ukwishyira ukizana kwa buri muntu(PL) yamamajwe kuri uyu mwanya wenyine atorwa ku majwi 100%, asimbura Depite Mukabunani Christine wo mu ishyaka PS Imberakuri.
Umuvugizi wungirije, Musanabaganwa Eugenie ubarizwa mu Ishyaka rya PSP wasimbuye Depite Mukama Abbas. We yatowe ku majwi 37 mu gihe Mukantagara bari bahanganye yagize amajwi atandatu.
Nyuma yo gutorwa, Depite Munyangeyo yabashimiye icyizere bamugiriye. Ati “Gahunda y’ibikorwa mwarayigennye, igisigaye ni ugufatanya kugira ngo twuse ikivi cy’uyu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari. Igisigaye ni ubufatanye kugira ngo dukomeze twubake igihugu cyacu.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Ikirimo gikomeye ni ugukomeza kubaka ubumenyi bw’abagize imitwe ya Politiki yemewe mu Rwanda uko ar 11. Tuzanaguma kugirana ibiganiro na Minisiteri zitandukanye nk’ikijyanye n’uko igihugu cyacu gihagaze muri Politiki y’ububanyi n’amahanga.”
Depite Munyangeyo asanzwe ayobora Komisiyo y’abadepite y’Ubukungu n‘Ubucuruzi.
Umuvugizi ndetse n’umwungirije b’iri huriro batorerwa kuyobora manda y’amezi atandatu atongerwa.

Title: U Rwanda rutegereje ubutumire bwa Uganda ku nama ya kabiri yiga ku masezerano ya Luanda
Body:
Iminsi 30 yemeranyijwe nk’igihe kizategerezwa ngo hakorwe inama ya kabiri yiga ku masezerano yasinywe hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda yamaze gushira, hategerejwe ubutumire buzatuma intumwa z’u Rwanda zijya i Kampala mu nama ya kabiri.
Iminsi 30 yemeranyijwe nk’igihe kizategerezwa ngo hakorwe inama ya kabiri yiga ku masezerano yasinywe hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda yamaze gushira, hategerejwe ubutumire buzatuma intumwa z’u Rwanda zijya i Kampala mu nama ya kabiri.
Ni amasezerano yasinyiwe i Luanda muri Angola ku wa 21 Kanama hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda, agamije guhosha ubwumvikane buke bumaze iminsi hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Ku wa 16 Nzeri nibwo habaye inama ya mbere ya Komisiyo ihuriweho n’u Rwanda na Uganda, iteganywa n’amasezerano ya Luanda, yashyiriweho gucoca ibibazo bikomeje guteza umwuka mubi hagati y’ibi bihugu by’ibituranyi.
Iyi nama yabereye muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’Amahanga y’u Rwanda yiga ku bibazo birimo ko Uganda icumbikira imitwe igamije kuruhungabanyiriza umutekano, gukorera iyicarubozo Abanyarwanda no kubangamira ubucuruzi bwarwo.
Itsinda ry’u Rwanda ryari riyobowe n’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’amahanga, Nduhungirehe Olivier, Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Uganda Maj General Frank Mugambage; Minisitiri w’ubutabera akaba n’Intumwa nkuru ya Leta, Johnston Busingye, Minisitiri w’ubutegetsi bw’igihugu, Prof Shyaka Anastase, Umunyamabanga Mukuru w’Urwego rw’igihugu rushinzwe Iperereza n’Umutekano, NISS, Major General Joseph Nzabamwita n’Umuyobozi Mukuru Ushinzwe Iperereza ryo hanze y’igihugu n’umutekano, Col Anaclet Kalibata.
Ni mu gihe ku ruhande rwa Uganda hari Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’amahanga, Sam Kutesa, Minisitiri w’umutekano Gen. J.J Odongo Abu, Umuyobozi mu Biro bya Perezida Yoweri Museveni, Amb Joseph Ocwet, Intumwa nkuru ya Leta William Byaruhanga na Ambasaderi wa Uganda mu Rwanda Oliver Wonekha.
Mu myanzuro yayo harimo ko inama ikurikiraho yo kureba aho ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’amasezerano rigeze, izaba nyuma y’iminsi 30 uhereye igihe inama ya mbere yabereye. Ubu iyo minsi imaze kurengaho ine, u Rwanda rutegereje ubutumire.
Nduhungirehe kuri iki Cyumweru yabwiye IGIHE ati "Abanya-Uganda nibo bagomba gutanga ubutumire, twe ntabwo ari twe dutumira.”
Bijyanye n’imyanzuro yafatiwe mu nama yabereye i Kigali, Nduhungirehe avuga "nta kintu gishya kirabaho".
Mu nama ya mbere u Rwanda rwahaye Uganda urutonde rw’Abanyarwanda bafungiwe muri icyo gihugu, yemera kugenzura ayo makuru hagamijwe ko abari kuri urwo rutonde banyuzwa mu nzira zigenwa z’ubutabera, no kurekura abo bizagaragara ko nta bimenyetso bihari cyangwa ibyaha bakurikiranwaho.
Ubwo buryo kandi ngo ni nabwo byari byemeranyijwe ko bugomba gukoreshwa ku baturage b’ibihugu byombi.
Mu 2017 nibwo Abanyarwanda batangiye gufatwa bagakorerwa iyicarubozo, abandi bagafungwa mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko, bashinjwa kuba intasi z’u Rwanda. Icyo kibazo cyanahuriranye n’uko ubucuruzi bw’Abanyarwanda muri Uganda bwari bukomeje kubangamirwa, ndetse Uganda igashinjwa gutera inkunga imitwe yitwaje intwaro igamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda.
Ni impamvu zatumye u Rwanda rugira abaturage barwo inama yo "kutajya muri Uganda."

Title: U Bwongereza bwasabye EU kongererwa igihe mbere ya Brexit
Body:
Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Bwongereza Boris Johnson, yandikiye Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi, EU, asaba ko igihugu cye cyongererwa igihe cyo kuva muri uyu muryango, mu gihe byari biteganyije ko itariki ntarengwa ari iya 31 Ukwakira uyu mwaka.
Minisitiri w’Intebe w’u Bwongereza Boris Johnson, yandikiye Umuryango w’Ubumwe bw’u Burayi, EU, asaba ko igihugu cye cyongererwa igihe cyo kuva muri uyu muryango, mu gihe byari biteganyije ko itariki ntarengwa ari iya 31 Ukwakira uyu mwaka.
Icyatunguranye ni uburyo Minisitiri w’Intebe Johnson yanze gushyira umukono we kuri iyo baruwa, ahubwo iherekezwa n’ibaruwa ya kabiri noneho yasinyeho, bwo avuga ko ku ruhande rwe bwite, kongera igihe byaba ari ikosa, nk’uko BBC yabitangaje.
Gusaba iki gihe Minisitiri w’Intebe Johnson yabikoreshejwe n’itegeko abadepite batoye muri Nzeri, ko agomba gusaba EU ko u Bwongereza bwagutse bwongererwa igihe cyo kwitegura kuva muri EU, igihe cyose itariki ya 19 Ukwakira yagera hataremezwa bizadusubirwaho amasezerano y’imikoranire yabwo na EU, cyangwa ngo habe hafashwe umwanzuro ko nta masezerano azabaho.
Iyo baruwa hari aho igira iti “U Bwongereza bwagutse bwifuza ko icyo gihe cyarangira ku wa 21 Mutarama 2020 saa tanu z’ijoro GMT. Mu gihe impande bireba zaba zimaze kwemeranya ku masezerano mbere y’iyo tariki, Guverinoma yifuza ko icyo gihe cyarangizwa mbere y’iyo tariki.”
Perezida wa Komisiyo ya EU, Donald Tusk yanditse kuri Twitter ko yakiriye ibaruwa y’ubwo busabe. Yavuze ko agiye kuvugisha abayobozi b’ibihugu bya EU, ku gisubizo gikwiye.
Ibaruwa ya Johnson ivuga ko Guverinoma y’icyo gihugu igiye guhita ikurikirana ko ibigize amasezerano u Bwongereza buheruka kwemeranyaho na EU, byahita bihindurwa umushinga w’itegeko rikanatorwa, kandi ko bigomba gukorwa mbere y’itariki 31 Ukwakira, u Bwongereza bukava muri EU nyuma y’ubusabe abaturage banyujije muri Kamarampaka mu 2016.
Johnson yaherukaga kuvuga ko azakora uko ashoboye kose u Bwongereza bukava muri EU bidasabye kongera kongererwa igihe, ku buryo ku bwe, yari yiteguye ko bwava muri uyu muryango nta n’amasezerano y’imikoranire yemejwe. Ni ibintu abadepite bakomeje kurwanya.
Bimwe mu by’ibanze Johnson yemeranyijeho na EU mu masezerano yo gutandukana kw’impande zombi, bijya gusa n’ibyo Theresa May yasimbuye yagezeho mu mwaka ushize, uretse impinduka zigaragara ku ikoreshwa ry’umupaka wa Ireland ya Ruguru.
Biteganywa ko u Bwongereza buzakomeza kugendera ku mategeko ya EU kugeza mu mpera za 2020 ndetse bishobora no kurengaho, kugira ngo ibikorwa by’ubucuruzi bihabwe umwanya uhagije wo kwitegura.
U Bwongereza kandi buzishyura nibura miliyari £33 yo gutandukana na EU, ndetse uburenganzira bw’abaturage ba EU baba mu Bwongereza cyangwa ubw’Abongereza bari muri EU, buzakomeza kubahirizwa.
Bimwe mu byahindutse ni ikoreshwa ry’umupaka Ireland ya Ruguru (iri mu Bwongereza bwagutse) ihuriraho na Repubulika ya Ireland (iri muri EU). Biteganywa ko nyuma ya Brexit, ari wo mupaka rukumbi uzaba uhuza u Bwongereza bwagutse na EU ukoresheje inzira y’ubutaka.
Uwo mupaka uzakomeza kugendera ku mategeko agenga isoko rusange rya EU; mu gihe Ireland ya Ruguru izakomeza kugendera ku mategeko y’u Bwongereza bwagutse agenga za gasutamo, ikazagenda ininjizwa mu masezerano yose y’ubucuruzi u Bwongereza buzasinya nyuma ya Brexit.
Biteganywa kandi ko komisiyo ihuriweho izemeza ibicuruzwa byemerewe kujya ku isoko rusange, u Bwongereza bukazajya bwakira imisoro yabyo mu izina rya EU.

Title: Hahishuwe ko Ben Rutabana ari muri Uganda
Body:
Amakuru mashya yagiye hanze, ahamya ko Ben Rutabana ari muri Uganda kuva mu gihe gishize kirenga ukwezi, nyuma yo kuburirwa irengero bigatuma umuryango we ukomeza gutabaza, ukanandika ibaruwa usaba RNC kumurekura cyangwa ukavuga ibyo umurega.
Amakuru mashya yagiye hanze, ahamya ko Ben Rutabana ari muri Uganda kuva mu gihe gishize kirenga ukwezi, nyuma yo kuburirwa irengero bigatuma umuryango we ukomeza gutabaza, ukanandika ibaruwa usaba RNC kumurekura cyangwa ukavuga ibyo umurega.
Ben Rutabana usanzwe ari komiseri muri RNC ushinzwe kongera ubushobozi, ari muri Uganda aho yatangiye urugendo rwe ku wa 5 Nzeri 2019.
Urugendo rwe muri Uganda rwavuzwe bwa mbere n’umuryango we mu ibaruwa yasakaye isaba ubuyobozi bwa RNC kumugarura mu muryango, ndetse umugore aza kujya kuri radio BBC yemeza ibiyikubiyemo.
Nk’uko The New Times yabitangaje, amakuru avuga ko ubwo Rutabana yageraga muri Uganda yakiriwe na Dr. Sam Ruvuma, umunyamuryango ukomeye muri RNC, n’abofisiye bo mu rwego rw’iperereza rwa gisirikare muri Uganda, CMI. Gusa ku wa 8 Nzeri 2018, umuryango wa Rutabana uvuga ko utongeye kuvugana nawe.
Mu kiganiro na BBC, Diane Rutabana yashimangiye ibyo we n’umuryango we banditse mu ibaruwa. Yavuze ko muramu wa Kayumba Nyamwasa, Frank Ntwari, usanzwe ari komiseri ushinzwe urubyiruko muri RNC, yari ateye inkeke umugabo we.
Mu kiganiro cyo ku itariki 7 Ukwakira 2019, Diane yagize ati “Ben yambwiye ko afitanye ibibazo bikomeye na Ntwari, kandi ko yari amufitiye impungenge.”
Ibaruwa yanditswe n’umuryango wa Rutabana igenewe “umuhuzabikorwa mukuru” wa RNC, Jerome Nayigiziki, igaragaza urugendo rwa Ben Rutabana guhera ava i Burayi. Ivuga ko yahagurutse ku wa Gatatu tariki 4 Nzeri 2019 n’indege ya Emirates, agana ku kibuga cy’indege cya Entebbe muri Uganda, ahagera ku wa 5 Nzeri 2019 nyuma yo guhagarara gato i Dubai.
Ikomeza ivuga ko “mbere yo guhaguruka, Rutabana yabwiye umugore we, umuryango n’inshuti ze za hafi ku mpungenge afite ku mutekano we kubera ukutemeranya” na Kayumba Nyamwasa na muramu we Frank Ntwari, nk’uko ibaruwa yanditswe n’umuryango ibivuga.
Byongeye, umuryango ushimangira ko urugendo rwa Rutabana “rwahuriranye” n’uko Ntwari yari muri Uganda. Amakuru ahamya koko ko Ntwali yari i Kampala hagati ya tariki 24 Kanama na 10 Nzeri.
Umugore wa Rutabana avuga ko bakomeje kuvugana kuri telefoni ubwo yageraga Entebbe, kuva kuri iyo tariki (5 Nzeri) kugeza ku wa 8 Nzeri, ubwo itumanaho ryahagararaga.
Uruzinduko rwa Rutabana muri Uganda ubwarwo si ikintu kidasanzwe. Ntabwo yari inshuro ya mbere Rutabana ushinzwe kongera ubushobozi muri RNC yari asuye Uganda, cyangwa ngo yakirwe n’abayobozi bagenzi be ba RNC n’ab’inzego z’iperereza rya gisirikare.
Ubwo bavaga Entebbe, uwo munsi banagiye i Mbarara, amakuru akemeza ko bahuye n’abayobozi ba RNC barimo Pasiteri Deo Nyirigira n’umuhungu we Felix Mwizerwa, bari kumwe na Ruvuma n’abakozi ba CMI bajyanye kwakira Rutabana ku kibuga cy’indege, i Entebbe. Aho hari na Maj. Fred Kasimoni Mushambo, ukuriye CMI i Mbarara.
Pasiteri Nyirigira n’umuhungu we Mwizerwa bakomeje kuba ku isonga mu bikorwa byo kwinjiza abarwanyi bashya muri RNC mu burengerazuba bwa Uganda, kandi bakorana bya hafi n’umuyobozi mukuru w’ibikorwa by’iterabwoba bya RNC, Kayumba Nyamwasa.
The New Times ivuga ko mu icukumbura yakoze, yamenye ko ubwo Rutabana yavuganaga n’umugore we, icyo gihe yakoreshaga telefoni ya Sam Ruvuma, bari i Mbarara. Ni mbere gato y’uko Rutabana atongera kuvugisha umuryango we. Byateje igishyika mu muryango we ubwo ibyumweru byashiraga nta jwi rye barongera kumva.
Amakuru ahuriza kukuba hashize igihe hari umwiryane muri RNC, hagashyirwa mu majwi agatsiko ka Nyamwasa kagizwe na we, umuvandimwe we Ntwari n’uwitwa Sande Mugisha, bahanganye na Rutabana. Amakuru ava ahantu hatandukanye agaragaza impamvu nyakuri zatumye Nyamwasa n’agatsiko ke muri RNC bijundika Rutabana.
Icya mbere, Rutabana yakomeje kutumva impamvu Nyamwasa akomeje kugira ubuyobozi bwa RNC nk’akazu k’umuryango we, n’uburyo “yari akomeje kwikubira ifatwa ry’ibyemezo byose.” Rutabana kandi yakomeje kwibaza impamvu Nyamwasa akomeje gushyira Ntwari na Sande Mugisha “mu bikorwa byose bikomeye bya RNC”, mu gihe mu maso ya Rutabana, ari “abana”.
Uwatanze amakuru yakomeje ati “Nyamwasa n’abahungu be banze cyane Rutabana, by’umwihariko kubera gukomeza kwibaza ku buryo Nyamwasa akoresha nabi umutungo ukwiye gufasha RNC nk’ishyaka.”
Hashize igihe Nyamwasa ashinjwa n’amatsinda atandukanye ya RNC binyuze kuri internet, kunyereza umutungo w’ishyaka ryabo. Bivugwa ko amafaranga ya RNC yaba akomeje kuyashora mu bikorwa bye bwite muri Pretoria, na Maputo muri Mozambique.
Ibintu byarushijeho kuba bibi hagati ya Rutabana n’agatsiko ka Nyamwasa. Uwo yaje gutera ubwoba Rutabana ko “azatabwa muri yombi umunsi yongeye gukandagiza ikirenge muri Uganda,” nk’uko ibaruwa y’umuryango we ibigaragaza.
Umugore wa Rutabana agaruka ku bintu byihariye mu kiganiro na BBC, kimwe no mu ibaruwa. Ati “Ntabwo iterabwoba ryabo bakirigira ibanga! Babivuga ku mugaragaro ntacyo bahisha.” Nubwo hari izo mpungenge zose, Rutabana yabirenzeho ajya muri Uganda.
Amakuru avuga ko yari akigendera ku cyizere cyo kuba yari amenyereye muri Uganda, kandi yafatwaga neza na Guverinoma y’icyo gihugu kimwe n’inzego z’umutekano zacyo, yibwira ko ibintu birakomeza kuba nk’ibisanzwe.
Ntabwo ari ibanga ko Kampala itera inkunga ibikorwa bya RNC. Harimo ubufasha mu kwinjiza abanyamuryango bashya bigizwemo uruhare na CMI cyangwa ISO (Urwego rw’iperereza ry’imbere mu gihugu); ndetse abayobozi ba RNC bakirizwa yombi mu gihugu, nka Charlotte Mukankusi, Eugene Gasana na Tribert Rujugiro.
Rutabana yari muri Uganda no muri Nzeri umwaka ushize nk”umushyitsi udasanzwe” w’umuyobozi wa ISO, Col. (Rtd) Kaka Bagyenda. Rutabana yahawe icyubahiro gihabwa umushyitsi w’icyubahiro w’igihugu, nk’uko amakuru abihamya. Su-Liyetona Jack Erasmus Nsangiranabo, umukozi wa ISO ni we wari ushinzwe kumwitaho.
Amakuru ajyanye n’urugendo avuga ko Rutabana yari muri Uganda ngo yirebere ibikorwa byo kwinjiza abarwanyi bashya mu bikorwa by’iterabwoba. Nta wundi utari Maj. Fred Kasimoni Mushambo, umuyobozi ushinzwe ubutasi muri Diviziyo ya kabiri ya UPDF muri Mbarara, ubwe wamufashe akamujyana gusura ibyo bikorwa, ngo ahure n’abakimara kwinjizwa muri RNC, abatere imbaraga anabashishikarize gukomeza gushaka abandi.
Mu bashinzwe iperereza muri Uganda RNC ifitemo ijambo rikomeye, nk’uko bigaragazwa n’urugero rwo mu Ukuboza 2017, ubwo polisi ya Uganda ahitwa Kikagati- ku mupaka wa Tanzania- yafataga abanyarwanda 46 bagenderaga ku mpapuro mpimbano.
Inzego zishinzwe abinjira n’abasohoka zagize amakenga ubwo itsinda rigari, riri mu modoka imwe, ryerekanye ibyangombwa rivuga ko bagiye mu Burundi mu bijyanye n’iyobokamana.
Mu gukomeza kubazwa, baje kwemera ko bagiye mu myitozo ya RNC mu nkambi za Minembwe muri Kivu y’amajyepfo, muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo. Polisi ya Uganda yari itarinjira mu bikorwa byo kubangamira umutekano w’u Rwanda, inzego z’umutekano zisesengura icyo kibazo. Polisi yanzuye ko bagomba gutabwa muri yombi.
Nk’uko abakozi b’urwego rw’abinjira n’abasohoka babitangaje, polisi yavugaga ko bose bagomba gufatwa, ariko umuntu umwe byaje kumenyekana ko ari Captain Charles Byaruhanga ukorera CMI, aza kutabyumva kimwe n’abashinzwe umutekano. Yavugaga ko bakwiye kureka abo barwanyi bagakomeza.
Yaje kuvugira hejuru ati “Amategeko aturutse hejuru ni uko aba bantu bagomba kwemererwa gukomeza urugendo!”
Polisi yaratsimbaraye irabafata, kimwe na Dr Ruvuma wari wagerageje gucika. Byaje gutangazwa ko Ruvuma na Felix Mwizerwa aribo bashakishije abo bantu bafatanyije na CMI, babafasha kubona impapuro mpimbano z’inzira. Polisi yarabafunze ndetse ibakorera dosiye bashinjwa ibyaha by’iterabwoba.
Ruvuma yaje gufungirwa muri gereza ya Nalufenya. Nyamara nubwo abapolisi bakoraga akazi kabo, abantu bamwe mu nzego zo hejuru bari bahugiye mu kugatesha agaciro.
Umuyobozi wa CMI, Brig. Abel Kandiho ari nawe wakomeje gutanga “amategeko aturutse hejuru” yo kureka abo basore bagakomeza (hatitawe ku byangombwa by’ibihimbano), yari akomeje gukora ibishoboka ngo abafashwe bose barekurwe.
Kubijyanye na Ruvuma, byaje kujya ahabona ko “itegeko riturutse hejuru” ryatumye ahita arekurwa. Nyuma gato, abari bafashwe bose bararekuwe, bakomeza urugendo bagana i Minembwe.
Nta gushidikanya ko Rutabana ari muri Uganda: uburyo asanzwe ahasura, ubuhamya bw’umugore we n’uburyo bavuganye ari muri icyo gihugu n’uburyo yakiriwe n’abayobozi ba RNC barimo Sam Ruvuma n’abakozi ba CMI ku kibuga cy’indege n’i Mbarara.
Ndetse no kugerageza kujijisha kw’abayobozi ba RNC nka Gervais Condo, “umunyamabanga mukuru w’iri tsinda”, ubwabyo bigaragaza ko Rutabana ari muri Uganda.
Condo yagiye arya indimi, akavugira hejuru nta bisubizo afite ubwo radiyo BBC yamubazaga mu kiganiro bagiranye. Uwamubazaga ati “Uravuga ko utazi aho ari, ariko RNC yamwakiriye muri Uganda, hamwe n’abanya-Uganda?” Condo ntiyabihakanye. Ahubwo yakomezaga asubiramo ati “bamubonye mu karere.”
Kuba Rutabana ari muri Uganda ni ikindi kimenyetso cy’uburyo icyo gihugu gikomeje kurenga ku masezerano yasinyiwe i Luanda muri Angola hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda, ateganya ibirimo ko impande zombi zigomba “guhagarika ibikorwa byose bihungabanya ikindi gihugu,”

Title: Amashyushyu ni yose! Intebe enye muri Guverinoma zitegereje abazicazwamo
Body:
Mu gihe cy’amezi macye ashize hari bamwe mu bayobozi muri guverinoma bagiye bahabwa indi myanya magingo aya batarasimburwa. Iyi myanya igera kuri ine ni ya yindi itajya ipiganirwa, yewe nta n’ibizamini abayishyirwamo babanza gukora, umwanzuro wa nyuma ufatwa na Perezida nyir’ubwite yabigiyeho inama na Minisitiri w’Intebe, bigatangazwa kenshi na kenshi mu buryo buba busa n’ubutunguranye. Kuri ubu amaso ahanzwe ku kumenya bene umugisha bazahabwa icyizere n’Umukuru w’Igihugu.
Mu gihe cy’amezi macye ashize hari bamwe mu bayobozi muri guverinoma bagiye bahabwa indi myanya magingo aya batarasimburwa. Iyi myanya igera kuri ine ni ya yindi itajya ipiganirwa, yewe nta n’ibizamini abayishyirwamo babanza gukora, umwanzuro wa nyuma ufatwa na Perezida nyir’ubwite yabigiyeho inama na Minisitiri w’Intebe, bigatangazwa kenshi na kenshi mu buryo buba busa n’ubutunguranye. Kuri ubu amaso ahanzwe ku kumenya bene umugisha bazahabwa icyizere n’Umukuru w’Igihugu.
Kuba hari imyanya ine yose muri guverinoma itegereje gushyirwamo abayobozi bashya, hanze aha amatsiko ni yose! Yaba ku baturage basanzwe, cyane bamwe baba bakurikiranira hafi politiki yo mu gihugu, byagera ku bakozi ba leta ndetse n’abandi biyumvamo ubushobozi bwo kuba babasha kwitwara neza muri iriya myanya ho bikaba akarusho.
Buri gihe iyo hategerejwe impinduka muri Guverinoma, buri wese ushoboye aba ategereje n’amatsiko menshi kumva ko izina rye ryaba riri mubo Umukuru w’Igihugu yaba yagiriye icyizere. Bamwe muri aba usanga basanzwe mu myanya ya leta ariko bahora bashakisha uko babona amanota meza, bityo bakaba bazamurwa mu ntera.
Abandi usanga ari bamwe baba bamaze igihe ku gatebe, mu bihe nk’ibi ugasanga barwaye ibicuro bikeka ko baba bari bugarurwe mu kazi, hari n’abandi baba batarigeze bakora muri leta ariko baba biyumvamo inyota yo gukorera igihugu mu myanya y’ubuyobozi nk’iriya, nabo ni benshi.
Ku bemeramana bayobotse amadini y’abanyamwuka bo biba ari ibindi bindi muri ibi bihe. Abo Pasiteri yahanuriye ko bazaba ba Minisitiri, Umunyamabanga wa Leta cyangwa Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri minisiteri runaka baba biteguye kuririmba ya makorasi ya ‘Yari yarabitubwiye, yari yarabivuze’, iyo bitabaye kuri iyi nshuro, bitabaza izivuga ngo ‘bitinde bitebuke’ cyangwa za ‘ntibeshya’ ntiziba ziva mu kanwa.
Ubu ni ko bimeze rero kuko hari imyanya ine ikeneye abakozi muri Guverinoma. Abantu batekereza kuri aka kazi mu buryo bwinshi, yaba koko kujya gukorera igihugu muri iyi myanya yo hejuru cyangwa se kuryoherwa n’icyubahiro itanga n’ibijyana nacyo.
Hari uhita atangira kubara muri ubu buryo, akareba ibigenerwa abanyapolitiki bari mu cyiciro cya D mu bijyanye n’amikoro. Ku batabizi, icyiciro cya D kibarizwamo ba Minisitiri, Abanyamabanga ba Leta, abandi bagize Guverinoma, Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kigali na ba Guverineri.
Abaminisitiri n’abandi bagize Guverinoma bashobora gushyirwaho na Perezida wa Repubulika bagenerwa buri wese umushahara mbumbe w’umurimo buri kwezi ungana na 2.534.861 Frw. Ubu wasanga hari abatangiye kuyatera imirwi, ibicuro byababanye byinshi mu biganza!
Bagenerwa kandi amafaranga y’icumbi angana na 500 000 Frw buri kwezi, ayo kwakira abashyitsi 300 000 Frw, itumanaho ryo mu biro 100 000 Frw.
Banagenerwa kandi internet ngendanwa ya 40 000 Frw buri kwezi, itumanaho rya telefoni ngendanwa 150 000 Frw n’amafaranga yo kugura ibikoresho byo mu nzu angana na 5 000 000 Frw atangwa rimwe, n’uburinzi.
Kera bwo banagenerwaga imodoka zimwe dukunze kwita V8 ariko ubu siko bikimeze kuko bahabwa inguzanyo bakazazishyura.
Ni nde uri bwinjizwe muri Minispoc, Minaloc, Mininfra na Migeprof?
Guverinoma y’u Rwanda muri iyi minsi ifite imyanya ine yari isanzwemo abakozi harimo batatu bo ku rwego rwa Minisitiri ariko batakirimo kubera izindi nshingano.
Aho harimo nka Minisitiri w’Umuco na Siporo aho Nyirasafari Espérance wari uri muri uyu mwanya yagizwe Umusenateri; Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ubutegetsi bw’Igihugu ushinzwe Imibereho Myiza y’Abaturage ugomba gusimbura Dr Alvera Mukabaramba nawe wagizwe Umusenateri.
Hari kandi Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ibikorwaremezo ushinzwe Gutwara Abantu n’Ibintu ugomba gusimbura Uwihanganye Jean de Dieu wagizwe Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Singapore, n’Umunyamabanga Uhoraho muri Migeprof ugomba gusimbura Umutoni Gatsinzi Nadine watorewe kuba Umuyobozi wungirije w’Umujyi wa Kigali.
Iyi yose ni imyanya idahatanirwa kuko Umukuru w’Igihugu abigiriwemo inama na Minisitiri w’Intebe, areba ubushobozi bw’abanyarwanda bose, agahitamo umwe aha inshingano mu mwanya runaka.
Uretse ko nta n’uwakwirengagiza ko hari ubwo, bitewe n’icyerekezo igihugu gifite, hari igihe umwanya runaka udahita uhabwa umuyobozi, igihe bigaragara ko inshingano ze zishobora gukorwa n’izindi nzego kandi umuvuduko igihugu kiriho ntuhungabane.
Hari benshi baba bishyize mu myanya rero n’ababa bavugira mu matamatama bibaza uzicazwa muri iyo ntebe mu gihe kitazwi, abandi nabo bari kuhanya ngo barebe ko baterwa iteka.
Nubwo hatajya havugwa ibyagendeweho, icyerekezo cy’igihugu kirigaragaza. Perezida Kagame yavuze ko iyi manda izaba umwihariko ku rubyiruko, bikanakubitana n’uko u Rwanda rwimakaza ihame ry’uburinganire aho abagore badahezwa na mba; bisobanuye ko dushobora kubona iyi myanya yose ihawe nk’abagore tugakomeza kwesa imihigo.
Kuri ubu muri Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, Abaminisitiri b’abagore bari ku kigero cya 58%, ni icyerekezo gishimwa n’Isi.
Uburyo abayobozi bashyirwa mu myanya muri leta, akenshi biratungurana. Kugera ku munota wa nyuma usanga ari ibintu byakozwe mu bwiru ku buryo biba bizwi n’Umukuru w’Igihugu na Minisitiri w’Intebe, ibi ni nako bigenda mu gihe abayobozi bagiye gukurwa ku myanya.
Guverinoma y’uyu munsi yuzuyemo amasura mashya
Impinduka muri Guverinoma y’u Rwanda ni ibintu bimaze kumenyerwa, isaha iyo ariyo yose buri wese aba yiteze ko hashobora kumenyekana amakuru mashya amuvugaho ko yasimbuwe cyangwa se ko yahawe indi mirimo. Ni impinduka zitangazwa binyuze mu iteka rya Perezida wa Repubulika.
Nka Guverinoma yariho mu mpera za manda ya kabiri ya Perezida wa Repubulika mu 2017, ubu urebye amasura yabo, abenshi twamaze kubibagirwa mu ruhando rwa politiki kuko ubu basigaye bakora ibindi, abandi bayobotse iy’ishuri kugira ngo bakarishye ubwenge.
Batandatu, ni wo mubare w’abaminisitiri bari muri Guverinoma uyu munsi bari bayirimo mu mpera za manda ya Perezida Kagame mu 2017; naho 11 nibo ba Minisitiri batakiri muri Guverinoma Perezida Kagame yatangiranye iyi manda.
Barindwi bari abanyamabanga ba leta [manda ya Perezida Kagame itangira mu 2017] nabo ntibakiri muri iyi myanya, gusa muri bo babiri bazamuwe mu ntera bagirwa abaminisitiri. Batatu niwo mubare w’abavuye muri Guverinoma yatangajwe na Perezida wa Repubulika mu Ukwakira 2018 biyongeraho Umunyamabanga Uhoraho umwe wahinduriwe inshingano.
Nubwo ari imyanya ine itarimo abayobozi, nta kibujije ko n’abasanzwe bari muri Guverinoma harimo abashobora kuba basimburwa, yewe nta n’uzi isaha n’umunsi izi mpinduka zizabera, bizwi n’Umukuru w’Igihugu wenyine. Ku bafite ibicuro, amahirwe masa!

Title: Rurageretse hagati y’umugore wa Ben Rutabana n’abayobozi ba RNC
Body:
Umugore wa Ben Rutabana, Diane Rutabana, yatangiye kotsa igitutu abayobozi b’umutwe w’iterabwoba wa RNC, abasaba kumubwira mu maguru mashya aho umugabo we ari nyuma y’ukwezi kurenga aburiwe irengero.
Umugore wa Ben Rutabana, Diane Rutabana, yatangiye kotsa igitutu abayobozi b’umutwe w’iterabwoba wa RNC, abasaba kumubwira mu maguru mashya aho umugabo we ari nyuma y’ukwezi kurenga aburiwe irengero.
Ni ubwa mbere Diane Rutabana yumvikanye ubwe asaba ubuyobozi bwa RNC kwerekwa aho umugabo we ari kuko abashinja kumenya aho aherereye, mu gihe abagize uwo mutwe banyuranya mu mashyi no mu mudiho ku irengero rye.
Kubura kwa Rutabana kwaciye igikuba mu muryango we no mu batavuga rumwe na Leta baba hanze y’u Rwanda, nyamara RNC yo ukurikije uko yitwaye muri icyo kibazo isa n’itabyitayeho cyangwa se ifite andi makuru yihariye ku ishimutwa ry’umwambari wayo idashaka gutanga.
Bamwe mu bazi neza imikorere ya RNC nka Noble Marara wakoranaga na Nsabimana Callixte uzwi nka Sankara, bavuze ko Rutabana yashimuswe na Kayumba Nyamwasa ndetse ko ari gukorerwa iyicarubozo n’abambari be.
Kuwa 2 Ukwakira 2019 nibwo umuryango wa Ben Rutabana, umuririmbyi akaba na Komiseri ushinzwe amahugurwa muri RNC wandikiye Umuhuzabikorwa wa RNC, Jerome Nayigiziki bamusaba gusobanura izimira ry’umunyamuryango wabo.
Mu ibaruwa, abo mu muryango wa Rutabana bavuze ko yahagurutse i Bruxelles ku wa Gatatu tariki 4 Nzeri 2019 saa 21:45 n’indege ya Emirates Airlines, agana Entebbe muri Uganda. Yabanje guhagarara i Dubai mbere yo kugera ku kibuga cy’indege cya Entebbe ku wa 5 Nzeri saa 13:50.
Yakomeje kuvugana kuri telefoni n’umugore we Diane Rutabana hagati y’itariki 5-8 Nzeri, nyuma ntiyongera kumva ijwi rye. Rutabana ngo yagombaga gusubira mu Bubiligi ku wa 19 Nzeri nabwo akoresheje Emirates Airlines, ariko baramutegereje baraheba.
Uwo muryango uvuga ko wakiriye amakuru ko Rutabana afunzwe mu buryo butemewe n’abarwanyi b’umutwe ukorere muri Repubulika Iharnira Demokarasi ya Congo witwa RUD Urunana, biturutse kuri Major Faustin Ntilikina; General Jean Michel Afurika bahoze mu buyobozi bw’uwo mutwe na Frank Ntwali muramu wa Kayumba Nyamwasa.
Mu kiganiro Diane Rutabana yahaye BBC, yavuze ko aherutse guhamagarwa n’umuntu, akamumenyesha ko yatumwe na Kayumba Nyamwasa ngo amuhumurize.
Uyu mugore yavuze ko yagiye ahabwa amakuru atandukanye, bamwe mu bagize RNC bakamubwira ko umugabo we ameze neza mu gihe abandi bamubwira ko batazi aho ari.
Ati “Nyuma nabazaga bamwe bakambwira ngo ni ikibazo cy’umutekano ariko aho ari bazi ko ameze neza. Ayo ni amakuru nahawe n’abantu bane bo muri RNC. Bucyeye bwaho undi wo muri RNC arampamagara arambwira ngo yatumwe n’uwo muyobozi wabo ngo ’Kayumba yambwiye ngo nkuvugishe nguhumurize".
Nyamara ibyo bihabanye n’ibyatangajwe n’umuhuzabikorwa wa RNC, Jerome Nayigiziki uherutse kwandika ibaruwa, agaragaza ko nabo batazi aho Ben Rutabana aherereye, ndetse bashishikariza umuryango we kwitabaza ibihugu Rutabana afitiye ubwenegihugu bikabafasha.
Muri iyo baruwa, Nayigiziki yagize ati “Aho mugenzi wacu yaba yaragiye cyangwa ari, ntabwo yahagurutse agiye mu rugendo cyangwa mu butumwa yahawe n’ubuyobozi bw’Ihuriro nyarwanda nkuriye.”
Diane Rutabana yumvikanishije ko RNC ishobora kuba iri inyuma y’izimira ry’umugabo we kuko na mbere yo guhaguruka mu Bubiligi ngo yari yarabwiwe ko nasubira muri Uganda azafungwa.
Ibyo kandi Diane abishingira ku makimbirane umugabo we yari afitanye na muramu wa Kayumba Nyamwasa ushinzwe ubukangurambaga muri RNC witwa Frank Ntwali.
Yagize ati “ Abo ni abantu bo muri RNC babivuze kandi ntabwo babivuze mu ibanga”.
Uyu mugore yemeza neza ko RNC izi aho umugabo we ari, agasaba ko agaragazwa mu maguru mashya.
Rutabana yari afitanye ubwumvikane buke na Kayumba Nyamwasa, bashinjanya ko Kayumba ashaka kwiyegereza abo bafitanye isano, ndetse ngo Rutabana yababajwe n’abantu bafatiwe muri Congo mu mutwe wa P5 uyoborwa na Kayumba, ubu bari mu nkiko mu Rwanda.
Rutabana ngo yarakajwe n’uko inama ze zitubahirijwe kuko bajya gufatwa yari yababuriye. Ngo Kayumba yahaye itegeko Major Habib Mudathiru wari uyoboye izo ngabo kubavana muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo bakajya ku mupaka wa Uganda, aho bazahabwa inkunga zihagije kurusha izo bahabwaga hafi y’u Burundi.
Uburakari bwa Rutabana agashaka kwaka ibisobanuro Kayumba wagushije ingabo zabo mu biganza by’uwo bahanganye, ngo byaba impamvu yatumye ashaka ‘kumwumvisha’ kuko umusirikare muto yari ashatse kubaza byinshi ‘Jenerali’, ndetse bikekwa ko ubwo Rutabana yajyaga muri Uganda yari agiye mu bikorwa bya gisirikare, arenze ku gushaka kwa Kayumba.
Amakuru atandukanye ari kunyuzwa ku mbuga nkoranyambaga ariko adafitiwe gihamya, ari kuvuga ko Ben Rutabana yaba yariciwe muri Congo aciwe umutwe. Ngo yaba yicishijwe ku kagambane ka Kayumba ngo atazamena amabanga y’uwo mutwe na Uganda dore ko yari atangiye gushwana nabo.
Noble Marara aherutse gutangaza ko Kayumba Nyamwasa afite uruhare runini mu ibura rya Rutabana.
Marara yavuze ko Kayumba ari umwe mu babangamiye bikomeye abatavuga rumwe na Leta y’u Rwanda baba hanze kuko abahozamo umwiryane kubera icyenewabo, ku buryo asanga ntacyo bazageraho.
Rutabana yakunze kugenda muri Uganda kimwe na bagenzi be bo muri RNC nta nkomyi, ari mu bikorwa bya RNC byo gushaka ubushobozi n’abayoboke, abifashijwemo n’inzego zirimo urushinzwe ubutasi bwa gisirikare, CMI n’urw’iperereza ry’imbere mu gihugu, ISO.
Bivugwa ko ifatwa rye ryagizwemo uruhare na CMI atanzwe na Frank Ntwali, muramu wa Kayumba.

Title: Murangwa Hadidja yatowe nk’umusenateri uhagararariye imitwe ya politiki
Body:
Ihuriro ry’Imitwe ya Politiki yemewe mu Rwanda, ryatoye Murangwa Ndangiza Hadidja wo mu ishyaka PDI nk’umusenateri uzarihagararira muri sena.
Ihuriro ry’Imitwe ya Politiki yemewe mu Rwanda, ryatoye Murangwa Ndangiza Hadidja wo mu ishyaka PDI nk’umusenateri uzarihagararira muri sena.
Murangwa asimbuye Uwamurera Salama wari watowe mu minsi ishize urukiko rw’ikirenga rukanga kumwemeza kubera ko ubunararibonye afite butamwemerera kujya muri uwo mwanya.
Amatora yo gusimbura Uwamurera yabaye kuri uyu wa Kane ku cyicaro cy’Ihuriro ry’Imitwe ya Politiki yemewe mu Rwanda giherereye ku Kacyiru.
Hiyamamaje abakandida batatu, hatorwa Murangwa Hadidja wo muri PDI ku majwi 32, Athanase Nahimana wa PS Imberakuri yagize amajwi ane naho Masozera Icyizanye Jacky wa Democratic Green Party of Rwanda agira amajwi 7, n’impfabusa imwe.
Perezida wa PDI Harerimana Fazil yashimiye abahagarariye imitwe ya Politiki bagiriye icyizere ishyaka ayoboye.
Ashingiye ku bunararibonye bwe, yavuze ko Hadidja azafatanya n’abandi neza muri Sena.
Ati “Twakiriye neza icyizere abahagarariye amashyaka baduhaye, turabashimira kandi tubizeza ko tuzakomeza gushaka abakandida beza igihe cyose bizaba bikenewe”.
Umuyobozi w’ihuriro ry’imitwe ya Politiki, Mukabunani yavuze ko bujuje inshingano zabo, ko we azamezwa n’urukiko rw’ikirenga. Kandi avuga ko kuba barasabwe gutora undi mukandida nta kibazo ahubwo byemeza ko buri rwego ruba rwakoze inshingano zarwo.
Ati “Abanyarwanda bumve ko inzego zifite uko zikora, kuba twasubiyemo amatora ntabwo ari igitangaza ni uko gusa buri rwego ruba rwakoze inshingano zarwo.”
Murangwa Ndangiza Hadija ni inzobere mu bijyanye n’imisoro akaba n’umunyamategeko mu bijyanye n’imisoro. Ni umwe mu bagize inama y’ubutegetsi muri Banki Nkuru y’Igihugu, BNR.
Ni umunyamuryango w’Ikigo Mpuzamahanga cy’Ubukemurampaka cya Kigali (KIAC). Yakoze mu mishinga itandukanye yiga ku misoro n’ubucuruzi yabaga ihuriweho n’imiryango mpuzamahanga ndetse na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda.
Yakoze akazi k’ubujyanama mu bigo mpuzamahanga nka International Finance Corporation (IFC ), Umushinga wo guhuza imisoro muri EAC n’ibindi.
Kuri ubu yakoraga nk’impuguke ishinzwe igenamigambi n’iterambere ry’ikigo mu kigo cy’ababaruramari b’umwuga mu Rwanda, (ICPAR).
Yagiye mu nama z’ubutegetsi z’ibigo bitandukanye mu Rwanda nko muri Banki Itsura Amajyambere (BRD), Ishami rishinzwe ubuvuzi mu gisikare (MMI) no mu Kigo cy’Igihugu gishinzwe Ubuzima (RBC).
Murangwa asanze Nkusi Juvenal w’ishyaka PSD, wamaze gutorerwa guhagararira Ihuriro ry’imitwe ya Politiki muri Sena.

Title: Uko u Burundi na Uganda byafashije Kayumba Nyamwasa kurema umutwe wa gisirikare muri RDC
Body:
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 2 Ukwakira, mu rukiko rwa gisirikare i Nyamirambo hatangiye urubanza ruregwamo abantu 25 bashinjwa ibyaha bitandukanye bishingiye gukorana n’umutwe w’iterabwoba wa RNC uyoborwa na Faustin Kayumba Nyamwasa n’indi mitwe itemewe.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki ya 2 Ukwakira, mu rukiko rwa gisirikare i Nyamirambo hatangiye urubanza ruregwamo abantu 25 bashinjwa ibyaha bitandukanye bishingiye gukorana n’umutwe w’iterabwoba wa RNC uyoborwa na Faustin Kayumba Nyamwasa n’indi mitwe itemewe.
Abo bantu biganjemo abanyarwanda, bayobowe na Rtd Maj Habib Mudathiru, bakurikiranyweho ubufatanyacyaha mu kwinjira mu mutwe w’ingabo utari ingabo zemewe n’igihugu; ubugambanyi mu cyaha cyo kugirira nabi ubutegetsi buriho, kugirana umubano n’izindi nzego za leta zo mu mahanga hagambiriwe gushoza intambara no kurema umutwe w’abagizi ba nabi.
Ibyaha bashinjwa n’ubushinjacyaha, bigaragaza neza uruhare ibihugu by’u Burundi na Uganda byagize mu ishingwa ry’umutwe wa gisirikare ushamikiye ku ihuriro P5 rigizwe n’amashyaka atemewe mu Rwanda nka RNC, FDU Inkingi, PDP Imanzi, PS Imberakuri na Amahoro People’s Congress.
Ibyo ubushinjacyaha bwagaragaje bihuye n’ibyatangajwe n’impuguke za Loni mu mpera z’umwaka ushize, ubwo zasohoraga raporo igaragaza ko muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo hari umutwe w’inyeshyamba wa Kayumba Nyamwasa ugamije guhungabanya umutekano mu Rwanda.
Iyo raporo yavugaga ko Kayumba Nyamwasa afite umutwe w’inyeshyamba zikorera mu misozi ya Fizi na Uvira muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo. Uwo mutwe ugizwe n’abagera kuri 400, uyobowe na Shaka Nyamusaraba wahoze ayoboye inyeshyamba za Gomino, ukaba ukoresha intwaro ziturutse mu Burundi n’ubundi bufasha bavana muri Uganda.
Kayumba yafashijwe gushinga umutwe w’inyeshyamba

Umushinjacyaha yavuze ko Rtd Major Habib Mudathiru yahunze u Rwanda akajya muri Uganda, agezeyo ahurirayo n’uwitwa Maj Robert Higiro wahoze mu ngabo z’u Rwanda akaba umwe mu bagize RNC, amugira inama yo gushaka ibyangombwa by’impunzi kugira ngo abone umutekano.
Ngo ibyangombwa yarabishatse ku manyanga arabibona, ajyanwa kuba mu nkambi y’impunzi iri mu gace ka Arua.
Higiro yaje kugaruka guhura na Mudathiru, amubwira ko yavuganye na Kayumba Nyamwasa uyobora RNC, akamubwira ko bagiye kubaka igisirikare ndetse bamaze kubona ibirindiro muri RDC.
Higiro yafashe Mudathiru amuhuza na Capt Bagumya Apollo muramu wa Kayumba Nyamwasa. Yamuhuje kandi n’uwitwa Sunday Charles (uyu raporo ya Loni yagaragaje ko ari we washakiraga abarwanyi umutwe wa Kayumba ari i Bujumbura) yazanye na Sibo Charles wahoze ari Capt muri RDF.
Bamaze kunoza umugambi, mu 2017 Sibo Charles na Mudathiru batorotse inkambi bagera i Mbarara, bahita bafashwa n’Urwego rw’Iperereza rwa Uganda ngo bagere i Burundi banyuze muri Tanzania, bafashijwe na Capt Johnson ukorera urwego rushinzwe ubutasi mu gisirikare cya Uganda (CMI) , wabashyize mu modoka afite n’imbunda, bagera ku mupaka wa Tanzania banyuze Kikagati.
Berekeje i Bujumbura barindiwe umutekano, babagejeje i Bujumbura babaha icumbi muri Hotel Transit, ari naho hacumbikirwaga abantu benshi bajya muri RNC.
Nyuma ngo Kayumba Nyamwasa yahamagaye Sibo Charles na Major Mudathiru kuri Skype, ababwira ko mu mwanya babonana n’abayobozi ba Gisirikare mu Burundi, ati “Muvugane bikeya kuko ibyinshi twarabirangije."
Ngo yababwiye ko bahabwa imbunda n’amasasu, bakerekwa inzira yo gucishamo abasirikare bato b’Abanyarwanda bari i Burundi, n’inzira yo kunyuzamo abarwayi igihe badashoboye kuvurirwa mu nkambi.
Ni nako byagenze kuko mu kanya gato bahuye na Colonel Ignace Sibomana na Major Bertin bari kumwe na Colonel Nyamusaraba, Umunyamulenge uyobora umutwe witwara gisirikare wa Ngomino ari na we wahawe kuyobora ingabo za Kayumba.
Mu kiganiro bagiranye, ngo bemeranyije ko imyitozo ya P5 igizwe ahanini n’abanyarwanda, bazajya bakora imyitozo biyitiriye Ngomino ya Col Nyamusaraba, mu gihe bazaba babaye benshi bakazabona kujya mu nkambi yabo.
Nyuma y’icyumweru kimwe iyo nama ibaye, ngo Colonel Sibomana na Maj Bertin, bahaye imodoka n’uburinzi igikundi cya Major Mudathiru n’abasirikare bato bari kumwe, babageza ku kiyaga cya Tanganyika, bambukira mu bwato bagera muri RDC. Bagezeyo baje kwakirwa n’abandi basanzweyo.
Mbere yo kwinjira muri RDC, ngo bahawe imbunda zo mu bwoko bwa SMG 13, LMG 3, MMG 1 n’ibikarito by’amasasu ya SMG 4, na sheni z’amasasu ya NMG 3.
Umushinjacyaha yavuze ko nyuma yo gushinga P5, Kayumba yaje kugira Colonel Nyamusaraba umuyobozi w’ibikorwa byose, yungirizwa na Sibo Charles, Habib Mudathiru ashingwa ibikorwa n’imyitozo, Semahurunguru ashingwa iperereza na Politiki, uwitwa Richard ashingwa ubutegetsi n’ibikoresho, Olivier ashingwa imari.
Nyuma ngo Kayumba yahamagaye Mudathiru kuri telefoni ikoresha icyogajuru, amusaba ko batekereza uko bahindura aho bakorera, ashaka ko bava muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo bakajya ku mupaka wa Uganda, kuko babonaga u Burundi butabaha inkunga ihagije, ariko ngo muri Uganda babonaga ishobora kuba nyinshi.
Muri uwo mugambi, mu mafaranga bakoresheje, amadolari 12000 yoherejwe na Ben Rutabana kuri Western Union i Bujumbura, Richard ajya kuyabikuza.
Muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka niho ba barwanyi ba Kayumba bimutse, bageze Kalehe baza guhura n’umutwe wa MRCD iyoborwa na Gen Irategeka Wilson, bababwira ko ngo bo batangiye akazi muri Nyungwe.
Bamaze kuruhuka ngo bakomeje urugendo "rutabahiriye na gatoya," kuko bageze muri Gatoyi i Masisi, bahuye n’ibico byinshi by’ingabo za Congo, FARDC, bararaswa, aribwo bamwe bafatwaga abandi bishyikiriza ingabo za Loni ziri mu Burasirazuba bwa Congo, Monusco.
Umushinjacyaha yavuze ko abashoboye kurokoka bagiye bamanika amaboko ku matariki atandukanye, kugeza ubwo Leta ya Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo yabashyikirije u Rwanda.
Ubuhamya ubushinjacyaha bwagaragaje, bushingiye ku iperereza bwakoze n’inyandiko mvugo z’abashinjwa ibyaha.
Ibyagaragajwe bihura n’ibya raporo y’impuguke za Loni, kuko nayo ivuga ko intwaro, ibiryo, imiti n’imyambaro byose uwo mutwe wakoreshaga bituruka i Burundi.
Raporo ivuga ko uwo mutwe wari waragabanyijwemo batayo eshatu, iyitwa Alpha, Bravo na Delta, buri imwe ikaba igizwe n’abarwanyi basaga 120.

Title: Urukiko rw’Ikirenga rwanze Uwamurera Salama wari uherutse gutorerwa kuba umusenateri
Body:
Urukiko rw’Ikirenga rwandikiye Ihuriro ry’Imitwe ya Politiki yemewe mu Rwanda ruyimenyesha ko rwanze kwemeza Uwamurera Salama uherutse gotorwa n’iryo huriro ngo yinjire muri Sena.
Urukiko rw’Ikirenga rwandikiye Ihuriro ry’Imitwe ya Politiki yemewe mu Rwanda ruyimenyesha ko rwanze kwemeza Uwamurera Salama uherutse gotorwa n’iryo huriro ngo yinjire muri Sena.
Urukiko rw’Ikirenga rwagaragaje ko Uwamurera nta bunararibonye afite bwo kuba umusenateri.
Umuvugizi Ihuriro ry’Imitwe ya Politiki yemewe mu Rwanda, Depite Mukabunani Christine yabwiye IGIHE ko bandikiwe bamenyeshwa ko Uwamurera atemerewe kuba umusenateri.
Yagize ati “Yego nibyo. [Bamwanze] kuko adafite ubunararibonye buhagije. Igikurikiraho ni ugutora undi, turi gutegura inama ejo bundi kuwa Kane.”
Kuwa 19 Nzeri nibwo Ihuriro ry’Imitwe ya Politiki mu Rwanda ryatoye Nkusi Juvénal wo mu Ishyaka riharanira Demokarasi n’Imibereho Myiza y’Abaturage (PSD) na Uwamurera Salama wo mu Ishyaka Ntangarugero muri Politiki (PDI) nk’abazarihagararira muri Sena.
Uwamurera asanzwe ari Umunyamabanga wa PDI yakoze imirimo itandukanye mu Karere ka Rusizi mu gihe cy’imyaka icumi.
IGIHE yabajije Mukabunani impamvu batoye Uwamurera batabanje kureba ko afite ubunararibonye buhagije, asubiza ati “Urukiko bo bafite ubushobozi burenze ubwacu, ni nayo mpamvu tuboherereza dosiye ngo bayisuzume. Twe turatora dukurikije uko ishyaka ryamwamamaje, hanyuma urukiko tukarusaba ngo rumwemeze. Ubwo rero mu bushishozi bwabo nyine ni uko babibonye.”
Yavuze ko nta gikuba cyacitse kuko urukiko rw’Ikirenga rwakoze akazi karwo.
Mukabunani yavuze ko mu matora yo gushaka usimbura Uwamurera, amashyaka yose agize Ihuriro afite uburenganzira bwo gutanga umukandida, ko atari itegeko ko undi azava muri PDI.
Ingingo ya 107 y’Itegeko Ngenga rigenga amatora ivuga ko kugira ngo umuntu atorerwe kuba cyangwa agirwe Umusenateri, agomba kuba ari Umunyarwanda w’indakemwa kandi w’inararibonye; kuba afite nibura impamyabumenyi ihanitse cyangwa ihwanye na yo cyangwa yarakoze imirimo yo mu rwego rwo hejuru muri Leta cyangwa mu bikorera.
Agomba kandi kuba atarambuwe n’inkiko uburenganzira mbonezamubano n’ubwa politiki; kuba afite nibura imyaka mirongo ine y’amavuko; kuba atarakatiwe ku buryo budasubirwaho igihano cy’iremezo kingana cyangwa kirenze amezi atandatu kitahanaguweho n’imbabazi z’itegeko cyangwa ihanagurwabusembwa.

Title: Umwiryane, gucikamo ibice n’umuvumba w’amarira; ibyaranze imyaka 8 RNC imaze ishinzwe
Body:
Imyaka umunani irihiritse umutwe wa RNC uvutse. Abawushinze barimo Patrick Karegeya, Kayumba Nyamwasa, Théogène Rudasingwa na Gahima Gérald hamwe n’abiyemeje kubayoboka muri iyi myaka banyuze mu bigeragezo byinshi byaje kubaviramo inzira y’umusaraba, birangira bamwe bakuwemo umwuka, abandi bukana inabi, bacitsemo ibice ku buryo umugambi bari bafite kuri ubu wababereye nk’ibya wa wundi wagerageje gukama ikimasa.
Imyaka umunani irihiritse umutwe wa RNC uvutse. Abawushinze barimo Patrick Karegeya, Kayumba Nyamwasa, Théogène Rudasingwa na Gahima Gérald hamwe n’abiyemeje kubayoboka muri iyi myaka banyuze mu bigeragezo byinshi byaje kubaviramo inzira y’umusaraba, birangira bamwe bakuwemo umwuka, abandi bukana inabi, bacitsemo ibice ku buryo umugambi bari bafite kuri ubu wababereye nk’ibya wa wundi wagerageje gukama ikimasa.
 Imvo n’imvano y’Imiborogo no gucikamo ibice muri RNC.
 Museveni, Papa mushya muri batisimu w’abarwanya u Rwanda.
 RNC mu runana na Chieftency of Military Intelligence ya Uganda mu gukorera iyicarubozo Abanyarwanda.
 Impamvu Rudasingwa yatutse Kayumba kuri nyina!
 FARDC yasongeye RNC mu mashyamba ya Congo.
RNC abayishinze bavugaga ko ari ihuriro ry’abanyarwanda rigamije impinduka mu Rwanda binyuze mu nzira z’amahoro. Ujya gushingwa, wari urangajwe imbere n’abagabo bane, bose bafite ikintu kimwe cyangwa bibiri bahuriyeho.
Théogène Rudasingwa, Kayumba Nyamwasa, Gérald Gahima, na Patrick Karegeya nibo bari ku ruhembe rw’ishingwa rya RNC mu 2010, umugambi wabo bawunogereza muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, batangira ibikorwa ubwo.
Mu bandi harimo kandi nka Jérôme Nayigiziki, Gervais Condo, Jonathan Musonera, Joseph Ngarambe, Dr. Emmanuel Hakizimana na Jean Paul Turayishimye.
Iri huriro ryabo baritangirije mu Mujyi wa Bethesda muri Leta ya Maryland, aho bari bihaye intego yo “kuzana impinduka za politiki mu Rwanda” nk’uko bigaragara mu mahame remezo n’imirongo ngenderwaho bari biyemeje icyo gihe iganisha ku cyo bitaga “u Rwanda rushya”.
Icyita rusange ku bashinze RNC
Bane mu bari ku isonga ry’abashinze RNC bose babaye mu buyobozi bukuru bw’u Rwanda, babuvamo ku mpamvu zinyuranye, buri wese azinga utwangushye agana iy’ubuhunzi.
Kayumba Nyamwasa yigeze kuba Umugaba Mukuru w’Ingabo, Théogène Rudasingwa yabaye Ambasaderi w’u Rwanda muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika n’Umuyobozi mu Biro bya Perezida wa Repubulika; Gérald Gerald yabaye Umushinjacyaha Mukuru ndetse n’Intumwa Nkuru ya Leta na Patrick Karegeya wigeze gushingwa ubutasi mu gisirikare.
Bashinze uyu mutwe batanguranwa n’igihe kugira ngo bajijishe amahanga bikinze inyuma y’ishusho y’abatavuga rumwe na Leta, kuko u Rwanda rwari ruri kubakurikirana ku byaha bitandukanye.
Mu 2011, Urukiko rwa Gisirikare rwakatiye Kayumba na Rudasingwa igifungo cy’imyaka 24 no kwamburwa impeta za gisirikare. Gahima na Patrick Karegeya bo bahanishwa igifungo cy’imyaka 20.
Tumenyereye ko abashinga imitwe ya politiki baba baharanira demokarasi n’amahame y’uburenganzira bwa muntu, ariko usesenguye neza aba bane bo bari bahuriye ku kindi kintu gikomeye kuri bo, ariko kinasekeje ku rundi ruhande: Kwijundika Kagame.
Impamvu bashingiraho zabonwa na buri wese, kuko akenshi hari ubwo abantu bakosa, ababakuriye bagerageza kubasubiza mu murongo, aho kurakara ku bwo gukosa, bakarakara ku bwo gukosorwa. Ni ko byagenze kuri aba bagabo bane.
Bavuye i Kigali bakwepa! Kibuno mpa amaguru…
Senateri Tito Rutaremara ni umwe mu bantu bazi neza iby’aba bagabo kuko bakuze ababona, baba abayobozi muri leta imwe ndetse banahura kenshi.
Muri Nzeri 2010, yigeze kuva imuzi impamvu zagiye zituma bafungwa, icyo gihe we yari akiri Umuvunyi Mukuru mbere y’uko aba Umusenateri.
Karegeya yafashe inzira y’ubuhinzi avuye muri Gereza, bivugwa ko icyo gihe yari amaze umwaka umwe afunguwe azira gusuzugura abamukuriye, niko guhita yerekeza iya Uganda ahari ababyeyi be, ararorongotana agera muri Afurika y’Epfo.
Ibya Gahima Gérard byo ni birebire uhereye ku buryo uyu mugabo wize amategeko yinjiye mu myanya y’ubuyobozi bukuru mu rwego rw’ubutabera; ibyo byo ni ibindi bindi ntitwabigarukaho ngo tubirangize.
Mbere y’uko nawe ava mu Rwanda, yari mu nkiko na BCR kubera gufata imyenda mu buryo bw’uburiganya, aho ngo hari umwenda yanditse ku mubyeyi we (nyina) kandi arengereje imyaka 70 y’amavuko, bikaba byari binyuranije n’amategeko.
Rudasingwa nawe ntari kure aha, abazi ibye neza bamwibukira ku buriganya mu iyubakwa ry’ibikorwa remezo bikomeye birimo na Hotel Intercontinental (Serena tubona ubu), ifaranga ryaratikiriye karahava abigizemo uruhare.
Yari ageze ku kigero cyo kwandika imitungo ku bantu batari bo, byigeze no gutuma afungwa, acitse umunyururu, nawe ayabangira ingata.
Ni uko byagenze no kuri Kayumba Nyamwasa, nawe wakoze amakosa akomeye mu gisirikare, bikiyongeraho ibijyanye no kwigwizaho imitungo, ku buryo iyo badakomwa mu nkokora ugereranyije na apeti [appetit/appetite] bari bafite, aba bagabo magingo aya baba bihariye nka 3/10 cy’ubukungu bw’u Rwanda ahari!
Icengezamatwara no guhuzagurika bitewe no kubura umurongo
RNC ikimara kujyaho, yatangiye gushaka uko igaba amashami hirya no hino, ikora ku bantu bose bavuye mu Rwanda bahunga ubutabera n’abandi b’imburamukoro batuye iyo mu mahanga, basobanurirwa ko ariyo makiriro babonye, maze amashyushyu aba menshi, uwari ufitiye u Rwanda umutima mubi, awukuba kabiri.
Uhereye muri Amerika ukagera muri Afurika, hose bagiye bahashyira abayobozi. Urugero nko muri Afurika y’Epfo, umuhuzabikorwa yari Abdallah Seif Bamporiki, Robert Mukombozi ari ushinzwe Australia, Rudasingwa Alexis areberera u Bubiligi, Jean Pierre Mushimiye ari mu Bwongereza, Patrick Uwalilaye muri Canada, Eugène Munyangoga muri Denmark n’ahandi gutyo.
Byarakomeje maze bigera no mu kwiyegereza indi mitwe n’amashyaka atemewe mu Rwanda nayo agamije inabi ku gihugu maze bunga ubumwe ariko bwari bufite ikindi buhatse.
Mu 2012 RNC yatangiye imikoranire na FDU-Inkingi ya Ingabire Victoire wari ufungiye mu Rwanda, icyo gihe igikorwa byose byagenzurwaga na Dr. Nkiko Nsengimana wari Umuhuzabikorwa wayo.
Nyuma yaho yiyunze n’indi mitwe irimo Amahoro PC, PS-Imberakuri igice cya Ntaganda Bérnard, PDP-Imanzi n’indi nkuko byanagaragajwe na raporo ya Loni ya 2018 ko bafite umutwe bahuriyeho wa P5; bose intego yari uguteza umutekano n’imvururu mu gihugu, bahungabanya umutekano.
Bashatse imbaraga ahantu hose, ndetse mu minsi ishize mu 2017 havuzwe imikoranire ya RNC ya Kayumba na Diane Rwigara bashaka kureba uko bateza umwuka mubi mu baturage bifashishije akarimi n’ikimero by’umukobwa.
Kutumvikana, kuryana no gucikamo ibice
Iri huriro nk’uko ryiyita, uko iminsi yagiye isimburana, ryatangiye kuzamo urunturuntu. Byatangiriye ku rupfu rwa Patrick Karegeya mu mpera za 2013, bisa n’aho abari bawugize babuze igice kimwe cy’umubiri kuko yari umuntu uzi gucengera dore ko ariwe wabafashije kugera kuri Jakaya Kikwete wayoboraga Tanzania.
Nyuma y’aho gato, ku ya Mbere Nyakanga 2016 n’ibyo bikomere bitarakira, Kayumba na Rudasingwa barashwanye karahava. Bijya binavugwa ko Rudasingwa yigeze gutuka Kayumba ibitutsi bikomeye umuntu atatinyuka kwandika binavamo ugicikamo kabiri k’uyu mutwe.
Kayumba nk’uwabaye umusirikare ukomeye yari ashyigikiwe n’abandi babaye abasirikare, hanyuma Rudasingwa nawe afite abasivili bamuri inyuma. Uko niko bakoraga.
Muri Nyakanga 2016, Rudasingwa yanditse avuga ko uyu mutwe wasubiye inyuma ku buryo budasanzwe mu myaka itanu yari ishize, ukagira “ubuyobozi bubi butigeze bubaho”.
Inyandiko ye yo ku ya 1 Nyakanga 2016, yavugagamo ibintu biteye ubwoba bisa naho umuriro wakaga muri RNC, binagaragaza uburyo iri huriro ridafatika.
Rudasingwa yashyize Kayumba mu majwi ko yashinze agatsiko k’Abatutsi bahoze mu gisirikare kahawe kuyobora RNC nubwo ubuyobozi bwari busanzweho bwageragezaga kugatesha agaciro, ku buryo bisa “nk’aho Kayumba yaremeye ishyaka mu rindi.”
