Title: U Rwanda rushobora kwisubiraho ku cyifuzo cyo kuva muri ICGLR
Body:
U Rwanda rushobora kwisubiraho ku cyifuzo rwari rwagaragaje cyo kwivana mu Nama Mpuzamahanga y’Akarere k’Ibiyaga Bigari (ICGLR) nyuma y’uko hagaragajwe ubushake buke bwo kugarura umutekano mu karere.
U Rwanda rushobora kwisubiraho ku cyifuzo rwari rwagaragaje cyo kwivana mu Nama Mpuzamahanga y’Akarere k’Ibiyaga Bigari (ICGLR) nyuma y’uko hagaragajwe ubushake buke bwo kugarura umutekano mu karere.
Muri Nzeri umwaka ushize Leta y’u Rwanda yatangaje ko iri gusuzuma niba ishobora kwivana muri ICGLR, nyuma y’uko uyu muryango unaniwe kurandura FDLR n’indi mitwe yitwaje intwaro ku butaka bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
ICGLR yashyizweho mu 2006 nyuma y’ubusabe bw’imiryango mpuzamahanga irimo n’Umuryango w’Abibumbye, ihabwa inshingano zo guhuza, kugenzura no korohereza ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’ibijyanye n’amahoro n’umutekano mu karere k’ibiyaga bigari.
Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri Minisiteri y’Ububanyi n’amahanga, Amb. Olivier Nduhungirehe yabwiye IGIHE ko bakiri mu biganiro kuri icyo kibazo, gusa agaragaza ko hari ubushake bw’ibihugu bigize umuryango mu kugarura umutekano mu karere.
Yagize ati “Iki kibazo kiracyari mu biganiro, cyane ukurikije ubushake bushya bwagaragajwe n’inama yahuje ibihugu bitatu i Kinshasa.”
Iyo nama yabaye muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka, yahurije hamwe Perezida Felix Tshisekedi wa RDC, Perezida Paul Kagame w’u Rwanda na João Lourenço wa Angola.
Muri iyo nama abakuru b’ibihugu bemeranyije ubufatanye mu kubaka umutekano mu karere, hibandwa ku kurandura imitwe yitwaje intwaro cyane cyane iboneka muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo.
Nduhungirehe yavuze ko bagiye gukomeza gukorana mu gushakira amahoro n’umutekano akarere.
Abajijwe niba bidasobanuye ko amahirwe menshi ari yo kuguma muri ICGLR, yagize ati “Yego, ICGLR yahawe inshingano n’itangazo ry’inama ya Kinshasa. Tugiye gukorera hamwe ku bibazo by’umutekano biri mu karere.”
Ibikorwa bya ICGLR ku Rwanda bikunze kugaragara iyo habayeho kurengera ku ngabo ziri ku mupaka w’u Rwanda na Congo aho itsinda rya ICGLR rishinzwe ubugenzuzi, EJVM ariryo ryitabazwa ngo rigaragaze uwarengereye undi.
ICGLR igizwe n’ibihugu 12 birimo Angola, Burundi, Centrafrique, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, Kenya, Uganda, u Rwanda, Sudani y’Epfo, Sudani, Congo Brazzaville, Tanzania na Zambia. Icyicaro cyayo kiri i Bujumbura mu Burundi.

Title: Sinzatuza umugabo wanjye adahawe ubutabera - Umupfakazi wa Hategikimana wishwe na CMI ya Uganda
Body:
Nyirahabimana Annonciata wari umugore wa Silas Hategekimana witabye Imana ku wa Gatandatu nyuma y’iyicarubozo yakorewe n’Urwego rw’ubutasi rwa Gisirikare rwa Uganda, CMI, yavuze ko nubwo umugabo we atakiriho, atazigera atuza igihe atarahabwa ubutabera.
Nyirahabimana Annonciata wari umugore wa Silas Hategekimana witabye Imana ku wa Gatandatu nyuma y’iyicarubozo yakorewe n’Urwego rw’ubutasi rwa Gisirikare rwa Uganda, CMI, yavuze ko nubwo umugabo we atakiriho, atazigera atuza igihe atarahabwa ubutabera.
Hategekimana yagejejwe mu Rwanda nyuma y’amezi atatu we na bagenzi be 19 batotezwa na CMI mu murwa mukuru Kampala, bashinjwa kuba intasi z’u Rwanda. Bahageze ku wa 12 Kamena bacishijwe ku mupaka wa Kagitumba.
Nyirahabimana w’imyaka 45 yavuze ko umugabo we wapfuye nyuma y’iminsi mike ageze mu Rwanda, yishwe na CMI kuko raporo za muganga zagaragaje ko urupfu rwe ari ingaruka z’ibyo yakorewe.
Yagize ati “CMI yishe umugabo wanjye, ntabwo nshobora kugoheka kugeza abonye ubutabera n’ubwo atakiri kumwe natwe.”
Hategekimana yari umwe mu banyarwanda 20 bari bafunganywe bo mu itorero rya ADEPR muri Uganda. Umugore we yabwiye The New Times ko bagezwa ku mupaka wa Kagitumba, bari bafite ibikomere ku mutwe.
Hategikimana ageze mu Rwanda yatangiye kubabara mu gituza, ajyanwa ku Bitaro bya Kacyiru. Babonye ko uburwayi bwe bukomeye, abaganga bemeje ko yoherezwa mu Bitaro bya gisirikare bya Kanombe kugira ngo akorerwe irindi suzuma.
Umupfakazi wa Hategikimana yavuze ko umugabo we yari afite ikibazo cyo kubabara mu gituza, iburyo, "ibintu atari yarigeze agira mu buzima bwe mu myaka yose namumenye.”
Ageze ku bitaro bya Kanombe, umuganga wamusuzumye yasabye ko anyuzwa mu cyuma ku ivuriro rya Legacy Clinics, gusa ku bw’amahirwe make yaje guhita apfa.
Isuzuma rikorerwa uwitabye Imana ryagaragaje ko Hategikimana “Yari afite imvune y’urubavu yo ku rwego rwa gatanu n’ikibazo cy’amaraso yari yarikusanyirije hagati y’igituza n’ibihaha (hemothorax) hamwe no kwangirika ibihaha. Yari afite kandi ikibazo cy’impyiko y’ibumoso yangiritse n’ibikomere mu nda.”
Raporo y’isuzuma yaasinyweho n’abaganga b’inzobere batanu, igaragaza ko urupfu rwa Hategekimana atari ‘urusanzwe’, ko rwatewe no gukubitwa cyane mu gituza no mu nda.
Hategikimana yasize umugore n’abana batatu barimo abakobwa babiri n’umuhungu umwe. Bashakanye mu 1998 babanza gutura mu karere ka Musanze.
Nyirahabimana yatangaje ko umugabo we yari umuntu mwiza wita ku muryango we kandi usenga. Mu gahinda kenshi yagize ati “Yari yariyeguriye gukorera itorero no kwita ku bana be, ubu dufite ikibazo cy’uburyo tuzabaho kuko nta nzu twagiraga.”
Yakomeje ati “Umugabo wanjye yashinjwe kuba intasi y’u Rwanda, iki ni ikinyoma gikomeye kuko icyo yakoraga Kampala byari ukwigisha ijambo ry’Imana no gukora ubumotari, ntabwo yigeze ajya mu bya politike, nta n’inyungu yari abifitemo.”
Mbere y’uko apfa, Hategekimana na bagenzi be barindwi bari barajyanye Leta ya Uganda mu rukiko rw’Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba basaba kurenganurwa ku iyicarubozo bakorewe. Yapfuye mbere y’uko ahabwa ubutabera.
Mu 2009 nibwo umuryango wa Hategikimana wageze muri Uganda, ndetse Nyirahabimana avuga ko baje no kubona ubwenegihugu bwa Uganda.
Yavuze ko ibintu byaje guhinduka muri Werurwe 2019 ubwo abantu bambaye imyenda ya gisirikare bashimutaga Hategikimana n’abandi bagenzi be bakoranaga muri ADEPR, bakorerwa iyicarubozo ryaje no kumuviramo urupfu.

Title: Minisitiri Biruta asanga Uganda ifite ubushake, ibibazo byayo n’u Rwanda byakemuka mu cyumweru kimwe
Body:
Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Rwanda, Dr. Vincent Biruta, yavuze ko iyo habaho ubushake bwa Politiki, ibibazo u Rwanda rufitanye na Uganda biba byarakemutse kuko ngo ibyo u Rwanda rusaba byumvikana ku buryo byanakemuka mu cyumweru kimwe.
Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga w’u Rwanda, Dr. Vincent Biruta, yavuze ko iyo habaho ubushake bwa Politiki, ibibazo u Rwanda rufitanye na Uganda biba byarakemutse kuko ngo ibyo u Rwanda rusaba byumvikana ku buryo byanakemuka mu cyumweru kimwe.
Kuwa Gatanu tariki 21 Gashyantare 2020 nibwo Inama yabereye i Gatuna ihuje abayobozi b’u Rwanda, Uganda, Angola na Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo, yahaye Uganda ukwezi kumwe ko kugenzura ibirego bya Repubulika y’u Rwanda ku bikorwa bibera ku butaka bwayo by’imitwe ibangamiye guverinoma y’u Rwanda, byaba ari ukuri, Uganda igafata ingamba zose zo kubihagarika no kwirinda ko byakongera kubaho nyuma hakabaho ibiganiro byo gufungura imipaka.
Mu kiganiro Majuscule Propos cya Televiziyo y’u Rwanda, cyavugaga ku bibazo by’u Rwanda na Uganda cyatambutse kuri iki Cyumweru, Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga, Dr. Vincent Biruta, yabajijwe ku cyizere cy’uko Uganda yaba izubahiriza ibyo yasabwe mu kwezi kumwe yahawe, asubiza ko ikibazo atari igihe cyo kubikemura ahubwo ikibazo ari ubushake bwa Politiki.
Yavuze ko ibyo u Rwanda rusaba byumvikana kandi ko ari ibintu bitatwara icyumweru kimwe kugira ngo bikemuke Uganda iramutse ifite ubushake bwo kubikemura.
Ati “Njye ntekereza ko iyo haba ubushake bwa Politiki bitajyaga gusaba iminsi 30 kubera ko ibyo u Rwanda rusaba birumvikana: Dufite abanyarwanda bafashwe bari muri gereza dusaba ko barekurwa. Turasaba ko gufata abanyarwanda no kubatoteza mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko bihagarara. Turasaba ko ibikorwa byo gushyigikira imitwe irwanya u Rwanda bihagarara. Ndatekereza ko itari inakenewe, ibyo ni ibintu abantu bakora mu cyumweru kimwe.”
Uganda iri mu bibazo by’ubukungu ndetse na Banki nkuru y’icyo gihugu iherutse kwerurira abagize Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ko yaguye mu gihombo cya miliyoni 545 z’amadorali ya Amerika mu myaka 15 ishize.
Abasesenguzi basanga Uganda ikeneye cyane ko umupaka ufungurwa nubwo n’abanyarwanda bawukeneye. Ku ruhande rumwe bisa nk’aho Museveni yari yizeye ko inama iheruka isiga iwufunguye nkuko n’ubutumwa yanditse kuri Twitter bibugaragaza.
Nyuma gato y’iyo nama yanditse ati “Mfitiye impuhwe abaturage ba Uganda n’ab’u Rwanda bagizweho ingaruka n’ifungwa ry’umupaka wa Gatuna. Ndabasaza kwihangana mu gihe turi gushaka igisubizo kirambye. Nizeye ko ukuri kuzagaragara kubera Guverinoma ya NRM [Ishyaka riri ku butegetsi] ihagaze ku kuri.”
My sympathies go out to the citizens of Uganda and Rwanda that have been affected by the closure of the Katuna border. I call upon you to be patient as we pursue a lasting solution. I am very optimistic that the truth will come out because the NRM government stands for the truth. pic.twitter.com/940BtM2kTK
— Yoweri K Museveni (@KagutaMuseveni) February 21, 2020
Dr. Vincent Biruta wari mu nama yabereye i Gatuna, yavuze ko abahuza bari bateguye gahunda irimo n’ikimenyetso cyo kwambuka umupaka, ariko abakuru b’ibihugu baza kuyihindura nyuma ari nabwo ikiganiro n’itangazamakuru cyakuwemo, hagasomwa itangazo. Birashoboka ko ariho icyizere Museveni yari afite cyari gishingiye.
Ati “Ndakeka iyo nyandiko ya Twitter yaranditswe inama irimo cyangwa itararangira, wenda bikozwe n’ushinzwe konti ye ya Twitter.”
Umujyanama wa Perezida Kagame, Dr Jean Paul Kimonyo, yavuze ko Museveni ashobora kuzubahiriza ibyo yasabwe kubera igitutu ariho cyerekeye ubukungu bwa Uganda buri kuzahara.
Ati “Turebye uko ibintu bihagaze ubu Perezida Museveni ari ku gitutu gikomeye. Bisa nk’aho Museveni yatekerezaga ko inama yabaye ku wa Gatanu izafungura umupaka ariko si ko byagenze. Kuri we hari igitutu ku ruhande rw’ubukungu nubwo n’abanyarwanda bawukeneye [Umupaka].”
Dr. Kimonyo asanga Uganda yaratunguwe n’uburyo u Rwanda rwitwaye ku bijyanye n’ifungwa ry’umupaka, itangira gufata ibyemezo bitandukanye.
Ati “Ikibazo gitangira Uganda yaravuze ngo u Rwanda ruze rupfukame ariko ibyo ntibyashobotse. Ntabwo Museveni yakuyeho pasiporo ya Charlotte Mukankusi, [ushinzwe dipolomasi mu mutwe w’iterabwoba wa RNC, washinzwe na Kayumba Nyamwasa], ntabwo ari ku busa batangiye kurekura bamwe mu bo bafunze. Ndatekereza ko azakora ibyo asabwa niba bikenewe ko umupaka ufungurwa nkuko yabivuze.”
Hashize imyaka itatu hari ubwumvikane buke hagati y’ibihugu byombi, u Rwanda rushinja Uganda gukorana no gukingira ikibaba ibikorwa by’imitwe igamije kuruhungabanyiriza umutekano, birimo iby’imitwe ya RNC, FDLR, RUD Urunana n’indi. Hari gufata no gufunga abanyarwanda mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko bagakorerwa iyicarubozo ndetse no kubangamira ubucuruzi bwarwo.
Intambwe imaze guterwa mu kuzahura umubano hagati y’ibihugu byombi, irimo kurekura abaturage bari bafunzwe kuri buri ruhande, no gusinya amasezerano yo guhererekanya abanyabyaha.
Ibyo u Rwanda rusaba Uganda
Kimwe mu byo u Rwanda rwari rwasabye mbere y’inama ya Kane y’i Gatuma cyo gutesha agaciro pasiporo yahawe Charlotte Mukankusi wo muri RNC ari nayo yakoreshaga mu ngendo ze, cyarubahirijwe.
U Rwanda kandi rwari rwasabye Uganda kohereza abantu bagize uruhare mu bitero byo mu Kinigi mu mwaka ushize, byahitanye abantu 14 abandi bagakomereka. Ku wa Gatatu hari babiri boherejwe, nubwo hari abandi bataroherezwa.
U Rwanda rukomeje gusaba Uganda gukurikirana ibikorwa n’ikusanywa ry’inkunga ihabwa imitwe yo guhungabanya u Rwanda, bikorwa n’abarimo Prossy Bonabaana, Sula Nuwamanya, Dr Rukundo Rugali, Emerithe Gahongayire na Emmanuel Mutarambirwa, byose bigashyigikirwa na RNC, binyuze mu muryango utari uwa leta Self-Worth Initiative.
Mu bandi rusaba kohererezwa bari muri RUD Urunana yagabye igitero mu Kinigi, uretse Sous Lieutenant Selemani Kabayija na Private Fidèle Nzabonimpa bagejejwe mu Rwanda, hari Mugwaneza Eric na Capt. Nshimiye uzwi nka Governor ari na we wayoboye igitero cyo mu Kinigi.
U Rwanda kandi rusaba Uganda gukurikirana abayobozi bakorana na RNC na RUD Urunana barimo Umunyamabanga wa Leta Philemon Mateke, Brig Gen Abel Kandiho uyobora CMI, Brig Gen Fred Karara, Col Sike Asiimwe, Major Fred Mushambo, Col Kaka Bagyenda n’abandi bayobozi bagira uruhare muri ibyo bikorwa.

Title: Simva mu muryango ukomeye, aho ndi ni igihugu cyiza- Ikiganiro na Kamanzi uhagarariye urubyiruko mu Nteko (Video)
Body:
Kamanzi Ernest na Maniriho Clarisse ni bo badepite bahagariye urubyiruko mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda kuva mu 2018.
Kamanzi Ernest na Maniriho Clarisse ni bo badepite bahagariye urubyiruko mu Nteko Ishinga Amategeko y’u Rwanda kuva mu 2018.
Mu matora yabaye muri uwo mwaka, abakandida 26 nibo bashakwagamo babiri bagombaga guhagararira urubyiruko muri manda y’imyaka itanu izageza mu 2023.
Kamanzi Ernest yabonye amajwi 66.8%, Maniriho Clarisse abona amajwi 52.9%.
Kamanzi w’imyaka 30, avuka mu karere ka Kamonyi mu Majyepfo y’u Rwanda, ni umusore.
Uyu umusore iyo muganiriye bigaragara ko aba acishije make, akavuga ko umwanya ariho uyu munsi nubwo ari umwanya ukomeye, we awufata nk’ikirango cy’imiyoborere myiza igihugu giha abakiri bato.
Avuga ko nubwo abenshi bashobora kwibwira ko yaba akomoka mu muryango ukomeye, bikaba aribyo byamugize uwo ariwe uyu munsi, ibi ngo sibyo kuko ava mu muryango utifashije cyane.
Mu kiganiro yahaye IGIHE, Depite Kamanzi yavuze byinshi ku buzima bwe, uko agira uruhare mu kubaka igihugu n’uburyo abona ikibazo cy’ubushomeri mu rubyiruko.
Ikiganiro na Depite Kamanzi Ernest
IGIHE: Ukiri muto inzozi zawe wumvaga wifuza kuzakora iki?
Kamanzi: Burya umwana wese agira inzozi, hari uvuga ati nzaba muganga, umusirakari n’ibindi, ariko uko ugenda ukura inzozi wari ufite zigenda zihinduka, njye rero nkiri muto numvaga nzaba umusirikari, ibi nabiterwaga n’amateka y’igihugu kuko nagiye mbona ko muri uru rugendo tumazemo imyaka 25, urubyiruko rwagize uruhare rukomeye ngo igihugu cyacu kibe kiri aho kiri uyu munsi, njye nabonye ko abasirikari aribo babigizemo uruhare mu kukibohora kugeza aho turi uyu munsi.
Nubwo ibi byose nabyumvaga nkiri muto ariko byatumaga numva nzaba umusirikari, ariko uko ugenda ukura bitewe n’amahirwe igihugu gitanga numvise hari n’ubundi buryo nagikoreramo, ni uko naje kwisanga muri politike.
IGIHE: Kuba depite abantu bashobora kwibwira ko biterwa n’umuryango ukomeye uvukamo, niko bimeze?
Kamanzi: Amateka ya mbere ya Jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi, abakiri bato ntabwo bahabwaga amahirwe ngo batange umusanzu ariko ubu byarahindutse, uyu munsi bareba ubushobozi umuntu afite bitari aho uturuka. Nanjye rero nkomoka mu muryango utifashije cyane.
IGIHE: Ni gute watekereje kwiyamamariza kuba umudepite?
Kamanzi: Kuri njye nakuze numva hari icyo ngomba igihugu cyanjye, burya uko ugenda ugira inshingano kandi ukazikora neza uba wumva ugomba gutera intambwe, igihe cyo gutanga kandidatire cyarageze numva nanjye ndi umwe mu bagomba kuzitanga ndetse ndayitanga, ariko ntibihagije kuko uba guhangana n’abandi ukagaragaza ibyo uzamarira abaturage, mu guhitamo rero nsanga bampisemo.
IGIHE: Umaze gutorwa aho uvuka babyakiriye gute?
Kamanzi: Birumvikana buri muntu wese aho akomoka iyo umwana wabo yateye intambwe barishima, navuga ko banejejwe n’uko umwana wabo yateye intambwe ariko ntibyabatunguye cyane kuko muri kwa kundi umuntu ashaka icyo amarira igihugu cye, akenshi abantu baba bakubona mu bikorwa bitandukanye, ntabwo batunguwe cyane ahubwo banejejwe n’ibyo nagezeho.
IGIHE: Wumvaga ari iki wagombaga gukorera urubyiruko ugeze mu Nteko?
Kamanzi: Iyo ugiye kwiyamamaza kujya mu Nteko uba ugomba kubanza kumenya inshingano zayo, harimo gutora amategeko, kugenzura ibikorwa bya guverinoma no guhagararira abaturage.
Iyo ugiyemo nk’uhagarariye urubyiruko mbere y’uko ugeramo uba wumva uzavuganira urubyiruko, ukareba niba amategeko atorwa ababereye, ukareba niba uko gahunda zigenerwa urubyiruko koko zibateza imbere, ibyo nibyo twumvaga tuzakorera urubyiruko. Iyo tugiye mu Nteko tureba niba gahunda igihugu cyihaye ariyo irimo gushyirwa mu bikorwa, ariko iyo ugezemo usanga n’abandi mukorana mufite izo nshingano mukagendera muri wa murongo.
IGIHE: Ese koko abadepite bakorera abaturage uko bikwiye?
Kamanzi: Inteko Ishinga Amategeko ntidukwiye kuyireba nk’urwego ruri ku ruhande rudashinzwe gufasha abaturage, iyo turi hariya Inteko icyo ikora ni ukureba niba icyerekezo guverinoma yihaye aricyo gishyirwa mu bikorwa, dufashe nk’urugero nk’abaturage bagombaga kuva mu manegeka, iriya ntabwo yari gahunda yo kubangamira abaturage ahubwo ni ukugira ngo bibarengere.
Iyo umuturage ari hariya aba yabura ubuzima , icyo gihe Inteko tuba tugomba kureba uko bava mu manegeka. Mwarabibonye ko nyuma yo kuhabakura imvura yaraguye itwara amazu yabo, twe nk’abadepite iyo tubonye ko ibyo leta ikora biri mu nyungu z’umuturage, duhama muri uwo murongo.
IGIHE: Mugeze mu Nteko nta gihe mwigeze kugira ubwoba bwo kuvuga?
Kamanzi: Burya tugira umugisha kuko tugira ubuyobozi butanga umwanya ku bakiri bato nabo bakagaragaza icyo bashoboye. Mbere twumvaga kuzakorana nabo bizagorana ariko twaje kwishimira gukorana n’abantu bafite uburambe. Ibyo ariko biba bisaba ko ukora ubushakashatsi kugira ngo ibitekerezo utanga koko bitaba bihabanye n’ibyabo.
IGIHE: Ikibazo cy’ubushomeri ukibona gute mu rubyiruko?
Kamanzi: Kuba tuvuga ubushomeri uyu munsi ni uko mbere ya Jenoside bitavugawga, uyu munsi turabivuga kuko igihugu cyatanze amahirwe, ayo mahirwe ni uko iyo tuvuze uburezi kuri wese, umuntu wese ugejeje imyaka yo kwiga yiga, iyo yize biba bivuze ko dufite abantu benshi bize ariko bitari ugusaba akazi leta ahubwo kugahanga.
Iki ntabwo rero ari ikibazo gikomeye, icyo twita ikibazo dukwiye kukibyazamo amahirwe, ayo mahirwe ya mbere ni uko igihugu cyakwigishije mbere ntibyari biriho.
Ikindi abantu bakwishimira ni uko urubyiruko tubona uyu munsi ruratanga icyizere. Nk’ubu tugiye mu ikoranabuhanga imishinga myinshi irimo guhangwa ni urubyuko rurimo, muri Made in Rwanda abakiri bato nibo barimo kugaragaramo, abantu barangije Kaminuza barimo kubyaza ubuhinzi amafaranga menshi.
Depite Kamanzi avuga ko icyo abakiri bato bakwiye kureba ari ayo mahirwe igihugu cyabahaye bakayabyaza umusaruro, kuko guverinoma ngo yiteguye kubafasha.

Title: Urwishe ya nka ruracyayirimo: Leah Karegeya yahize guhirika ubuyobozi bwa Kayumba Nyamwasa muri RNC
Body:
Umunyarwanda ni we wavuze ngo aho umutindi yanitse ntiriva, uyu mugani ukomeje kugana akari kubera muri RNC, umutwe w’iterabwoba washinzwe n’abagamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda, abenshi bahunze kubera ibyaha bari bakurikiranyweho cyangwa andi makosa akomeye.
Umunyarwanda ni we wavuze ngo aho umutindi yanitse ntiriva, uyu mugani ukomeje kugana akari kubera muri RNC, umutwe w’iterabwoba washinzwe n’abagamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda, abenshi bahunze kubera ibyaha bari bakurikiranyweho cyangwa andi makosa akomeye.
Ibibaso bikomeje kuba urusobe ku bayobozi bawo barimo Kayumba Nyamwasa, kugeza n’aho Leah Karegeya, umugore w’umwe mu bashinze uyu mutwe, avuze ko agiye kwihuza n’abandi badashyigikiye Kayumba Nyamwasa bakamuhirika.
Ni nyuma y’uko abari basigaye bakomeye muri uyu mutwe bose basa n’abitandukanyije na Kayumba Nyamwasa kuko na Frank Ruhinda, musaza wa Leah Karegeya wabaga muri Uganda, yamaze gutoroka RNC agahungira muri Canada aho yagiye kwifatanya na ba Tabita Gwiza, uheruka kwirukanwa muri RNC.
Uyu Tabitha Gwiza yahoze ari Komiseri ushinzwe abari n’abategarugoli mu ntara ya RNC ya Canada akaba n’umubitsi w’Akarere ka Windsor, ariko mu minsi ishize yarirukanwe. Uyu Gwiza ni mushiki wa Ben Rutabana uheruka kuburirwa irengero, ikibazo cyasembuye umwiryane muri uyu mutwe.
Frank Ruhinda ni umwe mu bagize uruhare runini mu gushora abanyarwanda baba muri uganda mu mutwe wa P5 afatanyije na CMI, ababyanze bagakorerwa ibikorwa by’iyicarubozo abandi bakanicwa.
Kwihuza kwa Leah Karegeya, Frank Ruhinda, Tabita Gwiza n’abandi bafatwa nk’abari ibikomerezwa muri uyu mutwe bigamije kotsa igitutu Kayumba ushinjwa kurigisa umutungo wa RNC, akawushora mu bikorwa bye by’ubucuruzi biri muri Afurika y’Epfo, Mozambique n’ahandi.
Leah Karegeya wahoze mu kanama gashinzwe imyitwarire n’imikorere muri RNC, mu minsi ishize ni bwo yashyize hanze ibaruwa ifunguye ikubiyemo ubwegure bwe ku nshingano yari yarahawe. Muri urwo rwandiko, yavuze ko yeguye kubera ko komite yari ayoboye itizewe, ku buryo imyanzuro bafata idahabwa agaciro.
Ati "Nasanze nta mpamvu yo kuguma kuba umuyobozi mu gihe nka komite yahawe inshingano zo gufata ibyemezo ku bayobozi, nta gaciro babiha".
Imwe muri iyo myanzuro harimo irebana n’uwari umuvugizi wayo, Jean Paul Turayishimye uheruka kwirukanwa nyuma yo kuzamura ikibazo kirimo ibura ry’umwe muri ba komiseri muri RNC, Benjamin Rutabana.
Leah yavuze ko itsinda rye ryemeje ko Turayishimye yirukanwe kubera ko yagaragaje impungenge ku ibura rya Rutabana. Gusa Nyamwasa we yahisemo ahubwo kumwirukana atabagishije inama.
Leah Karegeya yafatwaga nk’inararibonye muri RNC kuko yari umuyobozi mu kanama k’inararibonye kagishwaga inama mu bikorwa bitandukanye by’uyu mutwe kandi akaba umwe mu bantu bakunzwe n’abayoboke benshi ba RNC.
Amakuru avuga ko benshi mu bashyigikiye Leah Karegeya batuye muri Afurika y’Epfo, i Burayi na Canada bari gukora uko bashoboye kose ngo bitandukanye na RNC, ariko bakabinyuza mu buryo bwo kwegura bavuga ko ari ku mpamvu zabo bwite, birinda kwiteranya na Kayumba.
Kuva hamenyekana amakuru y’ibura rya Ben Rutabana bikekwa ko ryagizwemo uruhare na Kayumba Nyamwasa, benshi mu bayobozi muri uyu mutwe w’iterabwoba bareguye abandi bareguzwa baranirukanwa. Ibi byahise bitanga ishusho ko RNC yabaye nk’ubwato buri kurohama kandi butagifite umusare ubuyoboye.
Ibi kandi byaje bikurikiye icyemezo cya leta ya Afurika y’Epfo kibuza impunzi ziri ku butaka bwayo gukora ibikorwa n’inama zifite aho zihuriye na politiki.
Kugeza ubu abafatwaga nk’inkingi za mwamba muri RNC bitandukanyije nayo ni Dr. Théogène Rudasingwa, Kazungu Jean Paul, Dr. Muvunyi Paulin, Bwayihuku Mathias, na Nsabimana Callixte wiyita Sankara uri mu maboko y’ubutabera mu Rwanda.
Mu baburiwe irengero mu buryo budasobanutse bikekwa ko byakozwe n’ubuyobozi bwa RNC ni Maj Nkubana Emmanuel, Rwarinda Michel, na Benjamin Rutabana wari ukuriye ikigega cyitiriwe umuryango wa Rwigara cyanyuzwamo hafi 75% by’inkunga yatungaga RNC.
Umuzi w’ibibazo Leah Karegeya afitanye n’ubuyobozi bwa RNC si uwa vuba aha kuko kuva umugabo we, Patrick Karegeya, yapfa, abasigaye mu buyobozi bwawo ntibigeze bamuha ijambo.
Nyamwasa n’umugore we ni inzobere mu kunyereza umutungo, bashoye umutungo wa RNC mu bucuruzi bw’umuryango wabo harimo amahahiro akomeye muri Afurika y’Epfo, muri Mozambique n’ahandi nk’uko amakuru abivuga.
Nyamwasa ashinjwa kwiharira RNC, aho bagenzi be bafatanyije gushinga uyu mutwe bamushinja kunyereza umutungo, kutagira imiyoborere inoze, kwironda, gukoresha icyenewabo no kwigwizaho iby’uyu mutwe.
Kayumba yagiye akorana bya hafi n’abo mu muryango we barimo muramu we, Frank Ntwari, uyu akaba yaranamuhaye imbaraga zo kuba komiseri ushinzwe urubyiruko. Ntwari yagiye ashinjwa n’umugore wa Rutabana, Diane Rutabana ko ari umuntu wagiye atera ubwoba umugabo we.
Diane yavuze ko inshuro nyinshi yagiye agaragaza ikibazo afite, aho yanabwiye Ijwi rya Amerika ko Ntwari yagiye atera ubwoba Rutabana, ko mu gihe yaba asubiye muri Uganda azamufunga.

Title: Perezida Kagame yavuze uko Uganda yamusabye ko Abanyarwanda basubukurayo ingendo akabyanga
Body:
Perezida Paul Kagame yavuze ko yanze ubusabe bwa Uganda bwo kubwira abanyarwanda ko bakongera gukorera ingendo muri iki gihugu cy’igituranyi nyuma y’uko kirekuye abanyarwanda icyenda bari bahafungiye.
Perezida Paul Kagame yavuze ko yanze ubusabe bwa Uganda bwo kubwira abanyarwanda ko bakongera gukorera ingendo muri iki gihugu cy’igituranyi nyuma y’uko kirekuye abanyarwanda icyenda bari bahafungiye.
Mu ntangiriro z’uku kwezi nibwo Uganda yarekuye abanyarwanda icyenda mu magana y’abari bafungiye ku butaka bwayo, barimo abari bamaze imyaka igera kuri ibiri bafunzwe nta byaha bigaragara bashinjwa ahubwo bakorerwa iyicarubozo amanywa n’ijoro.
Abo banyarwanda barekuwe ni bamwe mu magana y’abo u Rwanda rwakunze gusaba Uganda kurekura, ruvuga ko bafashwe mu buryo bunyuranyije n’amategeko bagatotezwa, ntibagezwe mu butabera bamwe bagakurizmao no gupfa.
U Rwanda kandi rwagiye rwinubira uburyo Uganda ikorana n’imitwe ishaka kuruhungabanyiriza umutekano irimo RNC ya Kayumba Nyamwasa.
Byatumye muri Werurwe umwaka ushize, rugira inama abaturage barwo yo guhagarika ingendo zijya muri Uganda kuko umutekano wabo utizewe.
Kuri uyu wa Gatatu ubwo Perezida Kagame yakiraga ku meza abahagarariye ibihugu byabo n’imiryango mpuzamahanga mu Rwanda, anabifuriza umwaka mushya wa 2020, yavuze ko Uganda iherutse kumusaba kubwira abanyarwanda ko bakongera gutemberera muri icyo gihugu.
Yavuze ko Uganda yabihereye kuri abo banyarwanda icyenda yari imaze kurekura n’abandi bake barekuwe mbere, ikumva ko nawe yahita abwira Abanyarwanda ngo basubire gukorera ingendo muri Uganda bisanzuye.
Ati “Bahise bambwira bati mukwiriye kugira icyo mukora. Ngo mubwire Abanyarwanda baze muri Uganda. Uwabimbwiraga naramubwiye nti nta kibazo, ariko se nindamuka mbyemeye, uyu munsi n’ejo, n’ejo bundi Abanyarwanda bakongera bagafungwa n’abafunzwe mbere batararekurwa?”
Yakomeje agira ati “Murumva nzasubira kubwira Abanyarwanda ngo narababeshye, nimwongere muhagarike kujya muri Uganda ? Naramubwiye nti mutubabarire, mureke gufata abanyarwanda kuko n’abafashwe ntibigeze bagira ibyo bashinjwa imyaka n’imyaka. Ikindi nimurekere aho gukorana n’iriya mitwe ishaka guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda, nibikorwa gufungura umupaka bizahita byikora.”
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko kubera umubano w’u Rwanda na Uganda utari wifashe neza, byanatumye umwaka ushize kuyobora umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EAC) bikomera, kurusha uko byamworoheye mu 2017 ubwo yari ayoboye umuryango wa Afurika yunze Ubumwe.
Ati “Nubwo ari ibihugu bike ariko byari bigoye kurusha kuyobora umugabane wose ariko ubuyobozi bwaba ubw’igihugu kimwe n’igihugu cyanjye mpura n’impogamizi kandi ari igihugu kimwe nkanswe umuryango. Ngira ngo muzi ibibazo twahuye nabyo n’abaturanyi bacu ariko by’umwihariko umuturanyi wacu mu majyaruguru, Uganda.”
Yavuze ko intego za EAC ari ubufatanye , kwihuza n’imigenderanire myiza y’abayituye , gusa ngo ntabwo bipfa kwikora.
Yavuze kuba EAC yifuza gufungurirana amarembo hagati y’ibihugu biyigize bitazikora.
Ati “Kuyikuraho [imipaka] ugomba kugira icyo ukora, ugomba gutsura umubano n’abaturanyi. Ukabafata nk’uko bagufata. Ntabwo wahiga abantu bo mu kindi gihugu ngo ugaruke uvuga ngo ibintu by’imipaka ntacyo bivuze.”
Yavuze ko nubwo imipaka yakurwaho hagati y’ibihugu, kuba abaturanyi bitazavaho kandi bizahora bisaba kubanirana neza.
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko igihe cyose udashaka ko umuturanyi wawe agera iwawe, uba wamaze gushyiraho umupaka ubatandukanya nubwo mu bigaragara nta yindi mipaka yaba ihari.
Ati “Nzatembera ariko ningera ku rugo rwawe mvuge nti oya aha sinaharenga, uzaba wamaze gushyiraho umupaka hagati y’imiryango. Nibyo byabaye hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda mu minsi ishize.”
Kubana nk’abaturanyi, Perezida Kagame yabigereranyije nko guturana mufite inzu z’ibyatsi, ko igihe cyose mwirinda icyatuma imwe ifatwa n’umuriro kuko ikongeza izindi.
Ati “ Iyo ufite inzu z’ibyatsi zegeranye, wirinda kunagamo umuriro kuko n’inzu yawe izashya. Inzu y’umuturanyi nifatwa n’umuriro, izakongeza n’iyawe. Niko ikibazo giteye, niyo mpamvu ubufatanye aricyo kintu cyiza.”
Yakomeje agira ati “Twize amasomo menshi. Tuzi ububi bwo gutwika inzu z’abandi, turabizi neza icyo bisaba. Twe ntabwo tujya dukina iyo mikino yo gutwika inzu z’abandi ariko dushyira imbaraga mu kurinda izacu ngo zidashya mu buryo bworoshye, kandi tugaharanira ko ushaka gutwika inzu zacu bizamutwara ikiguzi kinini.”
Perezida Kagame yavuze ko amasezerano yo kubyutsa umubano hagati y’u Rwanda na Uganda ku buhuza bwa Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo na Angola, yitezweho kurangiza ibyo bibazo byose.
Amafoto:Niyonzima Moise

Title: Urwango rwo kwitwa Abanyarwanda, ubwicanyi mu isura ya ‘Jenoside’: Ibihe bikomeye ku banyamulenge muri RDC
Body:
Amateka y’Abanyamulenge ni maremare cyane, aho agaragaza ko bageze muri Congo mu kinyejana cya 17 mbere y’uko Abanyaburayi bigabanya Afurika binyuze mu nama yiswe iya Berlin, yabaye hagati ya Ugushyingo 1884 na Gashyantare 1885. Bibarwa ko icyo gihe Abanyamulenge bari bahamaze imyaka hafi 200.
Amateka y’Abanyamulenge ni maremare cyane, aho agaragaza ko bageze muri Congo mu kinyejana cya 17 mbere y’uko Abanyaburayi bigabanya Afurika binyuze mu nama yiswe iya Berlin, yabaye hagati ya Ugushyingo 1884 na Gashyantare 1885. Bibarwa ko icyo gihe Abanyamulenge bari bahamaze imyaka hafi 200.
Nyamara magingo aya hari Abanye-Congo benshi bagifata Abanyamulenge nk’abanyamahanga, abanyarwanda by’umwihariko, ku buryo badakwiye kugira uburenganzira na buke ku butaka bwa Congo.
Ni ibintu byakomeje kubakururira ibibazo mu ntambara zidashira, kugeza ku ifatwa nk’ikomeye kurusha izindi yatangiye mu 2017, ku buryo hari n’abavuga ko Abanyamulenge barimo gukorerwa Jenoside. Hategerejwe ahazava igisubizo kuri ubu bwicanyi, kuko Abanyamulenge bahamya ko Leta ya Congo yabatereranye.
Umwarimu muri Kaminuza y’u Rwanda mu gashami ko gukemura amakimbirane, Dr Aggée Shyaka Mugabe, ni umwe mu bakurikiranye by’umwihariko ibibazo by’abanyamulenge, kuva mu myaka yo hambere kugeza magingo aya.
Yagize ati “Abanyamulenge bahageze bavuye mu Rwanda, icyo gihe u Rwanda cyari igihugu gifite n’umwami, ariko Congo yo ntabwo yari iriho, uretse ko n’u Rwanda imbibi zarwo zitari iz’u Rwanda tuzi uyu munsi. Urumva mu kinyejana cya 17, birashoboka ko hari n’abagiye mu kinyejana cya 18, ndetse na nyuma yaho, ariko abagiyeyo bose batanze Congo kuba igihugu.”
Ni ukuvuga ko ubwo icyo gihugu cyabagaho, abagituye bahawe ubwenegihugu bwacyo hatitawe ku buryo bahageze n’aho baturutse, cyane ko uyu mugabane kimwe n’indi yose, yagiye iturwa n’abimukira muri ubu buryo.
Nyamara bishingiye ku ngengabitekerezo yagiye ibibwa, hari abafata Abanyamulenge nk’abanyamahanga, bakabagabaho intambara zidashira bagamije kubirukana no kubatwara ibyabo, nabo bagahorana ukwirwanaho ngo badashira.
Ubwicanyi ku Banyamulenge si ubwa none
Me Bukuru Ntwari, ni umunyamulenge ukomoka mu Minembwe, ariko kubera ubugizi bwa nabi bwibasiye ako gace yaragahunze. Ni umuyobozi w’umuryango uharanira amahoro, iterambere n’umurimo muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo.
Avuga ko ubwicanyi bukorerwa abanyamulenge bwatangiye mu 1964, buza gukara mu 1966 ubwo amoko aturanye n’Abanyamulenge yabicagamo benshi nk’uko ubu bimeze, abanyaga inka nyinshi, uretse ko bwo inzu zitatwikwaga.
Ati “Ni ibikorwa bikomeje kwibasira Abanyamulenge kuko nibo bica, nibo banyaga bakagenda bagasubirayo, bakajya kugurisha za nka (banyaze), hanyuma bakongera bakagaruka bakica, bakongera bagasubiraho, ni ibyo barimo kuva mu 2017.”
Me Bukuru avuga ko ku wa 7 Gicurasi 2017 ari bwo aba Mai-Mai benshi bavuye mu bice bya Lemera, Itombwe, Swima, Uvira, Sange, Lurenge n’ahandi, mu buryo bukomeye noneho batangira kwica abantu, banyaga ina zabo banatwika inzu.
Ati “Ni uko intambara twebwe twita Jenoside, yatangiye. Abanyamulenge nabo ni abantu bamenyereye kwirwanaho, intambara bazimazemo igihe kirenga imyaka 200, intambara iza ku buryo budasanzwe, kumbe harimo Abarundi ba RED Tabara bayobowe na Alexis Sinduhije, ba FNL Parpehutu bayobowe na Gen Nzabampema, barimo FOREBU ya Godefroid Niyombare, batwika inzu.”
Ubwo bwicanyi bwarakomeje, mu mwaka wa 2018 bugera mu bice bya Kamombo na Bijombo, mu 2019 bigera muri Minembwe rwagati.
Yakomeje ati “Mu 2019 nari mu Minembwe, tugira gutya tubona abantu batangiye kwica muri Lurenge noneho baje mu Minembwe hagati, bishe umwana w’umwungeri w’inka w’umunyamulenge, ibintu biba ibindi bindi, bakora ubwicanyi butarigera bubaho, banyaga inka. Umunyamulenge kumukuraho inka cyangwa kumumaraho inka ni urundi rupfu, baratwika, barica, bakongera bakica.”
“Insisiro zirenga 200 zimaze gutwikwa, hamaze kugenda inka hafi ibihumbi 70, no mu minsi ishize, ku wa Gatanu bajyanye izindi nyinshi, bica abantu, bamaze kurenga 200, abakomeretse ni amagana menshi, baratwika n’ahantu abantu bahungiye bakahatwika. Niyo mpamvu tuvuga ko Abanyamulenge barimo gukorerwa Jenoside, kandi imiryango yose yadutereranye. ”
Kuki ibwicanyi bwageze aha?
Dr Mugabe avuga ko ingengabitekerezo yo kwanga Abanyamulenge yigishijwe guhera mu 1960, bikomeza mu 1964-65 na nyuma y’intambara izwi nk’intambara ya Mulele.
Byose ngo byagiye bikorwa hashingiwe ku kuvuga ko Abanyamulenge atari Abanye-Congo, bityo badakwiye kugira uburenganzira nk’ubw’abandi, bigatuma abantu bashaka kubica ngo babambure ibyabo.
Yakomeje ati “Iyi myaka itatu guhera mu 2017, 2018, 2019 n’uyu wa kane twinjiyemo, byafashe indi ntera kubera ko abandi baturanye n’abanyamulenge bazwi nk’Abafurero, Ababembe, Banyindu, babashije kwishyira hamwe, ubundi kera babarwanyaga buri bwoko burwana ukwabwo, buhangana n’abanyamulenge.”
“Ubu noneho bishyize hamwe bibaha imbaraga, hiyongeraho n’imitwe yitwaje intwaro ikomoka mu bihugu byo muri aka karere, bibatiza umurindi, ndetse bamwe banabyijandikamo. Nibyo byatumye bigera kuri iriya ntera.”
Ikindi ngo abatera Abanyamulenge bahinduye uko bakora, kera bicaga umuntu umwe cyangwa babiri babasanze mu nka, ariko ubu bazanye uburyo busa na Jenoside.
Dr Mugabe ati “Sinatinya no kuvuga ko ari jenoside mu by’ukuri, barabatwikira, ubona ko bashaka kuvanaho ikintu cyose kigaragaza ko bafite uburenganzira kuri buriya butaka.”
Leta yaba ifite ubushake bwo gukemura ikibazo?
Me Bukuru avuga ko uretse Perezida Félix Tshisekedi uheruka kuvuga ko ubwenegihugu bwa Congo budakwiye gushidikanywa ku Banyamulenge, Guverinoma iyobowe na Minisitiri w’Intebe Sylvestre Ilunga Ilunkamba nta kintu iravuga, kimwe na Guverineri w’Inyara ya Kivu y’Amajyepfo.
Ati “Rero tugahamya ko twatereranywe, ko Abanyamulenge batereranywe, barimo gukorerwa Jenoside yeruye. Aho mu Minembwe kuva mu kwezi kwa gatatu k’umwaka ushize ubu harundiye impunzi zirenga ibihumbi 100, bugarijwe n’iyo mitwe ya RED Tabara, ku buryo dutekereza ko umunsi umwe ari ukugira ngo bazabatsembe.”
Abo ngo ni abahahungiye baturutse mu bice byatangiriyemo ibitero ahitwa Bijombo, Kamombo, Mibunda n’ahandi, n’inka zirimo gupfana nabo zidafite aho ziragirwa.
Dr Mugabe avuga ko Perezida Tshisekedi agaragaza ubushake bwo gukemura ibibazo ku buryo ajya anoherezayo intumwa za gisirikare, zikagerageza guhuza amoko ahanganye ariko bitaratanga umusaruro.
Yakomeje ati “Ariko kubera ko ari leta igifite intege nke, ikigerageza kwiyubaka, ugera aho ukumva mu by’ukuri ibibera muri kariya gace ndetse na za Beni, za Ituri, ari ibintu bisa nk’ibikorerwa ahantu hatari imbaraga za leta. Ubushake bushobora kuba buhari ariko ubushobozi bwo kubikora neza buidahari.”
“Ariko hari n’ibyo tugenda dusoma muri za raporo ndetse hamwe na hamwe ukumva n’abasirikare ubwabo bashinjwa gufatanya n’abica Abanyamulenge. Simvuga ko byashyirwa kuri leta yose ya Congo, ariko bamwe mu basirikare cyane cyane bafitanye isano na bariya Bafurero, Ababembe n’abandi, bagera mu baturage boherejwe gutabara, bakitwara nabi ndetse no kurushaho. Ibyo nabyo biravugwa.”
Igisubizo kizava he?
Dr Mugabe avuga ko ibyaha byo kwica abantu ubaziza uko baremwe nk’uko byagenze mu Rwanda mu 1994 n’ibindi bisa nka byo, ari ibyaha mpuzamahanga bibangamira amahoro n’umutekano mu buryo burenga imbibi z’igihugu birimo kuberamo.
Ibyo ngo bituma igisubizo kitanagomba kuva ahantu hamwe, ariko Leta ya Congo niyo igomba gufata iya mbere, byaba ngombwa ikiyambaza ibindi bihugu byo mu karere binabifitemo ubunararibonye n’Umuryango w’abibumbye.
Yakomeje ati “Erega ibyo byose bibera hariya, bihabera Monusco ihari ni zo ngabo zishinzwe kubungabunga amahoro, nyinshi ku Isi kurusha uyu munsi, ariko ntabwo zabashije kugarura umutekano, kurinda abaturage.”
Ibyo ngo ntibyakorwa mu gace ka Minembwe gusa, ahubwo byakorwa no mu bindi bice bya RDC birimo kuberamo ubwicanyi, kuko mu bushobozi bwa RDC gusa, bishobora kuzafata igihe ntibiramire ubuzima bwa benshi.
Itoroka ry’abasirikare b’Abanyamulenge
Mu ntangiriro z’uyu mwaka nibwo Ingabo za Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo (FARDC) zemeje ko umwe mu basirikare bakuru bazo, Colonel Michel Rukunda uzwi nka Makanika, w’Umunyamulenge, yatorotse igisirikare ajya kwifatanya ba bene wabo mu buryo bwo kwirinda ku bitero bakomeje kugabwaho.
Uyu mugabo yumvikanye mu itangazamakuru avuga ko yagiye kubera ko “abaturage barimo gupfa iwacu, ibintu tutakwihanganira kuko ntabwo twarebera abantu bapfa ngo bashire ngo tuzabone kugira icyo dukora. Niba turi muri leta, tuyirimo kubera ko tugira ababyeyi, tugira iwacu. Ababyeyi bacu batagihari n’iwacu barashize, ubwo twaba dukora iki, ko twize igisirikare kugira ngo turengere abaturage n’ibyabo, bakaba batarimo barengerwa?”
Yakomeje ati “Twahisemo kuza kubabarana n’abaturage, kuza gufatanya na bo kugira ngo dushakane amahoro yabo kuko abari bayashinzwe ntacyo bakoze bararebereye.”
Ni urugamba avuga ko bazarwana “kugeza ku mutongi wa nyuma w’amaraso”, “kugeza tugaruye uburenganzira bw’abaturage.”
Mu minsi ishize byanavuzwe ko undi musirikare mukuru Colonel Aaron Nyamushebwa w’umunyamulenge na we yatorotse, ariko ayo makuru aza guhakanwa kugeza no kuri nyir’ubwite.
Me Bukuru Ntwari avuga ko “kuva muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo mu Tulambo, Mibunda, ahantu Mai Mai yanatwitse, Mai Mai yasenye, yanyaze inka, n’aho ari muri Congo Central, ahantu mu bilometero byinshi hafi 3000, [kuvuga ko yatorotse] noneho byanamuteza n’akaga gakomeye mu bantu bari kumwe, uretse ko ari mu gisirikare cy’igihugu bamubumbatira.”
Yakomeje ati “Uretse ko yabibeshyuje, ariko ni inkuru zaremereye ubwoko bw’Abanyamulenge cyane.”
Balkanization, ibyago ku banyamulenge
Imvugo ikomeje gushyushya imitwe y’abanye-Congo benshi ni icyizwe ‘balkanization; ko hari umugambi wo kwigabanya icyo gihugu bigizwemo uruhare n’ibihugu birimo u Rwanda.
Ni imvugo zanagarutsweho n’abarimo Cardinal Fridolin Ambongo Besungu na Adolphe Muzito wabaye Minisitiri w’Intebe wa RDC, ubu ni umuvugizi w’ihuriro Lamuka.
Ambongo yavuze ko Abanyarwanda cyangwa Abanya-Uganda bamaze imyaka myinshi muri RDC “nta washidikanya ku bwenegihugu bwabo bwa Congo, ariko igiteye inkeke ni abakomeje kwiyongerayo, kandi tukanabaha umwanya wo guhita nk’Abanye-Congo.”
Dr Mugabe avuga ko guhuza iyi balkanization no kuba iki gihugu gifite abanyamahanga gicumbikiye, kandi bikavugwa n’abantu bakomeye mu gihugu, bishobora gushyira mu kaga Abanyamulenge. Ku bwe ngo abona imvugo ya "balkanisation" ifite ibisobanuro by’uruhurirane nka bibiri.
Yakomeje ati “Hari abanyapolitiki batsinzwe amatora bakora ibishoboka byose kugira ngo banduze isura ya Perezida Tshisekedi ashishikajwe no kugarura umubano mwiza hagati ya RDC n’abaturanyi bayo harimo n’u Rwanda.”
“Hari ingengabitekerezo imaze imyaka myinshi yaracengejwe mu baturage yo kwanga abazwi nka "Rwandophones" cyangwa abavuga Ikinyarwanda ndetse n’u Rwanda. Kwanga abavuga Ikinyarwanda ni umushinga wagiye uhesha abanyapolitiki benshi akazi. Umenyapokitiki ushaka umwanya, cyane cyane abakomoka mu burasirazuba bakunze gukoresha iturufu nka "balkanisation" mu rwego rwo kwishakira amaramuko.”
Ibyo ngo bishobora kuba biterwa n’uko hari abanye-Congo batarimo kubona neza uburyo u Rwanda na RDC bifitanye umubano mwiza mu butwererane n’ubukungu, akaba ari bo “bacuruza iyo mvugo ko hari balkanization.”

Title: Umuntu ukekwaho Coronavirus yashyizwe mu kato muri Kenya
Body:
Ubuyobozi bw’ikigo cy’indege cya Kenya Airways bwatangaje ko hari umuntu washyizwe mu kato mu bitaro bya Kenyatta National Hospital (KNH), avuye Guangzhou mu Bushinwa ariko akagaragaraho ibimenyetso by’ibicurane.
Ubuyobozi bw’ikigo cy’indege cya Kenya Airways bwatangaje ko hari umuntu washyizwe mu kato mu bitaro bya Kenyatta National Hospital (KNH), avuye Guangzhou mu Bushinwa ariko akagaragaraho ibimenyetso by’ibicurane.
Ni mu gihe u Bushinwa bwagarayemo icyorezo cya Coronavirus, gifatwa nk’indwara y’ubuhumekero ishobora gukurizamo umusonga.
Itangazp rya Kenya Airways rivuga ko uwo mugenzi yageze i Nairobi kuri uyu wa Kabiri avuye i Guangzhou.
Rikomeza riti “Icyemezo cyo kumushyira mu kato cyemeranyijweho na Guverinoma ya Kenya ku kibuga cy’Indege cya JKIA,”
Amakuru avuga ko uyu muntu yari yemerewe gusubira iwabo n’ubuyobozi bw’u Bushinwa, ku kibuga mpuzamahanga cy’indege cya Baiyun i Guangzhou.
Kenya Airways yatangaje ko ubu no kujya mu ndege birimo gusaba ko umunrtu abanza kugenzurwa, kugira ngo ataza kugira abyo yanduza aramutse afite coronavirus.
Imibare y’abahitanywe na coronavirus ukomeje kwiyongera aho bageze ku 106, ndetse umubare w’abayanduye wikubye inshuro hafi ebyiri mu munsi umwe gusa, nk’uko ubuyobozi bw’u Bushinwa bwabitangaje.
Iyi ndwara yamaze kugera mu bihugu bitandukanye birimo ibyo muri Aziya, u Burayi na Cote d’ivoire muri Afurika hari umuntu wayiketsweho.
Umubare w’abantu bari bamaze kwandura iyi virusi ifata imyanya y’ubuhumekero bikavamo umusonga, mu Bushinwa kuri uyu wa Mbere habarurwaga 4.515 bavuye ku 2.835 ku munsi wabanje.

Title: Ibigo 10 bikora ibijyanye na drones bihataniye igihembo cya £40.000 kizatangirwa i Kigali
Body:
Ibigo 10 byo ku mugabane wa Afurika byatoranyijwe nk’ibizahatanira igihembo cya £40,000 kizatangwa mu nama izabera i Kigali mu kwezi gutaha, agenewe ikigo kizagaragaza umwihariko kurusha ibindi.
Ibigo 10 byo ku mugabane wa Afurika byatoranyijwe nk’ibizahatanira igihembo cya £40,000 kizatangwa mu nama izabera i Kigali mu kwezi gutaha, agenewe ikigo kizagaragaza umwihariko kurusha ibindi.
Ibyo bigo uko ari 10 ni ibyo mu bihugu icyenda byo kuri uyu mugabane birimo Benin, Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo, Kenya, Malawi, Nigeria, Afurika y’Epfo, Tanzania, Zambia na Zimbabwe.
Ku munsi wa nyuma w’irushanwa, buri kigo kizahabwa umwanya wo kugaragaza imikorere imbere y’akanama nkemurampaka, mu nama nyafurika ku bijyanye n’indege zitagira abapilote (drones), izabera i Kigali ku wa 6 Gashyantare 2020.
Ibigo bihatanye muri iri rushanwa rizwi nka African Drone Business Challenge (ADBC) ribaye ku nshuro ya mbere, rigenewe ba rwiyemezamirimo ba Afurika, hagamijwe kwerekana uburyo bushya drones zakwifashishwa mu buryo butanga umusaruro.
Ibyo bigo icumi ni DRONE ERA (Benin), Africa Bees (DRC), Kenya Flying Labs (Kenya), MicroMek Limited (Malawi), Global Air Drone Academy (Nigeria/USA), Upshore Robotics (Nigeria), Integrated Aerial Systems (Afurika y’Epfo), Jembe Kilimo (Tanzania), JCKEG Solutions (Zambia), na Alley Capital Group (ACG) (Zimbabwe).
Ibyo bigo byatoranyijwe mu bindi hafi 150 byari byagaragaje imishinga yabyo, byo mu bihugu 31 bya Afurika. Abahatanaga basabwe kugaragaza umushinga w’uburyo drones zakoreshwa mu kwagura amahirwe y’ubucuruzi.
Imishinga yatanzwe yasesenguwe n’impuguke mpuzamahanga zari zigize akanama nkemurampaka, amanota atangwa harenwe ku bintu birimo amahirwe umushinga ugaragaza yatuma waguka kandi ukaramba, kuba drones zakoreshwa mu nyungu z’abantu benshi no kuba zongera amahirwe mu iterambere ry’ubukungu.
Mu mishinga yakiriwe, imyinshi yari ikiri mu mwaka wa mbere wo gutangira, yibanda cyane ku nzego zirimo ubucukuzi bw’amabuye y’agaciro, ubuhinzi n’ubuzima.
Biteganyijwe ko ibigo icumi byatoranyijwe bizanyura mu mwiherero w’iminsi ibiri ugamije gukarisha imishinga yabo, yateguwe na Carnegie Mellon University Africa (CMU Africa) azibanda ku kunoza imishinga, bagahabwa n’amahirwe yo guhura n’abantu batandukanye.
Biteganyijwe ko abazatsinda ari abazabasha kugaragaza neza imishinga yabo imbere y’abakemurampaka n’abazaba bitabiriye iyi nama basaga 800.
Nyuma hazatangazwa abatsinze harimo uwatwaye igihembo nyamukuru n’uwamuguye mu ntege, ibihembo byose hamwe bizaba bifite agaciro ka £40,000, ni ukuvuga hafi miliyoni 50 Frw yatanzwe n’Ikigega cy’Abongereza gishinzwe iterambere mpuzamahanga, UKAID/DfID.
Inama nyafurika ku bijyanye na drones izabera mu Rwanda ku wa 5-7 Gashyantare, 2020. Yeteguwe ku bufatanye bwa Banki y’Isi na Guverinoma y’u Rwanda, ikazitabirwa n’abasaga 1000, muri Kigali Convention Centre.
Umuyobozi wa Banki y’Isi mu Rwanda, Yasser El-Gammal, yavuze ko iyi nama yashyizeho amahirwe yihariye yo “kuri ba rwiyemezamirimo ngo babashe gutangira ibiko by’ikoranabuhanga ryo ku rwego rwo hejuru, bikazagira uruhare mu kubaka urwego rwa drones kandi rukora neza muri Afurika runazamura imitangire ya serivisi ku baturage bayo.”
Biteganyijwe ko muri iyi nama hazabaho ibice byo kungurana ubumenyi mu bijyanye na drones, kumurika ibyo bakora n’irushanwa rizitwa Lake Kivu Challenge rizahuza ibigo by’ikoranabuhanga.
U Rwanda ni kimwe mu bihugu bike ku Isi bibyaza umusaruro drones mu bijyanye n’ubuzima, aho bigizwemo uruhare n’ikigo Zipline, drones zigeza amaraso ku bitaro bitandukanye mu Rwanda, kimwe n’imiti iba ikenewe mu buryo bwihutirwa.

Title: Afurika y’Epfo yagennye Ambasaderi mushya wayo mu Rwanda
Body:
Afurika y’Epfo yamaze kugena Ambasaderi mushya wayo mu Rwanda, nyuma y’umwaka nta ambasaderi igira usimbura George Nkosinati Twala.
Afurika y’Epfo yamaze kugena Ambasaderi mushya wayo mu Rwanda, nyuma y’umwaka nta ambasaderi igira usimbura George Nkosinati Twala.
Mu Ukuboza 2018 nibwo uwari Ambasaderi wa Afurika y’Epfo mu Rwanda, George Nkosinati Twala yahamagajwe i Pretoria, nyuma y’uko manda ye yari yararangiye.
Icyo gihe hari hashize iminsi hari umwuka mubi wakuruwe n’ibitutsi bivugwa ko byatutswe uwari Minisitiri w’Ububanyi n’Amahanga wa Afurika y’Epfo, Lindiwe Sisulu, biturutse mu Rwanda.
Umunyamabana wa Leta ushinzwe umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba, Olivier Nduhungirehe yabwiye The East African ko Afurika y’Epfo yamaze kuboherereza amazina ya ambasaderi mushya, gusa yirinda kumutangaza kuko u Rwanda “atari rwo rugena itariki nyayo azagerera i Kigali”.
Ibihugu byombi byamaze kwemeranya kuri ambasaderi mushya gusa nta na kimwe kiremera gutangaza uwo ari we.
Ikinyamakuru The East African cyatangaje ko gifite amakuru yizewe y’uko Mandisi Mpahlwa w’imyaka 60 ari we wagizwe Ambasaderi mushya wa Afurika y’Epfo mu Rwanda. Cyavuze ko yemejwe mu Ukwakira umwaka ushize, isaha n’isaha akaba yagera i Kigali agatangira imirimo.
Mpahlwa asanzwe ari ambasaderi wa Afurika y’Epfo muri Mozambique, manda ye muri icyo gihugu irarangira muri uyu mwaka.
Yigeze kuba Minisitiri w’ubucuruzi, anakora mu yindi myanya muri Guverinoma ya Afurika y’Epfo guhera mu 2004.
Nduhungirehe yavuze ko umubano w’u Rwanda na Afurika y’Epfo umeze neza, ndetse ngo n’ibibazo bihari bari kubikemura.
Yagize ati “Umubano wacu na Afurika y’Epfo ni mwiza. Twagize ibibazo mu minsi yashize ariko turi gukorana ngo tubikemure. Ambasaderi wacu mushya muri Afurika y’Epfo yakiriwe neza i Pretoria, na ambasaderi wabo mu Rwanda yeremewe.”
Nduhungirehe yavuze ko bari no gukemura ibindi bibazo biri hagati y’ibihugu byombi.
Mu Ukwakira 2019, Perezida Paul Kagame yakiriye Jeff Radebe, intumwa yihariye ya Perezida wa Afurika y’Epfo, Cyril Ramaphosa. Nyuma y’aho abakuru b’ibihugu bombi Kagame na Ramaphosa bahuriye i Sochi mu Burusiya bagirana ibiganiro aho bari bitabiriye inama ihuza u Burusiya na Afurika.
Muri Nyakanga 2019, u Rwanda rwasimbuje uwari Ambasaderi warwo muri Afurika y’Epfo, Vincent Karega wari uhamaze imyaka umunani, asimburwa na Ambasaderi mushya, Eugène Kayihura.
Nubwo umubano w’u Rwanda na Afurika y’Epfo ugenda ugarura isura, hari ibitaranoga, cyane cyane ko Afurika y’Epfo icumbikiye Kayumba Nyamwasa ukuriye RNC n’Umutwe w’abarwanyi wa P5, uhuriweho n’amashyaka atanu arwanya Leta y’u Rwanda.
Uyu mutwe wakomeje gutegura ibikorwa bigamije guhungabanya umutekano w’u Rwanda no kugirira nabi ubutegetsi buriho ndetse bamwe mu bari bawugize barimo umuyobozi wabo Rtd Major Mudathiru Habib, barimo kuburanishwa n’inkiko za gisirikare mu Rwanda, nyuma yo gufatwa n’ingabo za RDC, abandi bakishyikiriza MONUSCO.
Kugeza ubu kandi Abanyarwanda bakomeje kugorwa no kubona viza zo kwerekeza muri Afurika y’Epfo, ikibazo Perezida w’icyo gihugu, Cyril Ramaphosa aheruka kuvuga ko kigiye gukemurwa, ariko imyaka igiye kuba ibiri bitarashoboka.

Title: Ibyo wamenya kuri Gen Ndayishimiye ugiye guhagararira CNDD-FDD mu matora y’Umukuru w’Igihugu mu Burundi
Body:
“Ntakugugumwa caratuvunye” niyo yari indirimbo mu mihanda yo mu Mujyi wa Kitega n’ahandi mu Burundi mu barwanashya ba CNDD-FDD, nyuma y’aho byemejwe ko Général Major Evariste Ndayishimiye ariwe mukandida mu matora y’Umukuru w’Igihugu ahabwamo amahirwe yo kuba Perezida.
“Ntakugugumwa caratuvunye” niyo yari indirimbo mu mihanda yo mu Mujyi wa Kitega n’ahandi mu Burundi mu barwanashya ba CNDD-FDD, nyuma y’aho byemejwe ko Général Major Evariste Ndayishimiye ariwe mukandida mu matora y’Umukuru w’Igihugu ahabwamo amahirwe yo kuba Perezida.
Inteko idasanzwe y’ishyaka riri ku butegetsi mu Burundi, CNDD-FDD yateranye kuri iki Cyumweru, yatoreye Général Evariste Ndayishimiye guhagararira iryo shyaka mu matora ya Perezida azaba muri Gicurasi uyu mwaka.
Ndayishimiye ni umwe mu bari bamaze iminsi bahabwa amahirwe yo gusimbura Pierre Nkurunziza wayoboraga u Burundi guhera mu 2015.
Gen Ndayishimiye ni umwe mu barwanashyaka b’imena ba CNDD-FDD, kandi yagiye ahabwa imyanya itandukanye mu gisirikare cy’u Burundi no muri Guverinoma.
Hari abavuga ko Ndayishimiye ari umwe mu nkoramutima za Nkurunziza , akaba inshuti ya hafi ya Minisitiri w’Umutekano, Allain Guillaume Bunyoni, ufatwa nk’ukomeye mu Burundi.
Ni umugabo utarakunze kugaragara kenshi mu ruhame ari nayo mpamvu hari benshi mu baturage bamufata nk’udafite ubusembwa mu bibazo bimaze iminsi biyogoza u Burundi.
Ndayishimiye uzwi nka Neva, yavukiye mu ntara ya Gitega muri Komini Giheta mu 1968. Yabanje kwiga amategeko muri Kaminuza y’u Burundi kugeza mu 1995 ubwo habaga ubwicanyi muri iyo kaminuza bwibasiye abanyeshuri b’Abahutu agahunga.
Uyu mugabo w’imyaka 52, ni umwe mu ba mbere binjiye mu gisirikare cy’ishyaka CNDD-FDD ubwo bari bakiri inyeshyamba.
Yayoboye ibitero bitandukanye mu ntambara yari igamije gufata ubutegetsi mu myaka ya za 2000.
Nyuma y’amasezerano yo guhagarika intambara yasinywe mu 2003, yagiye mu myanya itandukanye irimo kuba Minisitiri w’Umutekano, Umuyobozi ushinzwe guhuza ibikorwa bya gisirikare n’ibya gisivile mu biro by’umukuru w’igihugu. Yabaye kandi Umuyobozi Mukuru wa SOBUGEA, sosiyete ishinzwe ubwikorezi bwo mu kirere.
Guhera muri Kanama 2016, Ndayishimiye yatorewe kuba Umunyamabanga Mukuru wa CNDD-FDD.
Kimwe mu bivugwa kuba byatumye abarwanashyaka ba CNDD-FDD bamuhitamo, ni uko ari umwe mu bantu bafite ubunararibonye kandi bakuriye mu ishyaka.
Ni umuntu wakoze imirimo itandukanye ya gisirikare, azi ibijyanye n’imiyoborere kuko yakoze muri Minisiteri y’umutekano no mu biro by’umukuru w’igihugu, imikorere yaho arayizi neza.
Azwi kandi ku rwego rw’akarere kuko ni we wari uhagarariye Guverinoma y’u Burundi mu itsinda ryo gukurikirana ishyirwa mu bikorwa ry’amasezerano yo guhagarika imirwano yasinywe hagati y’u Burundi n’umutwe wa FNL Palipehutu.
Bivugwa ko afitanye kandi umubano wihariye na Leta ya Tanzania, imwe mu nshuti z’akadasohoka z’ishyaka CNDD-FDD. Nta byaha ashinjwa haba mu Burundi no ku rwego mpuzamahanga, ahubwo afatwa nk’umuntu wumva ibibazo kandi wicisha bugufi ari nabyo bimugira ukunzwe cyane mu baturage.
Ikindi Gen. Ndayishimiye ashimwa n’abamuzi kuba ari intyoza mu mbwirwaruhame, ndetse akagira akarimi kazi kureshya abaturage no guhosha uburakari ahari amakimbirane.
By’umwihariko, Gen. Ndayishimiye ni inshuti y’akadasohoka ya Nkurunziza, aho bivugwa ko nta kintu na kimwe gikorwa mu Burundi atakizi, haba mbere y’uko ajya mu buyobozi bw’ishyaka ndetse na nyuma yaho.
Ni umuhanga kandi mu gukorera ibikorwa bye mu rwihisho ntashake kwigaragaza, ku buryo kumenya imikorere n’imitekerereze ye ngo bigoye.
Icyakora, Ndayishimiye ngo ntashyigikiwe n’abasirikare bakuru bose, cyane cyane abavuka mu bice byo mu Burengerazuba bw’Igihugu nkuko bivugwa n’ab’imbere mu ishyaka. Ikindi ngo ni umuntu ugira umujinya vuba.
Nubwo bimeze gutyo, byitezwe ko Ndayishimiye ashobora gutsinda amatora ya Perezida kubera ko ishyaka CNDD-FDD rifite abayoboke benshi mu gihugu kandi akaba ari naryo risa n’iriyoboye inzego hafi ya zose z’ubutegetsi. Ikindi nuko amashyaka atavuga rumwe na Leta ari imbere mu gihugu asa n’adafite imbaraga nyinshi zakangaranya CNDD-FDD, amwe akaba yaranacitsemo ibice.
